 894  8BD9                  include "./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm
   1+ 8BD9              ScaleXX16Matrix197:
   2+ 8BD9 06 09        	ld		b,9                 ; Interate though all 9 matrix elements
   3+ 8BDB 0E C5        	ld		c,ConstNorm         ; c = 197
   4+ 8BDD 21 33 C0     	ld		hl,UBnkTransmatSidev ; within XX16 (transmat)
   5+ 8BE0              .ScaleXX16Loop:
   6+ 8BE0 7E           	ld		a,(hl)              ; set DE = matrix value
   7+ 8BE1 5F           	ld		e,a                 ;
   8+ 8BE2 23           	inc		hl                  ;
   9+ 8BE3 7E           	ld		a,(hl)              ;
  10+ 8BE4 57           	ld		d,a                 ;
  11+ 8BE5 E6 80            and     SignOnly8Bit        ; A holds high still to we can strip out sign bit
  12+ 8BE7 DD 6F        	ld		ixl,a				; retain for sign bit
  13+ 8BE9              	ShiftDELeft1				; carry now holds sign bit and DE = De * 2, this will in effect strip off the sign bit automatically
  13+ 8BE9 CB 23       >			   sla e
  13+ 8BEB CB 12       >			   rl  d
  14+ 8BED 7A               ld      a,d                 ; a = high byte after x 2
  15+ 8BEE C5           	push	bc                  ; save BC  counter and constant 197
  16+ 8BEF E5           	push	hl                  ; save HL
  17+ 8BF0 CD A5 A3     	call	DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC	; result in BC = A*256 / 197 or D *512 / 197 = 2.6 * vector element, effectivley the result will always be in c
  18+ 8BF3 E1           	pop		hl
  19+ 8BF4 2B               dec     hl                  ; move back to low byte
  20+ 8BF5 71               ld      (hl),c              ; save result in low byte as we want to preserve high byte sign
  21+ 8BF6 23               inc     hl                  ; move back to high byte
  22+ 8BF7              ;    ld      a,(hl)
  23+ 8BF7              ;    and     $80
  24+ 8BF7 DD 7D            ld      a,ixl
  25+ 8BF9 77               ld      (hl),a              ; write back just sign bit
  26+ 8BFA C1           	pop		bc                  ; retrieve both counter and constant 197
  27+ 8BFB 23               inc     hl                  ; no to next vertex value
  28+ 8BFC 10 E2        	djnz	.ScaleXX16Loop
  29+ 8BFE C9           	ret
  30+ 8BFF
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm
 895  8BFF
 896  8BFF                  include "./Universe/StarRoutines.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/StarRoutines.asm
   1+ 8BFF              ;note: DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC as per
   2+ 8BFF              ;                                   BC = A0
   3+ 8BFF              ;                                   DE = 0C
   4+ 8BFF              ;                                   so BC = a * 256 / C
   5+ 8BFF
   6+ 8BFF              ; We can cheat here, Speed is always 0 or positive
   7+ 8BFF              ; z postion will always be positive if we can see it
   8+ 8BFF
   9+ 8BFF EB           InitStarAtHL:           ex      de,hl
  10+ 8C00 CD 62 98                             call    doRND
  11+ 8C03 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  12+ 8C04 F6 08                                or      8
  13+ 8C06 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  14+ 8C07 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  15+ 8C09 23                                   inc     hl
  16+ 8C0A 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  17+ 8C0B EB                                   ex      de,hl
  18+ 8C0C CD 62 98                             call    doRND
  19+ 8C0F EB                                   ex      de,hl
  20+ 8C10 0F                                   rrca
  21+ 8C11 E6 80                                and     $80
  22+ 8C13 B6                                   or      (hl)
  23+ 8C14 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  24+ 8C15 23                                   inc     hl
  25+ 8C16 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  26+ 8C17 CD 62 98                             call    doRND
  27+ 8C1A EB                                   ex      de,hl
  28+ 8C1B F6 04                                or      4
  29+ 8C1D 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  30+ 8C1E 23                                   inc     hl
  31+ 8C1F E6 7F                                and     $7F
  32+ 8C21 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  33+ 8C22 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  34+ 8C23 CD 62 98                             call    doRND
  35+ 8C26 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  36+ 8C27 0F                                   rrca
  37+ 8C28 E6 80                                and     $80
  38+ 8C2A B6                                   or      (hl)
  39+ 8C2B 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  40+ 8C2C 23                                   inc     hl
  41+ 8C2D EB                                   ex      de,hl
  42+ 8C2E CD 62 98                             call    doRND
  43+ 8C31 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  44+ 8C32 F6 90                                or      144
  45+ 8C34 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  46+ 8C35 23                                   inc     hl
  47+ 8C36 F6 70                                or      %01110000
  48+ 8C38 E6 7F                                and     $7f     ; bodge
  49+ 8C3A 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  50+ 8C3B 23                                   inc     hl
  51+ 8C3C C9                                   ret
  52+ 8C3D
  53+ 8C3D EB           InitHyperStarAtHL:      ex      de,hl
  54+ 8C3E CD 62 98                             call    doRND
  55+ 8C41 CB 27                                sla     a
  56+ 8C43 CB 27                                sla     a                ; so its * 4 as we have a blank spot
  57+ 8C45 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  58+ 8C46 E6 F8                                and     %11111000
  59+ 8C48 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  60+ 8C49 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  61+ 8C4B 23                                   inc     hl
  62+ 8C4C 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  63+ 8C4D EB                                   ex      de,hl
  64+ 8C4E CD 62 98                             call    doRND
  65+ 8C51 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  66+ 8C52 0F                                   rrca
  67+ 8C53 E6 80                                and     $80
  68+ 8C55 B6                                   or      (hl)
  69+ 8C56 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  70+ 8C57 23                                   inc     hl
  71+ 8C58 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  72+ 8C59 CD 62 98                             call    doRND
  73+ 8C5C CB 27                                sla     a
  74+ 8C5E CB 27                                sla     a               ; so its * 4 as we have a blank spot
  75+ 8C60 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  76+ 8C61 E6 F8                                and     %11111000
  77+ 8C63 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  78+ 8C64 23                                   inc     hl
  79+ 8C65 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  80+ 8C67 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  81+ 8C68 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  82+ 8C69 CD 62 98                             call    doRND
  83+ 8C6C EB                                   ex      de,hl
  84+ 8C6D 0F                                   rrca
  85+ 8C6E E6 80                                and     $80
  86+ 8C70 B6                                   or      (hl)
  87+ 8C71 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  88+ 8C72 23                                   inc     hl
  89+ 8C73 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  90+ 8C74 CD 62 98                             call    doRND
  91+ 8C77 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  92+ 8C78 F6 5F                                or      95
  93+ 8C7A 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  94+ 8C7B 23                                   inc     hl
  95+ 8C7C F6 70                                or      %01110000
  96+ 8C7E E6 7F                                and     $7f     ; bodge
  97+ 8C80 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  98+ 8C81 23                                   inc     hl
  99+ 8C82 C9                                   ret
 100+ 8C83
 101+ 8C83              ; we could cheat, flip the sign of DE and just add but its not very optimised
 102+ 8C83 7C           StarsSUBHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
 103+ 8C84 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 104+ 8C86 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
 105+ 8C87 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
 106+ 8C88                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite therefore we can add
 106+ 8C88 FA B6 8C    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDEOppSGN
 107+ 8C8B 78           .SUBHLDESameSigns:      ld      a,b
 108+ 8C8C B2                                   or      d
 109+ 8C8D                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
 109+ 8C8D FA 97 8C    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameNeg
 110+ 8C90 B7                                   or      a
 111+ 8C91 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 112+ 8C93                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 112+ 8C93 FA AA 8C    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 113+ 8C96 C9                                   ret
 114+ 8C97 7C           .SUBHLDESameNeg:        ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 115+ 8C98 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 116+ 8C9A 67                                   ld      h,a
 117+ 8C9B 7A                                   ld      a,d
 118+ 8C9C E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 119+ 8C9E 57                                   ld      d,a
 120+ 8C9F B7                                   or      a
 121+ 8CA0 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 122+ 8CA2                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 122+ 8CA2 FA AA 8C    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 123+ 8CA5 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 124+ 8CA6 F6 80                                or      SignOnly8Bit
 125+ 8CA8 67                                   ld      h,a
 126+ 8CA9 C9                                   ret
 127+ 8CAA              .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw:     NegHL
 127+ 8CAA AF          >                    xor a
 127+ 8CAB 95          >                    sub l
 127+ 8CAC 6F          >                    ld l,a
 127+ 8CAD 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 127+ 8CAE 94          >                    sub h
 127+ 8CAF 67          >                    ld h,a
 128+ 8CB0 78                                   ld      a,b
 129+ 8CB1 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 130+ 8CB3 B4                                   or      h
 131+ 8CB4 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 132+ 8CB5 C9                                   ret
 133+ 8CB6 B7           .SUBHLDEOppSGN:         or      a
 134+ 8CB7 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 135+ 8CB8 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 136+ 8CBA 67                                   ld      h,a
 137+ 8CBB 7A                                   ld      a,d
 138+ 8CBC E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 139+ 8CBE 57                                   ld      d,a
 140+ 8CBF 19                                   add     hl,de
 141+ 8CC0 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 142+ 8CC1 B4                                   or      h
 143+ 8CC2 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 144+ 8CC3 C9                                   ret
 145+ 8CC4
 146+ 8CC4 7C           StarsADDHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
 147+ 8CC5 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 148+ 8CC7 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
 149+ 8CC8 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
 150+ 8CC9                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
 150+ 8CC9 FA E1 8C    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
 151+ 8CCC 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:      ld      a,b
 152+ 8CCD B2                                   or      d
 153+ 8CCE                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
 153+ 8CCE FA D3 8C    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
 154+ 8CD1 19                                   add     hl,de
 155+ 8CD2 C9                                   ret
 156+ 8CD3 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:        ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 157+ 8CD4 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 158+ 8CD6 67                                   ld      h,a
 159+ 8CD7 7A                                   ld      a,d
 160+ 8CD8 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 161+ 8CDA 57                                   ld      d,a
 162+ 8CDB 19                                   add     hl,de
 163+ 8CDC 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
 164+ 8CDE B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 165+ 8CDF 67                                   ld      h,a
 166+ 8CE0 C9                                   ret
 167+ 8CE1 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:         ld      a,h                         ; here HL and DE are opposite  so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 168+ 8CE2 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 169+ 8CE4 67                                   ld      h,a
 170+ 8CE5 7A                                   ld      a,d
 171+ 8CE6 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 172+ 8CE8 57                                   ld      d,a
 173+ 8CE9 B7                                   or      a
 174+ 8CEA ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 175+ 8CEC 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
 176+ 8CEE 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:  ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 177+ 8CEF B4                                   or      h
 178+ 8CF0 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 179+ 8CF1 C9                                   ret
 180+ 8CF2              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:      NegHL
 180+ 8CF2 AF          >                    xor a
 180+ 8CF3 95          >                    sub l
 180+ 8CF4 6F          >                    ld l,a
 180+ 8CF5 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 180+ 8CF6 94          >                    sub h
 180+ 8CF7 67          >                    ld h,a
 181+ 8CF8 78                                   ld      a,b
 182+ 8CF9 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 183+ 8CFB B4                                   or      h
 184+ 8CFC 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 185+ 8CFD C9                                   ret
 186+ 8CFE              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 187+ 8CFE 06 0B        InitialiseStars:        ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars
 188+ 8D00 78                                   ld      a,b
 189+ 8D01 32 37 95                             ld      (NumberOfStarsNOSTM),a
 190+ 8D04 21 84 96                             ld      hl,varDust
 191+ 8D07 CD FF 8B     .InitStarsLoop:         call    InitStarAtHL
 192+ 8D0A 10 FB                                djnz    .InitStarsLoop
 193+ 8D0C C9                                   ret
 194+ 8D0D              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 195+ 8D0D 06 0B        InitialiseHyperStars:   ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars
 196+ 8D0F 78                                   ld      a,b
 197+ 8D10 32 37 95                             ld      (NumberOfStarsNOSTM),a
 198+ 8D13 21 84 96                             ld      hl,varDust
 199+ 8D16 CD 3D 8C     .InitStarsLoop:         call    InitHyperStarAtHL
 200+ 8D19 10 FB                                djnz    .InitStarsLoop
 201+ 8D1B C9                                   ret
 202+ 8D1C              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 203+ 8D1C              StarsForward:          ; break
 204+ 8D1C 3A 37 95                             ld      a,(NumberOfStarsNOSTM)
 205+ 8D1F 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; get the number of stars to process
 206+ 8D20 FD 21 84 96                          ld      iy,varDust                          ; hl is now a pointer to the dust array
 207+ 8D24 C5           StarProcessLoop:        push    bc                                  ; save counter +1
 208+ 8D25 FD 7E 05     .Qequ64XSpeedDivZHi:    ld      a,(iy+5)
 209+ 8D28 5F                                   ld      e,a
 210+ 8D29 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; de = zhi/256
 211+ 8D2B 3A 1D 94                             ld      a,(DELTA)
 212+ 8D2E FE 00                                cp      0
 213+ 8D30 20 01                                jr      nz,.NormalSpeed
 214+ 8D32 3C                                   inc     a                                   ; so the is at lest some dust movement
 215+ 8D33 47           .NormalSpeed:           ld      b,a
 216+ 8D34 0E 00                                ld      c,0                                 ; bc = delta * 256
 217+ 8D36 CD 19 A4                             call    BC_Div_DE                           ; BC = BC.DE , HL = remainder
 218+ 8D39                                      ShiftHLRight1
 218+ 8D39 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 218+ 8D3B CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 219+ 8D3D                                      ShiftHLRight1                               ; hl = remainder/2 so now 64 * speed / zhi
 219+ 8D3D CB 3C       >			   srl h
 219+ 8D3F CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 220+ 8D41 7D                                   ld      a,l                                 ;
 221+ 8D42 F6 01                                or      1                                   ; so ensure A is at least 1 for ambient movement
 222+ 8D44 DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a                               ; preserve A which is also VarQ = 64 * speed / zhi
 223+ 8D46 FD 6E 04 FD  .ZequZMinusSpeedX64:    ld      hl,(iy+4)                           ; hl = z
 223+ 8D4A 66 05
 224+ 8D4C ED 5B 1E 94                          ld      de, (DELTA4)                         ; de = delta4 i.e. speed * 64 pre computed
 225+ 8D50 CD 83 8C                             call    StarsSUBHLDESigned
 226+ 8D53                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,ResetStar
 226+ 8D53 CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
 226+ 8D55 C2 AA 8E    >                        jp      nz,ResetStar
 227+ 8D58 FD 75 04 FD                          ld      (iy+4),hl
 227+ 8D5C 74 05
 228+ 8D5E FD 6E 00 FD  .XEquXPlusXhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; hl  = x
 228+ 8D62 66 01
 229+ 8D64 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 230+ 8D65 E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 231+ 8D67 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(x hi)
 232+ 8D68 DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 233+ 8D6A ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(x hi) * Q
 234+ 8D6C 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 235+ 8D6D E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 236+ 8D6F B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 237+ 8D70 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 238+ 8D71 CD C4 8C                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned                  ; x = x + (x hi/256 * Q)
 239+ 8D74 7C                                   ld      a,h
 240+ 8D75 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 241+ 8D77                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $70, ResetStar
 241+ 8D77 FE 70       >                        cp     $70
 241+ 8D79 D2 AA 8E    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 242+ 8D7C FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl                           ;
 242+ 8D80 74 01
 243+ 8D82 FD 6E 02 FD  .YEquYPlusYhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; hl  = y
 243+ 8D86 66 03
 244+ 8D88 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 245+ 8D89 E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 246+ 8D8B 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(y hi)
 247+ 8D8C DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 248+ 8D8E ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(y hi) * Q
 249+ 8D90 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 250+ 8D91 E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 251+ 8D93 B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 252+ 8D94 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 253+ 8D95 CD C4 8C                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned                  ; y = y + (x hi/256 * Q)
 254+ 8D98 7C                                   ld      a,h
 255+ 8D99 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 256+ 8D9B                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60, ResetStar
 256+ 8D9B FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 256+ 8D9D D2 AA 8E    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 257+ 8DA0 7C                                   ld      a,h
 258+ 8DA1 E6 80                                and     $80
 259+ 8DA3 20 06                                jr      nz,.NoSecondCheck
 260+ 8DA5 7C                                   ld      a,h
 261+ 8DA6                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $20, ResetStar
 261+ 8DA6 FE 20       >                        cp     $20
 261+ 8DA8 D2 AA 8E    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 262+ 8DAB FD 75 02 FD  .NoSecondCheck:         ld      (iy+2),hl                           ;
 262+ 8DAF 74 03
 263+ 8DB1              ; Now roll
 264+ 8DB1              ;  6. x = x - alpha * y / 256
 265+ 8DB1 2A DE 93     .XRoll:                 ld      hl,(ALP1)                           ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 266+ 8DB4 7D                                   ld      a,l
 267+ 8DB5 FE 00                                cp      0
 268+ 8DB7 28 4C                                jr      z,.NoRoll                           ; don;t roll if magnitude is 0
 269+ 8DB9                                      ;break
 270+ 8DB9                                      ;ld      a,$80
 271+ 8DB9                                      ;xor     l                                   ; l = flipped sign as we are rotating stars not us
 272+ 8DB9 E5                                   push    hl
 273+ 8DBA 7C                                   ld      a,h
 274+ 8DBB E6 80                                and     $80
 275+ 8DBD 4F           .rxSaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,a                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 276+ 8DBE 55           .rxDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 277+ 8DBF FD 7E 03                             ld      a,(iy+3)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 278+ 8DC2 5F                                   ld      e,a
 279+ 8DC3 E6 80                                and     $80
 280+ 8DC5 47           .rxBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 281+ 8DC6 7B           .rxEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e
 282+ 8DC7 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 283+ 8DC9 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 284+ 8DCA ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 285+ 8DCC 79                                   ld      a,c
 286+ 8DCD A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 287+ 8DCE B2                                   or      d
 288+ 8DCF 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 289+ 8DD0 FD 6E 00 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 289+ 8DD4 66 01
 290+ 8DD6 CD 83 8C                             call    StarsSUBHLDESigned                  ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 291+ 8DD9 FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl
 291+ 8DDD 74 01
 292+ 8DDF              ;  5. y = y + alpha * x / 256
 293+ 8DDF              .YRoll:                 ;break
 294+ 8DDF E1                                   pop     hl                                  ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 295+ 8DE0 7C                                   ld      a,h
 296+ 8DE1 E6 80                                and     $80
 297+ 8DE3 4F           .rySaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,a                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 298+ 8DE4 55           .ryDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 299+ 8DE5 FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 300+ 8DE8 5F                                   ld      e,a
 301+ 8DE9 E6 80                                and     $80
 302+ 8DEB 47           .ryBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 303+ 8DEC 7B           .ryEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e
 304+ 8DED E6 7F                                and     $7F
 305+ 8DEF 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 306+ 8DF0 ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 307+ 8DF2 79                                   ld      a,c
 308+ 8DF3 A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 309+ 8DF4 B2                                   or      d
 310+ 8DF5 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 311+ 8DF6 FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 311+ 8DFA 66 03
 312+ 8DFC CD C4 8C                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned                  ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 313+ 8DFF FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 313+ 8E03 74 03
 314+ 8E05 3A D0 93     .NoRoll:                ld      a,(BET1)
 315+ 8E08 FE 00                                cp      0
 316+ 8E0A 28 22                                jr      z,.NoPitch
 317+ 8E0C              ;  8. y = y - beta * 256
 318+ 8E0C 57           .YPitch:                ld      d,a                                 ; d = BET1
 319+ 8E0D FD 7E 02                             ld      a,(iy+2)
 320+ 8E10 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; e = Y HI
 321+ 8E11 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de = BET1 * YHi so now D = BETA & YHI / 256
 322+ 8E13 5F                                   ld      e,a
 323+ 8E14 ED 30                                mul                                         ; so now de = (BETA & Yhi) ^ 2
 324+ 8E16                                      ShiftDELeft1                                ; de = 2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2)
 324+ 8E16 CB 23       >			   sla e
 324+ 8E18 CB 12       >			   rl  d
 325+ 8E1A 3A D2 93                             ld      a,(BET2FLIP)                        ; get inverted Sign
 326+ 8E1D B2                                   or      d
 327+ 8E1E 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = - (2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2))
 328+ 8E1F FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)
 328+ 8E23 66 03
 329+ 8E25 CD C4 8C                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned
 330+ 8E28 FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 330+ 8E2C 74 03
 331+ 8E2E              ; now work out screen pos
 332+ 8E2E              ; Note two optimistations, write to layer 2 - we get a free removal via double buffer cls
 333+ 8E2E              ; read z dept than determine hw many pixesl to plot, e.g. 1,2,3,4
 334+ 8E2E              ;        pop     de
 335+ 8E2E               ;       call    ProjectStarXToScreen
 336+ 8E2E                                      ;pop     de
 337+ 8E2E              .NoPitch:
 338+ 8E2E FD 7E 01     .ProjectStar:           ld      a,(iy+1)
 339+ 8E31 6F                                   ld      l,a
 340+ 8E32 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 341+ 8E34                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegXPt
 341+ 8E34 CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 341+ 8E36 C2 3F 8E    >                        jp      nz,StarNegXPt
 342+ 8E39 C6 80                                add     a,$80
 343+ 8E3B 4F                                   ld      c,a
 344+ 8E3C C3 44 8E                             jp      StarDoneX
 345+ 8E3F 47           StarNegXPt:             ld      b,a
 346+ 8E40 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 347+ 8E42 90                                   sub     b
 348+ 8E43 4F                                   ld      c,a
 349+ 8E44 FD 7E 03     StarDoneX:              ld      a,(iy+3)
 350+ 8E47 6F                                   ld      l,a
 351+ 8E48 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 352+ 8E4A                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegYPt
 352+ 8E4A CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 352+ 8E4C C2 55 8E    >                        jp      nz,StarNegYPt
 353+ 8E4F C6 60                                add     a,$60
 354+ 8E51 47                                   ld      b,a
 355+ 8E52 C3 5A 8E                             jp      StarDoneY
 356+ 8E55 47           StarNegYPt:             ld      b,a
 357+ 8E56 3E 60                                ld      a,$60
 358+ 8E58 90                                   sub     b
 359+ 8E59 47                                   ld      b,a
 360+ 8E5A 3E FC        StarDoneY:              ld      a,$FC
 361+ 8E5C C5                                   push    bc
 362+ 8E5D              .DrawStar:              MMUSelectLayer2
 362+ 8E5D ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 363+ 8E61 CD FF E0                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 364+ 8E64 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 365+ 8E67 C1                                   pop    bc
 366+ 8E68                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60,EndofStarsLoop
 366+ 8E68 FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 366+ 8E6A D2 9A 8E    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 367+ 8E6D 3E D8                                ld      a,$D8
 368+ 8E6F 0C                                   inc     c
 369+ 8E70 C5                                   push    bc
 370+ 8E71                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 370+ 8E71 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 371+ 8E75 CD FF E0                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 372+ 8E78 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 373+ 8E7B C1                                   pop    bc
 374+ 8E7C                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $37,EndofStarsLoop
 374+ 8E7C FE 37       >                        cp     $37
 374+ 8E7E D2 9A 8E    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 375+ 8E81 3E B4                                ld      a,$B4
 376+ 8E83 04                                   inc     b
 377+ 8E84 C5                                   push    bc
 378+ 8E85                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 378+ 8E85 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 379+ 8E89 CD FF E0                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 380+ 8E8C FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 381+ 8E8F C1                                   pop    bc
 382+ 8E90 3E B4                                ld      a,$B4
 383+ 8E92 0D                                   dec     c
 384+ 8E93                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 384+ 8E93 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 385+ 8E97 CD FF E0                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 386+ 8E9A C1           EndofStarsLoop:         pop     bc                                      ;  0
 387+ 8E9B FD E5                                push    iy                                      ; +1
 388+ 8E9D E1                                   pop     hl                                      ;  0
 389+ 8E9E ED 34 06 00                          add     hl,6
 390+ 8EA2 E5           NextStarLoop2:          push    hl                                      ; +1
 391+ 8EA3 FD E1                                pop     iy                                      ;  0
 392+ 8EA5 05                                   dec     b
 393+ 8EA6 C2 24 8D                             jp      nz,StarProcessLoop
 394+ 8EA9 C9                                   ret
 395+ 8EAA              ResetStar:              ;break
 396+ 8EAA                                      ;pop     de
 397+ 8EAA C1                                   pop     bc                                      ; 0
 398+ 8EAB 3A 37 95                             ld      a,(NumberOfStarsNOSTM)
 399+ 8EAE 90                                   sub     b
 400+ 8EAF 57                                   ld      d,a
 401+ 8EB0 1E 06                                ld      e,6
 402+ 8EB2 ED 30                                mul
 403+ 8EB4 21 84 96                             ld      hl,varDust
 404+ 8EB7 19                                   add     hl,de
 405+ 8EB8 CD FF 8B                             call    InitStarAtHL
 406+ 8EBB C3 A2 8E                             jp      NextStarLoop2
 407+ 8EBE              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 408+ 8EBE FD 4E 00     ProjectStarXToScreen:   ld      c,(iy+0)
 409+ 8EC1 FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)
 410+ 8EC4 6F                                   ld      l,a
 411+ 8EC5 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 412+ 8EC7 47                                   ld      b,a
 413+ 8EC8 CD BC A3                             call    DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 414+ 8ECB 7D                                   ld      a,l
 415+ 8ECC                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarXNegativePoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
 415+ 8ECC CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 415+ 8ECE C2 D9 8E    >                        jp      nz,StarXNegativePoint
 416+ 8ED1              ;StarXPositivePoint:									; x was positive result
 417+ 8ED1 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX						;
 418+ 8ED3 26 00                                ld          h,0
 419+ 8ED5 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = Screen Centre + X
 420+ 8ED6 C3 E0 8E                             jp          StarStoreXPoint
 421+ 8ED9              StarXNegativePoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
 422+ 8ED9 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX
 423+ 8EDB 26 00                                ld          h,0
 424+ 8EDD                                      ClearCarryFlag
 424+ 8EDD B7          >                    or a
 425+ 8EDE ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
 426+ 8EE0              StarStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 427+ 8EE0 7D                                   ld          a,l
 428+ 8EE1 32 DC 96                             ld          (varStarX),a
 429+ 8EE4 C9                                   ret
 430+ 8EE5
 431+ 8EE5 FD 46 02     ProjectStarYToScreen:   ld          b,(iy+2)
 432+ 8EE8 FD 7E 03                             ld          a,(iy+3)
 433+ 8EEB 6F                                   ld          l,a
 434+ 8EEC E6 7F                                and         $7F
 435+ 8EEE 47                                   ld          b,a
 436+ 8EEF CD BC A3                             call        DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 437+ 8EF2 7D                                   ld          a,l                                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
 438+ 8EF3                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
 438+ 8EF3 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 438+ 8EF5 C2 00 8F    >                        jp      nz,StarNegativeYPoint
 439+ 8EF8                                  ;StarPositiveYPoint:									; Y is positive so above the centre line

 441+ 8EFA                                      ClearCarryFlag
 441+ 8EFA B7          >                    or a

 443+ 8EFD C3 05 8F                             jp          StarStoreYPoint

 445+ 8F00 2E 60                                ld          l,ScreenCenterY

   1+ 8F0A              JumpIfObjectIsPlanet:   MACRO target
   2+ 8F0A ~                                    ld a,(UbnkHullCopy)
   3+ 8F0A ~                                    bit 7,a
   4+ 8F0A ~                                    jp  nz,target

   7+ 8F0A              SetMaxVisibility:       MACRO
   8+ 8F0A ~                                    ld		a,MaxVisibility					; max visibility                                               ;;;; default max visibility
   9+ 8F0A ~                                    ld		(LastNormalVisible),a			; XX4                                                          ;;;;
  10+ 8F0A                                      ENDM
  11+ 8F0A
  12+ 8F0A              JumpIfObjectOutsideFov: MACRO target
  13+ 8F0A ~            LL10CheckXInFoV:
  14+ 8F0A ~                                    ld		hl, (INWKxlo)                   ; compare inkwk to to inwk z                                      ;    else
  15+ 8F0A ~                                    ld		de, (INWKzlo)                   ; we can compare as ABS given + or - extreems will be out of view ;         .
  16+ 8F0A ~                                    or		a							    ; clear carry flag for sbc                                        ;         .
  17+ 8F0A ~                                    sbc		hl,de                           ; FOV is 90degrees                                                ;         .
  18+ 8F0A ~                                    bit     7,h
  19+ 8F0A ~                                    jp      z,target                        ; was the result -ve i.e. hl > de?  x > z so outside FoV                                                                          ;         .
  20+ 8F0A ~            LL10CheckYInFoV:
  21+ 8F0A ~                                    ld		hl, (INWKyLo)                                                                                     ;         .
  22+ 8F0A ~                                    or		a							    ; clear carry flag                                                ;         .
  23+ 8F0A ~                                    sbc		hl,de                           ; and test y axis, FOV is 90degrees                               ;         .
  24+ 8F0A ~                                    bit     7,h
  25+ 8F0A ~                                    jp      z,target                        ; was the result -ve i.e. hl > de?  x > z so outside FoV                                                                          ;         .
  26+ 8F0A                                      ENDM
  27+ 8F0A
  28+ 8F0A              LL10AddGunNode:         MACRO

  38+ 8F0A ~                                    ld      (hl),a                          ;
  39+ 8F0A                                      ENDM

  90+ 8F8F              LL10CloseEnoughToDraw:

  98+ 8F9B              ;    Note the use of hop for jump/branch instrunction Rather than hop being calc logic
  99+ 8F9B              ;    The original did a bransh on positive but 3 shift right logicalks means bit 7 can never be set

   8+ 8FCF              SHPTOnScreenTest:
   9+ 8FCF 2A 49 94     	ld		hl,(varK3)						; get X Y ccords from K3 and K4
  10+ 8FD2 ED 5B 4F 94  	ld		de,(varK4)

  12+ 8FD7 B2           	or		d								;
  13+ 8FD8 20 27        	jr		nz,SHPTFinishup					; quick test to see if K3 or K4 hi are populated , if they are its too big (or negative coord)
  14+ 8FDA 7B           	ld		a,e								; k4 or Y lo
  15+ 8FDB              	JumpIfAGTENusng ViewHeight,SHPTFinishup	; off view port?
  15+ 8FDB FE 80       >                        cp     ViewHeight

  16+ 8FE0              SHPTInjectFalseLine:						; it will always be 1 line only

  19+ 8FE5 3E 04        	ld		a,4
  20+ 8FE7 32 F4 C2     	ld		(UbnkLineArrayLen),a

  28+ 8FF3 23           	inc		hl

  39+ 9004 E6 F7            and     $F7                             ;  clear bit3

  41+ 9009 C9               ret                                     ; now it will return to the caller of

  10++9012 A7          >                    and a
  10++9013 C8          >                    ret    z
  11++9014 FD 67                                ld		iyh,a			                ; number of lines still to draw
  12++9016 21 02 C2                             ld		hl,UbnkLineArray
  13++9019              ;LL27:                                       ; counter Y, Draw clipped lines in XX19 ship lines heap
  14++9019 4E           DrawXX19ClippedLines:   ld      c,(hl)                          ; (XX19),Y c = varX1
  15++901A 23                                   inc     hl
  16++901B 46                                   ld      b,(hl)                          ; bc = point1 Y,X
  17++901C 23                                   inc     hl
  18++901D              ;;DEBUGTEST        push bc
  19++901D              ;;DEBUGTEST        push hl
  20++901D              ;;DEBUGTEST        push de
  21++901D              ;;DEBUGTEST        ld  a,$3F
  22++901D              ;;DEBUGTEST        MMUSelectLayer2
  23++901D              ;;DEBUGTEST        call    l2_plot_pixel
  24++901D              ;;DEBUGTEST        pop de
  25++901D              ;;DEBUGTEST        pop hl
  26++901D              ;;DEBUGTEST        pop bc
  27++901D 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)                          ; c = varX1
  28++901E 23                                   inc     hl
  29++901F 56                                   ld      d,(hl)                          ; de = point2 Y,X
  30++9020              ;;DEBUGTEST       push bc
  31++9020              ;;DEBUGTEST       push hl
  32++9020              ;;DEBUGTEST       push de
  33++9020              ;;DEBUGTEST       push de
  34++9020              ;;DEBUGTEST       pop  bc
  35++9020              ;;DEBUGTEST       ld  a,$3F
  36++9020              ;;DEBUGTEST       MMUSelectLayer2
  37++9020              ;;DEBUGTEST       call    l2_plot_pixel
  38++9020              ;;DEBUGTEST       pop de
  39++9020              ;;DEBUGTEST       pop hl
  40++9020              ;;DEBUGTEST       pop bc
  41++9020 23                                   inc     hl
  42++9021 E5                                   push	hl
  43++9022 FD E5                                push    iy
  44++9024 60                                   ld      h,b
  45++9025 69                                   ld      l,c
  46++9026                ;  call    l2_draw_any_line                ; call version of LOIN that used BCDE
  47++9026 FD 7D                                ld		a,iyl							; get colour back before calling line draw
  48++9028                                      MMUSelectLayer2
  48++9028 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
  49++902C CD EC E8                             call    LineHLtoDE
  50++902F FD E1                                pop     iy
  51++9031 E1                                   pop	    hl
  52++9032 FD 25                                dec     iyh
  53++9034 20 E3                                jr		nz,DrawXX19ClippedLines
  54++9036 C9                                   ret                                     ; --- Wireframe end  \ LL118-1
  55++9037

 900  9037                  include "./ModelRender/drawforwards-LL17.asm"
# file opened: ./ModelRender/drawforwards-LL17.asm
   1+ 9037              SetLastFaceVisible: MACRO
   2+ 9037 ~                                ld      a,$FF                       ; last normal is always visible                                                         ;;;
   3+ 9037 ~                                ld      (UbnkFaceVisArray+15),a     ; XX2+15                                                                                ;;;
   4+ 9037                                  ENDM
   5+ 9037
   6+ 9037 3E FF        SetLastFaceVisCall: ld      a,$FF
   7+ 9039 32 B3 C0                         ld      (UbnkFaceVisArray+15),a
   8+ 903C C9                               ret
   9+ 903D
  10+ 903D              CheckIfExplodingCall:
  11+ 903D              ; DEBUG TODO turn into MACRO later
  12+ 903D              ; Sets Z flag to true if only some faces are visible
  13+ 903D              ; Clears Z flag if exploding so all faces should be rendered
  14+ 903D 3A 2B C0             ld      a,(UBnkexplDsp)                 ; INWK+31                                                                               ;;; If bit 5 of exploding state is clear
  15+ 9040              ;;DEBUG
  16+ 9040 F6 FF                or      $FF ; force bit 5 set so exploding
  17+ 9042 32 2B C0             ld      (UBnkexplDsp),a
  18+ 9045              ;;DEBUG
  19+ 9045 4F                   ld      c,a                         ; save explDsp into c                                                                   ;;;
  20+ 9046 E6 20                and     $20                         ; mask bit5 exploding                                                                   ;;;
  21+ 9048 C9                   ret
  22+ 9049
  23+ 9049
  24+ 9049              DrawForwardsIXL:
  25+ 9049              DrawForwards:
  26+ 9049              LL17:                                       ; draw Wireframe (including nodes exploding)                                            ;;; LL17 draw Wireframe
  27+ 9049              ; Copy the three orientation vectors into XX16
  28+ 9049 CD C1 CF     LL15:   call    CopyRotmatToTransMat        ; Copy Ship rotation to XX16                                                                                          ;;; load object position to camera matrix XX16 			::LL91 (ish)
  29+ 904C              ;;;;LL21:   call    NormaliseTransMat       ; Normalise XX16
  30+ 904C CD 77 D2     LL91lc: call    LoadCraftToCamera           ; Load Ship Coords to XX18
  31+ 904F              ; ......................................................                                                                            ;;;
  32+ 904F              LastNormalAlwaysVisible:
  33+ 904F CD 37 90             call    SetLastFaceVisCall          ; DEBUG TODO revert back to MACRO later                                                                                                          ;;; Set last Normal to visible FF regarless
  34+ 9052              ; HEre original does LDY 12
  35+ 9052              ; ......................................................                                                                            ;;; (Originally loaded faces count here and stored in B, but will remove to simplify code)
  36+ 9052              CheckIfExplodingState:
  37+ 9052 CD 3D 90             call    CheckIfExplodingCall
  38+ 9055 28 0C                jr      z,CullBackFaces             ; EE29 no, only Some visible                                                            ;;;    Goto EE29 - Only some faces visible
  39+ 9057              ; ......................................................                                                                            ;;; else
  40+ 9057              ItIsExploding:
  41+ 9057              MakeAllFacesVisible:                                                                                                                        ;;;    Set all faces in XX0 visible
  42+ 9057 CD DD D0             call    SetAllFacesVisible          ; code point EE30                                                                      ;;;
  43+ 905A 06 00                ld      b,0                         ; X = 0                                                                                 ;;;
  44+ 905C                      ldWriteZero LastNormalVisible       ; XX4  \ visibility                                                                     ;;;    XX4 visibility = 0
  44+ 905C AF          >               xor      a
  44+ 905D 32 B8 93    >               ld       (LastNormalVisible),a
  45+ 9060              LL41:                                       ; visibilities now set in XX2,X Transpose matrix.                                       ;;;
  46+ 9060 C3 66 90             jp      TransposeMatrix             ; LL42 \ jump to transpose matrix and onwards                                           ;;;    goto LL42
  47+ 9063              ; ......................................................                                                                            ;;;
  48+ 9063              CullBackFaces:
  49+ 9063              EE29Entry:
  50+ 9063 CD 66 D5             call    CullV2
  51+ 9066              ;-- All normals' visibilities now set in XX2,X                                                                                      ;;;
  52+ 9066              TransposeMatrix:
  53+ 9066              LL42:	                                    ; DO nodeX-Ycoords their comment  \  TrnspMat                                           ;;; ......................................................
  54+ 9066 CD 44 D1             call    InverseXX16
  55+ 9069
  56+ 9069
  57+ 9069 CD AF DC             call    ProcessNodes                ; Loop through and determine visibility based on faces and position
  58+ 906C              DrawResults:
  59+ 906C CD 81 DD             call    PrepLines                   ; LL72, process lines and clip
  60+ 906F CD 0B 90             call    DrawLines                   ; Need to plot all lines
  61+ 9072 C9                   ret
  62+ 9073
# file closed: ./ModelRender/drawforwards-LL17.asm

 902  9073                  INCLUDE	"./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
   1+ 9073
   2+ 9073 00           memfillvalue		DB 0
   3+ 9074 83 C3 C7 CB  memfill        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   3+ 9078 7D
   4+ 9079 73 90        memfill_astrt  		DW memfillvalue
   5+ 907B 00 40        memfill_length 		DB $00,$40
   6+ 907D 24 10 AD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1FIXED_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   7+ 9080 00 00        memfill_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   8+ 9082 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   9+ 9086              memfill_cmd_len	  	EQU $ - memfill
  10+ 9086
  11+ 9086              memfill_dma:
  12+ 9086              ; "memfill_dma, hl = address to fill, a = value, de = length"
  13+ 9086              .set_fill_value:
  14+ 9086 32 73 90     	ld 		(memfillvalue),a
  15+ 9089              .set_target:
  16+ 9089 22 80 90     	ld		(memfill_bstrt),hl
  17+ 908C              .set_length:
  18+ 908C ED 53 7B 90  	ld		(memfill_length),de
  19+ 9090              .write_dma:
  20+ 9090 21 74 90     	ld 		hl, memfill
  21+ 9093 06 12        	ld 		b, memfill_cmd_len
  22+ 9095 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  23+ 9097 ED B3        	otir
  24+ 9099 C9           	ret
  25+ 909A
# file closed: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
 903  909A                  INCLUDE	"./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm
   1+ 909A
   2+ 909A 83 C3 C7 CB  memcopy        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   2+ 909E 7D
   3+ 909F 00 00        memcopy_astrt  		DB $00,$00
   4+ 90A1 00 40        memcopy_length 		DB $00,$40
   5+ 90A3 14 10 AD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   6+ 90A6 00 00        memcopy_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   7+ 90A8 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   8+ 90AC              memcopy_cmd_len	  	equ $ - memcopy
   9+ 90AC
  10+ 90AC              memcopy_dma:
  11+ 90AC              ; "memcopy_dma, hl = target address de = source address to copy, bc = length"
  12+ 90AC              .set_target:
  13+ 90AC 22 A6 90     	ld		(memcopy_bstrt),hl
  14+ 90AF              .set_source:
  15+ 90AF ED 53 9F 90  	ld		(memcopy_astrt),de
  16+ 90B3              .set_length:
  17+ 90B3 ED 43 A1 90  	ld		(memcopy_length),bc
  18+ 90B7              .write_dma:
  19+ 90B7 21 9A 90     	ld 		hl, memcopy
  20+ 90BA 06 12        	ld 		b, memcopy_cmd_len
  21+ 90BC 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  22+ 90BE ED B3        	otir
  23+ 90C0 C9           	ret
  24+ 90C1
# file closed: ./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm

 179+ 90E9 00 00 00...  RawKeys					DS	8
 180+ 90F1 FE FE FE FD  KeyAddrTab				DW	$FEFE, $FDFE, $FBFE, $F7FE, $EFFE, $DFFE, $BFFE, $7FFE
 180+ 90F5 FE FB FE F7
 180+ 90F9 FE EF FE DF
 180+ 90FD FE BF FE 7F
 181+ 9101              ; Now keyboard map lists each game key and the corresponding address in the Keys table to get the value. This way redefining keys is just a case
 182+ 9101              ; of updating this table with the respective location to look up
 183+ 9101              ; key list sequence is in table above
 184+ 9101 D0 90 D1 90  KeyboardMap             DW  Keys+KeyCode_Front        ,Keys+KeyCode_Aft          ,Keys+KeyCode_Left         ,Keys+KeyCode_Right        ,Keys+KeyCode_RollLeft
 184+ 9105 D2 90 D3 90
 184+ 9109 DB 90
 185+ 910B DA 90 CB 90                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_RollRight    ,Keys+KeyCode_Dive         ,Keys+KeyCode_Climb        ,Keys+KeyCode_Accellerate  ,Keys+KeyCode_Decellerate
 185+ 910F C6 90 CC 90
 185+ 9113 C7 90
 186+ 9115 E4 90 CF 90                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_FireLaser    ,Keys+KeyCode_TargetMissle ,Keys+KeyCode_FireMissile  ,Keys+KeyCode_UnarmMissile ,Keys+KeyCode_ECM
 186+ 9119 C9 90 CE 90
 186+ 911D CD 90
 187+ 911F DD 90 C1 90                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_EnergyBomb   ,Keys+KeyCode_EscapePod    ,Keys+KeyCode_DockingComp  ,Keys+KeyCode_Hyperspace   ,Keys+KeyCode_Distance
 187+ 9123 E7 90 E3 90
 187+ 9127 E2 90
 188+ 9129 CA 90 E0 90                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_HomeCursor   ,Keys+KeyCode_Launch       ,Keys+KeyCode_BuyCargo     ,Keys+KeyCode_SellCargo    ,Keys+KeyCode_Equip

 245+ 9179              MIsKeyPressed:      MACRO   keyaddress, misstarget
 246+ 9179 ~                                ld      hl,(keyaddress)
 247+ 9179 ~                                ld      a,(hl)
 248+ 9179 ~                                IfAIsZeroGoto   misstarget
 249+ 9179                                  ENDM
 250+ 9179
 251+ 9179 21 C1 90     init_keyboard:      ld		hl,Keys
 252+ 917C 11 28 00                         ld		de, c_KeyBoardLen
 253+ 917F 3E 00                            ld		a,0
 254+ 9181 CD 86 90                         call	memfill_dma
 255+ 9184 C9                               ret
 256+ 9185
 257+ 9185 21 E9 90     scan_keyboard:      ld		hl,RawKeys
 258+ 9188 11 F1 90                         ld		de,KeyAddrTab
 259+ 918B AF                               xor		a
 260+ 918C FD 2E 08                         ld		iyl,8
 261+ 918F DD 21 C1 90                      ld      ix,Keys
 262+ 9193 1A           .PortReadLoop:      ld		a,(de)							; Set up BC as port to read
 263+ 9194 4F                               ld		c,a
 264+ 9195 13                               inc		de
 265+ 9196 1A                               ld      a,(de)
 266+ 9197 47                               ld		b,a
 267+ 9198 13                               inc		de
 268+ 9199 ED 78                            in		a,(c)							; read port to a
 269+ 919B 77                               ld		(hl),a							; set raw keys to value
 270+ 919C 23                               inc		hl								; and ready for next element
 271+ 919D 06 05                            ld		b,5								; loop all bits (there are only 5 keys to a group)
 272+ 919F CB 47        .ProcessBitsLoop:   bit		0,a								; is bit set
 273+ 91A1 28 07                            jr      z,.SetKeyPressed
 274+ 91A3 08                               ex      af,af'
 275+ 91A4 AF                               xor     a
 276+ 91A5 C3 B1 91                         jp      .SetKey
 277+ 91A8 20 0B                            jr		nz,.SkipKeySet
 278+ 91AA 08           .SetKeyPressed:	    ex		af,af'
 279+ 91AB DD 7E 00                         ld      a,(ix+0)
 280+ 91AE 3C                               inc     a
 281+ 91AF E6 03                            and     $3                              ; so bit 0 set is pressed, bit 1 set is repeat pressed, i.e. 0 = no, 1 = yes 2,3 = held
 282+ 91B1 DD 77 00     .SetKey:            ld		(ix+0),a							; Key Pressed
 283+ 91B4 08                               ex		af,af'
 284+ 91B5 DD 23        .SkipKeySet:	    inc		ix								; move to next key
 285+ 91B7 CB 3F                            srl		a								; move next key into bit 0
 286+ 91B9 10 E4                            djnz	.ProcessBitsLoop				; Process all key group bits
 287+ 91BB FD 2D                            dec     iyl
 288+ 91BD 20 D4                            jr      nz,.PortReadLoop				; Read next input port
 289+ 91BF C9                               ret
 290+ 91C0
 291+ 91C0              GetKeyStateAddressDE: MACRO
 292+ 91C0 ~                                  ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 293+ 91C0 ~                                  add     hl,a
 294+ 91C0 ~                                  ld      a,(hl)
 295+ 91C0 ~                                  ld      e,a
 296+ 91C0 ~                                  inc     hl
 297+ 91C0 ~                                  ld      a,(hl)
 298+ 91C0 ~                                  ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 299+ 91C0                                    ENDM
 300+ 91C0
 301+ 91C0
 302+ 91C0              ; call with a = c_Pressed key, will then read mapping
 303+ 91C0              wait_for_key_a_press:       GetKeyStateAddressDE
 303+ 91C0 21 01 91    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 303+ 91C3 ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 303+ 91C5 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 303+ 91C6 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 303+ 91C7 23          >                      inc     hl
 303+ 91C8 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 303+ 91C9 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 304+ 91CA D5                                       push    de
 305+ 91CB CD 85 91     wait_for_key_press_loop:    call    scan_keyboard
 306+ 91CE E1                                       pop     hl                              ; get key address into hl
 307+ 91CF E5                                       push    hl
 308+ 91D0 7E                                       ld      a,(hl)
 309+ 91D1                                          JumpIfANENusng  1,wait_for_key_press_loop         ; will also loop if held down when entering this routine
 309+ 91D1 FE 01       >                cp     1
 309+ 91D3 C2 CB 91    >                jp      nz,wait_for_key_press_loop
 310+ 91D6 E1                                       pop     hl                              ; tidy up rogue push, less t states than detecting if we want to push or not
 311+ 91D7 C9                                       ret
 312+ 91D8
 313+ 91D8              wait_for_key_a_held:        GetKeyStateAddressDE
 313+ 91D8 21 01 91    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 313+ 91DB ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 313+ 91DD 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 313+ 91DE 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 313+ 91DF 23          >                      inc     hl
 313+ 91E0 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 313+ 91E1 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 314+ 91E2 D5                                       push    de
 315+ 91E3 CD 85 91     wait_for_key_a_held_loop:   call    scan_keyboard
 316+ 91E6 E1                                       pop     hl
 317+ 91E7 E5                                       push    hl
 318+ 91E8 7E                                       ld      a,(hl)
 319+ 91E9                                          JumpIfALTNusng  2,wait_for_key_a_held_loop
 319+ 91E9 FE 02       >                        cp      2
 319+ 91EB DA E3 91    >                        jp		c, wait_for_key_a_held_loop
 320+ 91EE E1                                       pop     hl
 321+ 91EF C9                                       ret
 322+ 91F0
 323+ 91F0              get_key_a_state:            GetKeyStateAddressDE                 ; reads a mapped key and sets a to key staus, e.g. 0 1 or >=2 DOES NOT SCAN KEYBOARD
 323+ 91F0 21 01 91    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 323+ 91F3 ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 323+ 91F5 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 323+ 91F6 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 323+ 91F7 23          >                      inc     hl
 323+ 91F8 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 323+ 91F9 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 324+ 91FA EB                                       ex      de,hl
 325+ 91FB 7E                                       ld      a,(hl)                        ; a = keystate
 326+ 91FC C9                                       ret
 327+ 91FD
 328+ 91FD              force_key_press:            GetKeyStateAddressDE
 328+ 91FD 21 01 91    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 328+ 9200 ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 328+ 9202 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 328+ 9203 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 328+ 9204 23          >                      inc     hl
 328+ 9205 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 328+ 9206 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 329+ 9207 EB                                       ex      de,hl
 330+ 9208 3E 01                                    ld      a,1
 331+ 920A 77                                       ld      (hl),a
 332+ 920B C9                                       ret
 333+ 920C
 334+ 920C              ; returns z is set if c_ key is pressed
 335+ 920C              is_key_pressed:             GetKeyStateAddressDE
 335+ 920C 21 01 91    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 335+ 920F ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 335+ 9211 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 335+ 9212 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 335+ 9213 23          >                      inc     hl
 335+ 9214 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 335+ 9215 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 336+ 9216 EB                                       ex      de,hl
 337+ 9217 7E                                       ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 338+ 9218 FE 01                                    cp      1
 339+ 921A C9                                       ret
 340+ 921B
 341+ 921B              ; returns z is set if c_ key is held
 342+ 921B              is_key_held:                GetKeyStateAddressDE
 342+ 921B 21 01 91    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 342+ 921E ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 342+ 9220 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 342+ 9221 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 342+ 9222 23          >                      inc     hl
 342+ 9223 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 342+ 9224 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 343+ 9225 EB                                       ex      de,hl
 344+ 9226 7E                                       ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 345+ 9227 E6 02                                    and     2                               ; clear out bit 1 which elimiates state 3, so it can now be 2 (held) or 0 (not pressed or one off)
 346+ 9229 FE 02                                    cp      2
 347+ 922B C9                                       ret
 348+ 922C
 349+ 922C              is_any_key_pressed:
 350+ 922C 21 C1 90         ld      hl,Keys
 351+ 922F 06 28            ld      b,40
 352+ 9231 0E 00            ld      c,0
 353+ 9233              .KeyReadLoop:
 354+ 9233 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 355+ 9234 FE 01            cp      1
 356+ 9236 CA 40 92         jp      z,.KeyPressed
 357+ 9239 23               inc     hl
 358+ 923A 0C               inc     c
 359+ 923B 10 F6            djnz    .KeyReadLoop
 360+ 923D 3E FF            ld      a,$FF
 361+ 923F C9               ret
 362+ 9240              .KeyPressed:
 363+ 9240 79               ld      a,c
 364+ 9241 C9               ret
 365+ 9242
 366+ 9242              is_any_key_held:
 367+ 9242 21 C1 90         ld      hl,Keys
 368+ 9245 06 28            ld      b,40
 369+ 9247 0E 00            ld      c,0
 370+ 9249              .KeyReadLoop:
 371+ 9249 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 372+ 924A E6 02            and     2                               ; clear out bit 1 which elimiates state 3, so it can now be 2 (held) or 0 (not pressed or one off)
 373+ 924C FE 02            cp      2
 374+ 924E CA 58 92         jp      z,.KeyPressed
 375+ 9251 23               inc     hl
 376+ 9252 0C               inc     c
 377+ 9253 10 F4            djnz    .KeyReadLoop
 378+ 9255 3E FF            ld      a,$FF
 379+ 9257 C9               ret
 380+ 9258              .KeyPressed:
 381+ 9258 79               ld      a,c
 382+ 9259 C9               ret
 383+ 925A
 384+ 925A
 385+ 925A 00 00 00...  InputString             DS  30              ; used for a 30 character input buffer
 386+ 9278 00                                   DB  0               ; end of string marker as a safety
 387+ 9279 00           InputCursor             DB  0
 388+ 927A 00           EnterPressed            DB  0               ; zero notpressed FF pressed
 389+ 927B 00           InputChanged            DB  0
 390+ 927C              InputLimit              EQU 20
 391+ 927C
 392+ 927C              keyboard_copy_input_to_de:
 393+ 927C 21 5A 92         ld      hl,InputString
 394+ 927F 3A 79 92         ld      a,(InputCursor)
 395+ 9282 FE 00            cp      0
 396+ 9284 28 05            jr      z,.NoString
 397+ 9286 4F               ld      c,a
 398+ 9287 06 00            ld      b,0
 399+ 9289 ED B0            ldir
 400+ 928B              .NoString
 401+ 928B 3E 00            ld      a,0
 402+ 928D 12               ld      (de),a
 403+ 928E C9               ret
 404+ 928F
 405+ 928F              initInputText:
 406+ 928F AF               xor     a
 407+ 9290 32 79 92         ld      (InputCursor),a
 408+ 9293 32 7A 92         ld      (EnterPressed),a
 409+ 9296 32 7B 92         ld      (InputChanged),a
 410+ 9299 21 5A 92         ld      hl,InputString
 411+ 929C 06 1E            ld      b,30
 412+ 929E              .wipeloop:
 413+ 929E 77               ld      (hl),a
 414+ 929F 23               inc     hl
 415+ 92A0 10 FC            djnz    .wipeloop
 416+ 92A2 C9               ret
 417+ 92A3
 418+ 92A3 AF           InputName:                  xor     a
 419+ 92A4 32 7B 92                                 ld      (InputChanged),a
 420+ 92A7 CD 2C 92                                 call    is_any_key_pressed
 421+ 92AA FE FF                                    cp      $FF
 422+ 92AC C8                                       ret     z
 423+ 92AD              .KeyPressed:
 424+ 92AD 4F               ld      c,a
 425+ 92AE 3A 79 92         ld      a,(InputCursor)                 ; No key so we can now look at if we are at the end of the buffer
 426+ 92B1 FE 14            cp      InputLimit                      ; move to variable later and then cp (hl)
 427+ 92B3 28 0B            jr      z,.DeleteOrEnterOnly            ;
 428+ 92B5 21 51 91         ld      hl,ASCII_Map
 429+ 92B8 79               ld      a,c
 430+ 92B9 ED 31            add     hl,a
 431+ 92BB 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 432+ 92BC FE 41            cp      "A"
 433+ 92BE 30 15            jr      nc,.AlphaPressed
 434+ 92C0              .DeleteOrEnterOnly                          ; CAPS and Symbol act as delete for now
 435+ 92C0 FE 30            cp      "0"                             ; if 0 was preseed check caps shift too
 436+ 92C2 28 3B            jr      z,.CheckShiftDelete             ; for now we will ignore the shift and just assume delete
 437+ 92C4 FE 3E            cp      ">"         ; ENTER
 438+ 92C6 28 24            jr      z,.EnterPressed
 439+ 92C8 FE 23            cp      "#"         ; CAPS
 440+ 92CA 28 33            jr      z,.CapsPressed
 441+ 92CC FE 5E            cp      "^"         ; SYMBOLSHIFT
 442+ 92CE 28 2F            jr      z,.SymbolPressed
 443+ 92D0 FE 20            cp      " "         ; space
 444+ 92D2 28 2B            jr      z,.SpacePressed
 445+ 92D4 C9               ret
 446+ 92D5              .AlphaPressed:
 447+ 92D5 47               ld      b,a
 448+ 92D6 3A 79 92         ld      a,(InputCursor)
 449+ 92D9 4F               ld      c,a
 450+ 92DA 21 5A 92         ld      hl,InputString
 451+ 92DD ED 31            add     hl,a
 452+ 92DF 78               ld      a,b
 453+ 92E0 70               ld      (hl),b
 454+ 92E1 79               ld      a,c
 455+ 92E2 21 79 92         ld      hl,InputCursor
 456+ 92E5 34               inc     (hl)
 457+ 92E6 3E FF            ld      a,$FF
 458+ 92E8 32 7B 92         ld      (InputChanged),a
 459+ 92EB C9               ret
 460+ 92EC              .EnterPressed:
 461+ 92EC 3A 79 92         ld      a,(InputCursor)
 462+ 92EF 3C               inc     a
 463+ 92F0 21 5A 92         ld      hl,InputString
 464+ 92F3 ED 31            add     hl,a
 465+ 92F5 AF               xor     a
 466+ 92F6 77               ld      (hl),a
 467+ 92F7 3D               dec     a
 468+ 92F8 32 7A 92         ld      (EnterPressed),a
 469+ 92FB 32 7B 92         ld      (InputChanged),a
 470+ 92FE C9               ret
 471+ 92FF              .CheckShiftDelete:
 472+ 92FF              .CapsPressed:                               ; act as a delete key for now
 473+ 92FF              .SymbolPressed:
 474+ 92FF              .SpacePressed:
 475+ 92FF 3A 79 92         ld      a,(InputCursor)
 476+ 9302 FE 00            cp      0
 477+ 9304 C8               ret     z
 478+ 9305 3D               dec     a
 479+ 9306 32 79 92         ld      (InputCursor),a
 480+ 9309 21 5A 92         ld      hl,InputString
 481+ 930C ED 31            add     hl,a
 482+ 930E AF               xor     a
 483+ 930F 77               ld      (hl),a
 484+ 9310 3E FF            ld      a,$FF
 485+ 9312 32 7B 92         ld      (InputChanged),a
 486+ 9315 C9               ret
 487+ 9316
 488+ 9316              MovementKeyTest:
 489+ 9316              ;DBG1:jp dbg1
 490+ 9316              ;dbx1:
 491+ 9316 AF               xor     a
 492+ 9317 32 2B 94         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 493+ 931A 3A 2D 94         ld      a,(MenuIdMax)
 494+ 931D E6 FC            and     $FC
 495+ 931F 20 26            jr      nz,CursorKeys
 496+ 9321              ClimbDiveKeys:
 497+ 9321 2A 0F 91         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Climb)
 498+ 9324 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 499+ 9325                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanDiveKey
 499+ 9325 A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 499+ 9326 CA 34 93    >				jp	z, ScanDiveKey
 500+ 9329 3A 2B 94         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 501+ 932C F6 80            or      $80
 502+ 932E 32 2B 94         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 503+ 9331 C3 6A 93         jp      ScanLeftKey
 504+ 9334              ScanDiveKey:
 505+ 9334 2A 0D 91         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Dive)
 506+ 9337 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 507+ 9338                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanLeftKey
 507+ 9338 A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 507+ 9339 CA 6A 93    >				jp	z, ScanLeftKey
 508+ 933C 3A 2B 94         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 509+ 933F F6 40            or      $40
 510+ 9341 32 2B 94         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 511+ 9344 C3 6A 93         jp      ScanLeftKey
 512+ 9347              CursorKeys:
 513+ 9347 2A 4B 91         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_CursorUp)
 514+ 934A 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 515+ 934B                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanCursorDownKey
 515+ 934B A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 515+ 934C CA 5A 93    >				jp	z, ScanCursorDownKey
 516+ 934F 3A 2B 94         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 517+ 9352 F6 80            or      $80
 518+ 9354 32 2B 94         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 519+ 9357 C3 6A 93         jp      ScanLeftKey
 520+ 935A              ScanCursorDownKey
 521+ 935A 2A 4D 91         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_CursorDown)
 522+ 935D 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 523+ 935E                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanLeftKey
 523+ 935E A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 523+ 935F CA 6A 93    >				jp	z, ScanLeftKey
 524+ 9362 3A 2B 94         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 525+ 9365 F6 40            or      $40
 526+ 9367 32 2B 94         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 527+ 936A              ScanLeftKey:
 528+ 936A 2A 09 91         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_RollLeft)
 529+ 936D 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 530+ 936E                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanRightKey
 530+ 936E A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 530+ 936F CA 7B 93    >				jp	z, ScanRightKey
 531+ 9372 3A 2B 94         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 532+ 9375 F6 20            or      $20
 533+ 9377 32 2B 94         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 534+ 937A C9               ret
 535+ 937B              ScanRightKey:
 536+ 937B 2A 0B 91         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_RollRight)
 537+ 937E 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 538+ 937F                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanHomeKey
 538+ 937F A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 538+ 9380 CA 8C 93    >				jp	z, ScanHomeKey
 539+ 9383 3A 2B 94         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 540+ 9386 F6 10            or      $10
 541+ 9388 32 2B 94         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 542+ 938B C9               ret
 543+ 938C              ScanHomeKey:
 544+ 938C 2A 29 91         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_HomeCursor)
 545+ 938F 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 546+ 9390                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanRecentreKey
 546+ 9390 A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 546+ 9391 CA 9D 93    >				jp	z, ScanRecentreKey
 547+ 9394 3A 2B 94         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 548+ 9397 F6 08            or      $08
 549+ 9399 32 2B 94         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 550+ 939C C9               ret
 551+ 939D              ScanRecentreKey:
 552+ 939D 2A 45 91         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Recentre)
 553+ 93A0 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 554+ 93A1                  ReturnIfAIsZero
 554+ 93A1 A7          >                    and a
 554+ 93A2 C8          >                    ret    z
 555+ 93A3 3A 2B 94         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 556+ 93A6 F6 04            or      $04
 557+ 93A8 32 2B 94         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 558+ 93AB C9               ret
 559+ 93AC
 560+ 93AC
# file closed: ./Hardware/keyboard.asm
