  49+ 93AC              ; Ship Data
  50+ 93AC              ;;;;	.XX21	\ -> &5600 \ Table of pointers to ships' data given to XX0
  51+ 93AC              ;;;;00 7F			 EQUW &7F00 \ type  1 is #MSL  Missile data on page off bottom of screen
  52+ 93AC              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  2 is #SST  Space Station, Coriolis or Dodo.
  53+ 93AC              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  3 is #ESC  Escape capsule
  54+ 93AC              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  4 is #PLT  Plate, alloys
  55+ 93AC              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  5 is #OIL  Cargo cannister
  56+ 93AC              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  6 is       Boulder
  57+ 93AC              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  7 is #AST  Asteroid
  58+ 93AC              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  8 is #SPL  Splinter, rock.
  59+ 93AC              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  9 is #SHU  Shuttle
  60+ 93AC              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 10 is       Transporter
  61+ 93AC              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 11 is #CYL  Cobra Mk III,  Boa
  62+ 93AC              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 12 is       Python
  63+ 93AC              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 13 is       Last of three traders
  64+ 93AC              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 14 is #ANA  Anaconda
  65+ 93AC              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 15 is #WRM  Worm with Anaconda
  66+ 93AC              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 16 is #COP  Viper
  67+ 93AC              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 17 is       First pirate
  68+ 93AC              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 18 is
  69+ 93AC              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 19 is #KRA  Krait small pirate
  70+ 93AC              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 20 is #ADA  Adder
  71+ 93AC              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 21 is
  72+ 93AC              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 22 is
  73+ 93AC              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 23 is
  74+ 93AC              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 24 is #CYL2 Last strong pirate
  75+ 93AC              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 25 is #ASP  Asp Mk II
  76+ 93AC              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 26 is #FER  Fer de Lance
  77+ 93AC              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 27 is
  78+ 93AC              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 28 is	Last of three bounty hunters
  79+ 93AC              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 29 is #THG  Thargoid
  80+ 93AC              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 30 is #TGL  Thargon
  81+ 93AC              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 31 is #CON  Constrictor
  82+ 93AC              ;;;;	.E%	\ -> &563E \ Hull NEWB bits are escpod, cop, inno, ?, pirate, angry, hunter, trader.
  83+ 93AC              ;;;;			\ NEWB examples
  84+ 93AC              ;;;;\ 21			EQUB &21    \ 0010 0001    9 Shuttle has no escape pod, inno, trader.
  85+ 93AC              ;;;;\ 61			EQUB &61    \ 0110 0001   10 Tansporter no escape pod, Cop, inno, trader.
  86+ 93AC              ;;;;\ A0			EQUB &A0    \ 1010 0000   11 Cobra has Escape pod, inno, not a trader.
  87+ 93AC              ;;;;\ C2			EQUB &C2    \ 1100 0010   16 Viper has Escape pod, Cop, hunter.
  88+ 93AC              ;;;;\ 8C			EQUB &8C    \ 1000 1100   19 Krait pirate has escape pod, is pirate and angry.
  89+ 93AC

 326+ 942E              											; Bit 4 Set  Status Screen      $10
 327+ 942E              											; Bit 3 Set  Display Inventory  $08
 328+ 942E                                                          ; Bit 2 Set  Planet Data        $04
 329+ 942E                                                          ; View bit combinations if the ones above not matched
 330+ 942E                                                          ; bits 1 0
 331+ 942E                                                          ;      1 1  Front view , i.e. $03
 332+ 942E                                                          ;      1 0  Aft View          $02
 333+ 942E                                                          ;      0 1  Left View         $01
 334+ 942E                                                          ;      0 0  Right view        $00
 335+ 942E              											; Bit 0 Set  Data On System
 336+ 942E              											; 0  Space View (Not a menu)

 344+ 9432              ;              FD = Setup open space and transition to not docked

 346+ 9432              ;              FB = Hyperspace complete

   1+ 976E AF           ClearSlotCount:         xor     a
   2+ 976F 21 96 94                             ld      hl,UniverseSlotCount
   3+ 9772 06 18                                ld      b, UniverseListSize * 2
   4+ 9774 77           .fillLoop:              ld      (hl),a
   5+ 9775 23                                   inc     hl
   6+ 9776 10 FC                                djnz    .fillLoop
   7+ 9778 C9                                   ret
   8+ 9779
   9+ 9779              ; Initialises all types to a count of 1 where there is an occupied universe slot
  10+ 9779              ; this needs expanding to cater for a missing type, find type and increment count (use cpir?)
  11+ 9779 CD 6E 97     CorrectSlotCount:       call    ClearSlotCount
  12+ 977C 21 96 94                             ld      hl,UniverseSlotCount
  13+ 977F 11 8A 94                             ld      de,UniverseSlotList
  14+ 9782 06 0C                                ld      b,UniverseListSize
  15+ 9784 1A           .fillLoop:              ld      a,(de)
  16+ 9785 FE FF                                cp      $FF
  17+ 9787 28 05                                jr      z,.SkipSlot
  18+ 9789 77           .CorrectSlot:           ld      (hl),a
  19+ 978A 23                                   inc     hl
  20+ 978B 36 01                                ld      (hl),1
  21+ 978D 23                                   inc     hl
  22+ 978E 13           .SkipSlot               inc     de
  23+ 978F 10 F3                                djnz    .fillLoop
  24+ 9791 C9                                   ret

  70+ 97CF 7E           .SearchLoop:            ld      a,(hl)
  71+ 97D0                                      JumpIfAEqNusng ShipTypeStation, .FoundSlot
  71+ 97D0 FE 02       >                cp     ShipTypeStation
  71+ 97D2 CA DB 97    >                jp      z,.FoundSlot
  72+ 97D5 0C                                   inc     c
  73+ 97D6 23                                   inc     hl
  74+ 97D7 10 F6                                djnz    .SearchLoop
  75+ 97D9                                      SetCarryFlag
  75+ 97D9 37          >                    scf
  76+ 97DA C9                                   ret
  77+ 97DB              .FoundSlot:             ClearCarryFlag
  77+ 97DB B7          >                    or a
  78+ 97DC C9                                   ret
  79+ 97DD
  80+ 97DD 21 8A 94     GetTypeAtSlotA:         ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  81+ 97E0 ED 31                                add     hl,a
  82+ 97E2 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
  83+ 97E3 C9                                   ret
  84+ 97E4
  85+ 97E4 CD C8 97     FindSpaceStationSlotInA:call    FindSpaceStationSlotInC
  85+ 97E7
  86+ 97E7 79                                   ld      a,c
  87+ 97E8 C9                                   ret
  88+ 97E9
  89+ 97E9
  90+ 97E9 21 8A 94     FindNextFreeSlotInC:    ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  91+ 97EC 06 0C                                ld      b, UniverseListSize
  92+ 97EE 0E 00                                ld      c, 0
  93+ 97F0 7E           .SearchLoop:            ld      a,(hl)
  94+ 97F1                                      JumpIfAEqNusng $FF, .FoundSlot
  94+ 97F1 FE FF       >                cp     $FF
  94+ 97F3 CA FC 97    >                jp      z,.FoundSlot
  95+ 97F6 0C                                   inc     c
  96+ 97F7 23                                   inc     hl
  97+ 97F8 10 F6                                djnz    .SearchLoop
  98+ 97FA                                      SetCarryFlag
  98+ 97FA 37          >                    scf
  99+ 97FB C9                                   ret
 100+ 97FC              .FoundSlot:             ClearCarryFlag
 100+ 97FC B7          >                    or a
 101+ 97FD C9                                   ret
 102+ 97FE
 103+ 97FE CD E9 97     FindNextFreeSlotInA:    call    FindNextFreeSlotInC
 104+ 9801 79                                   ld      a,c
 105+ 9802 C9                                   ret

 913  9861                  INCLUDE "./Variables/random_number.asm"
# file opened: ./Variables/random_number.asm
   1+ 9861              doRandom2:									; .DORND2	\ -> &3F85 \ Restricted for explosion dust.
   2+ 9861              doRND2:
   3+ 9861 A7           	and		a								; fast clear carry  leave bit0 of RAND+2 at 0.
   4+ 9862              doRandom:									;.DORND	\ -> &3F86 \ do random, new A, X.
   5+ 9862              ; "doRandom, Random Seed update, new value in A & B)"
   6+ 9862 3A BC 93     doRND:                  ld		a,(RandomSeed)					; Get Seed 0
   7+ 9865 CB 17                                rl		a								; Rotate L including carry
   8+ 9867 4F                                   ld		c,a								; c =  double lo
   9+ 9868 21 BE 93     .AddSeed2:              ld		hl,RandomSeed2
  10+ 986B 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)							; RAND+2
  11+ 986C 32 BC 93     .SaveAtoSeed:           ld		(RandomSeed),a					; and save RAND
  12+ 986F 08           .SaveBtoSeed2:          ex		af,af'
  13+ 9870 79                                   ld		a,c
  14+ 9871 32 BE 93                             ld		(RandomSeed2),a
  15+ 9874 08                                   ex		af,af'
  16+ 9875 3A BD 93                             ld		a,(RandomSeed1)
  17+ 9878 4F                                   ld		c,a								; C = Seed1
  18+ 9879 21 BF 93     .AddSeed3:              ld		hl,RandomSeed3
  19+ 987C 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)
  20+ 987D 32 BD 93                             ld		(RandomSeed1),a
  21+ 9880 08                                   ex		af,af'
  22+ 9881 79                                   ld		a,c
  23+ 9882 32 BF 93                             ld		(RandomSeed3),a
  24+ 9885 08                                   ex		af,af'
  25+ 9886 C9                                   ret
  26+ 9887
  27+ 9887              fillHeapRandom4Points:                      ; counter Y, 4 rnd bytes to edge heap
  28+ 9887 06 04        	ld		b,4
  29+ 9889 21 02 C2     	ld		hl,UbnkLineArray				; line data
  30+ 988C              FillRandom:                                 ; Writes random bytes hl = start address, b = nbr bytes to fill
  31+ 988C              EE55:
  32+ 988C CD 62 98     	call	doRND							; get random
  33+ 988F 77           	ld		(hl),a							; (XX19),Y
  34+ 9890 23           	inc		hl
  35+ 9891 10 F9        	djnz	FillRandom						; 3to6 = random bytes for seed
  36+ 9893 C9               ret
  37+ 9894
# file closed: ./Variables/random_number.asm

   1+ 9894 47 41 4C 41  GALAXYSEED DB "GALAXYSEED"
   1+ 9898 58 59 53 45
   1+ 989C 45 44
   2+ 989E 21 2B 95     copy_galaxy_to_system:  ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
   3+ 98A1 11 0D 94                             ld		de,SystemSeed
   4+ 98A4 ED A0        copy_seed:		        ldi
   5+ 98A6 ED A0                                ldi
   6+ 98A8 ED A0                                ldi
   7+ 98AA ED A0                                ldi
   8+ 98AC ED A0                                ldi
   9+ 98AE ED A0                                ldi
  10+ 98B0 C9                                   ret
  11+ 98B1
  12+ 98B1 21 0D 94     copy_system_to_galaxy:  ld		hl,SystemSeed
  13+ 98B4 11 2B 95                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  14+ 98B7 18 EB                                jr		copy_seed
  15+ 98B9
  16+ 98B9 21 2B 95     copy_galaxy_to_working: ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
  17+ 98BC 11 1F 95                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  18+ 98BF 18 E3                                jr		copy_seed
  19+ 98C1
  20+ 98C1 21 1F 95     copy_working_to_galaxy: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  21+ 98C4 11 2B 95                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  22+ 98C7 18 DB                                jr		copy_seed
  23+ 98C9
  24+ 98C9 21 1F 95     copy_working_to_system: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  25+ 98CC 11 0D 94                             ld		de,SystemSeed
  26+ 98CF 18 D3                                jr		copy_seed
  27+ 98D1
  28+ 98D1 21 0D 94     copy_system_to_working: ld		hl,SystemSeed
  29+ 98D4 11 1F 95                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  30+ 98D7 18 CB                                jr		copy_seed
  31+ 98D9
  32+ 98D9              next_system_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  33+ 98D9 CD DC 98     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  34+ 98DC              .NextStep:
  35+ 98DC CD DF 98     		call	process_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  36+ 98DF              process_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  37+ 98DF 3A 0D 94     		ld		a,(SystemSeed)				; QQ15
  38+ 98E2 B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  39+ 98E3 21 0F 94     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  40+ 98E6 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 + QQ152
  41+ 98E7 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo
  42+ 98E8 3A 0E 94     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)
  43+ 98EB 21 10 94     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  44+ 98EE 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  45+ 98EF 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  46+ 98F0 3A 0F 94     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+2)
  47+ 98F3 32 0D 94     		ld		(SystemSeed+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150
  48+ 98F6 3A 10 94     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)
  49+ 98F9 32 0E 94     		ld		(SystemSeed+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151
  50+ 98FC 3A 12 94     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+5)
  51+ 98FF 32 10 94     		ld		(SystemSeed+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153
  52+ 9902 3A 11 94     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+4)
  53+ 9905 32 0F 94     		ld		(SystemSeed+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152
  54+ 9908 B7           		or		a
  55+ 9909 78           		ld		a,b
  56+ 990A 21 0F 94     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  57+ 990D 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  58+ 990E 32 11 94     		ld		(SystemSeed+4),a
  59+ 9911 79           		ld		a,c
  60+ 9912 21 10 94     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  61+ 9915 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  62+ 9916 32 12 94     		ld		(SystemSeed+5),a
  63+ 9919 C9           		ret
  64+ 991A
  65+ 991A              next_working_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  66+ 991A CD 1D 99     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  67+ 991D              .NextStep:
  68+ 991D CD 20 99     		call	working_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  69+ 9920              working_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  70+ 9920              ; x = a + c
  71+ 9920 3A 1F 95     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds)			; QQ15
  72+ 9923 B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  73+ 9924 21 21 95     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2			; hl -> qq+2 [c]
  74+ 9927 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 [a]+ QQ15 [c]
  75+ 9928 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo [x]
  76+ 9929              ; y = b + d	+ carry
  77+ 9929 3A 20 95     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+1)          ; [b]
  78+ 992C 21 22 95     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 [d] we don't inc as it affects carry)
  79+ 992F 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  80+ 9930 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  81+ 9931 3A 21 95     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+2)
  82+ 9934 32 1F 95     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150 [a] = [c]
  83+ 9937 3A 22 95     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
  84+ 993A 32 20 95     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151 [b] = [d]
  85+ 993D 3A 24 95     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
  86+ 9940 32 22 95     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153 [d] = [f]
  87+ 9943 3A 23 95     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+4)
  88+ 9946 32 21 95     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152 [c] = [e]
  89+ 9949 B7           		or		a
  90+ 994A 78           		ld		a,b
  91+ 994B 21 21 95     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2		    ; hl -> qq+2
  92+ 994E 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  93+ 994F 32 23 95     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+4),a			; e = x + [c]
  94+ 9952 79           		ld		a,c
  95+ 9953 21 22 95     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  96+ 9956 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  97+ 9957 32 24 95     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+5),a			; f = y + [d] + carry
  98+ 995A C9           		ret
  99+ 995B
 100+ 995B 32           working_distX	DB 50
 101+ 995C 32           working_distY	DB 50
 102+ 995D 00           current_distY	DB 0
 103+ 995E
 104+ 995E AF           find_present_system:    xor		a
 105+ 995F 32 26 94                             ld		(XSAV),a
 106+ 9962              .CounterLoop:
 107+ 9962 3A 0E 94     	ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)				; QQ15+1 \ seed Ycoord of star
 108+ 9965 4F           	ld		c,a
 109+ 9966              .calcLocaldy:
 110+ 9966 3A 32 95     	ld		a,(PresentSystemY)
 111+ 9969 47           	ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 112+ 996A 79           	ld		a,c
 113+ 996B 90           	sub		b
 114+ 996C CB 7F        	bit		7,a
 115+ 996E 28 02        	jr		z,.positivedy
 116+ 9970              .negativedy:
 117+ 9970 ED 44        	neg
 118+ 9972              .positivedy:
 119+ 9972 32 5D 99     	ld		(current_distY),a				; save cuirrent_dist Y as we need it maybe
 120+ 9975 ED 5B 5B 99  	ld		de,(working_distX)
 121+ 9979 BA           	cp		d
 122+ 997A 30 24        	jr		nc,.toofar
 123+ 997C              .calcLocaldx:
 124+ 997C 3A 10 94     	ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)				; QQ15+3 \ seed Xcoord of star
 125+ 997F 4F           	ld		c,a
 126+ 9980 3A 31 95     	ld		a,(PresentSystemX)
 127+ 9983 47           	ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 128+ 9984 79           	ld		a,c
 129+ 9985 90           	sub		b
 130+ 9986 CB 7F        	bit		7,a
 131+ 9988 28 02        	jr		z,.positivedx
 132+ 998A              .negativedx:
 133+ 998A ED 44        	neg
 134+ 998C              .positivedx:
 135+ 998C 4F           	ld		c,a
 136+ 998D BB           	cp		e
 137+ 998E 30 10        	jr		nc,.toofar
 138+ 9990              .Nearer:									; we have a closer system
 139+ 9990 3A 5D 99     	ld		a,(current_distY)
 140+ 9993 47           	ld		b,a								; we have c to recall Y into b
 141+ 9994 ED 43 5B 99  	ld		(working_distX),bc
 142+ 9998 C5           	push	bc
 143+ 9999 CD D1 98     	call 	copy_system_to_working
 144+ 999C C1           	pop		bc
 145+ 999D 78           	ld		a,b								;
 146+ 999E B1           	or		c								;
 147+ 999F C8           	ret		z								; if we have distance 0 then bang on
 148+ 99A0              .toofar:
 149+ 99A0 CD D9 98     	call	next_system_seed
 150+ 99A3 3A 26 94     	ld		a,(XSAV)
 151+ 99A6 3D           	dec		a
 152+ 99A7 FE 00        	cp		0
 153+ 99A9 C8           	ret		z
 154+ 99AA 32 26 94     	ld		(XSAV),a
 155+ 99AD 18 B3        	jr		.CounterLoop
 156+ 99AF
 157+ 99AF
 158+ 99AF              get_planet_data_working_seed:
 159+ 99AF 3A 20 95     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+1)
 160+ 99B2 E6 07        		and		7
 161+ 99B4 32 13 95     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 162+ 99B7 3A 21 95     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+2)
 163+ 99BA CB 3F        		srl	a
 164+ 99BC CB 3F        		srl	a
 165+ 99BE CB 3F        		srl	a
 166+ 99C0 CB 3F        		srl	a								; c/8
 167+ 99C2 E6 07        		and		7
 168+ 99C4 32 14 95     		ld		(DisplayGovernment),a
 169+ 99C7 CB 3F        		srl	a
 170+ 99C9 FE 00        		cp		0
 171+ 99CB 20 08        		jr		nz,.CanBeRich
 172+ 99CD              .Fedual:
 173+ 99CD 3A 13 95     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 174+ 99D0 F6 02        		or		2							; Adjust Eco for Anarchy and Feudal, set bit 1.
 175+ 99D2 32 13 95     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 176+ 99D5              .CanBeRich:
 177+ 99D5 3A 13 95     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 178+ 99D8 EE 07        		xor		7							; flip economy so Rich is now 7
 179+ 99DA 32 15 95     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Flipped Eco, EcoEOR7, Rich Ind = 7
 180+ 99DD 47           		ld		b,a
 181+ 99DE 3A 22 95     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 182+ 99E1 E6 03        		and		3
 183+ 99E3 80           		add		a,b
 184+ 99E4 32 15 95     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek Level += seed d & 3
 185+ 99E7 3A 14 95     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 186+ 99EA CB 3F        		srl		a 							; gov/2
 187+ 99EC 47           		ld		b,a
 188+ 99ED 3A 15 95     		ld		a,(DisplayTekLevel)
 189+ 99F0 80           		add		a,b
 190+ 99F1 32 15 95     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek += gov /2
 191+ 99F4 CB 27        		sla		a
 192+ 99F6 CB 27        		sla		a							; Onto Population (TL-1)*= 4
 193+ 99F8 47           		ld		b,a
 194+ 99F9 3A 13 95     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 195+ 99FC 80           		add		a,b                  		; TechLevel*4 + Eco   7-56
 196+ 99FD 47           		ld		b,a
 197+ 99FE 3A 14 95     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)
 198+ 9A01 3C           		inc		a  							; +Government, 0 is Anarchy + 1
 199+ 9A02 32 16 95     		ld		(DisplayPopulation),a
 200+ 9A05 3A 13 95     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 201+ 9A08 EE 07        		xor		7							; Onto productivity
 202+ 9A0A C6 03        		add		3							;  (Flipped eco +3)
 203+ 9A0C 57           		ld		d,a
 204+ 9A0D 3A 14 95     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 205+ 9A10 C6 04        		add		4
 206+ 9A12 5F           		ld		e,a
 207+ 9A13 ED 30        		mul									; ; DE = d*e, Productivity part 1. has hsb in A, lsb in P.
 208+ 9A15 3A 16 95     		ld		a,(DisplayPopulation)		; then we use d for radius
 209+ 9A18 57           		ld		d,a
 210+ 9A19 ED 30        		mul
 211+ 9A1B CB 23        		sla		e
 212+ 9A1D CB 1A        		rr		d
 213+ 9A1F CB 23        		sla		e
 214+ 9A21 CB 1A        		rr		d
 215+ 9A23 CB 23        		sla		e
 216+ 9A25 CB 1A        		rr		d							; de * 8
 217+ 9A27 ED 53 18 95  		ld		(DisplayProductivity),de
 218+ 9A2B              .DoRadius:
 219+ 9A2B 3A 22 95     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 220+ 9A2E 4F           		ld		c,a
 221+ 9A2F 3A 24 95     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
 222+ 9A32 E6 0F        		and		$0F							;  lower 4 bits of w2_h determine planet radius
 223+ 9A34 C6 0B        		add		11							;  radius min = 256*11 = 2816 km
 224+ 9A36 47           		ld		b,a							;
 225+ 9A37 ED 43 1C 95  		ld		(DisplayRadius),bc
 226+ 9A3B C9           		ret
 227+ 9A3C
# file closed: ./Variables/galaxy_seed.asm

  34+ 9B70 10 9B 15 9B
  34+ 9B74 1D 9B 2B 9B

  34+ 9B80 65 9B

  36+ 9B82
  37+ 9B82
  38+ 9B82              getTableText:
  39+ 9B82              ; ">getTableText, hl = indexlist, a = textnbr, returns with hl = porinter to head of text"
  40+ 9B82              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  41+ 9B82 D5           	push	de								; save DE as we will likley need it in caller
  42+ 9B83 ED 31        	add		hl,a							; 0 based ref, and its 2 bytes
  43+ 9B85 ED 31        	add		hl,a
  44+ 9B87 5E           	ld		e,(hl)
  45+ 9B88 23           	inc		hl
  46+ 9B89 56           	ld		d,(hl)							; de = indexed address
  47+ 9B8A EB           	ex		de,hl							; flip it to hl
  48+ 9B8B D1           	pop		de								; retrieve de
  49+ 9B8C C9           	ret										; return with hl as start entry
  50+ 9B8D
  51+ 9B8D
  52+ 9B8D              ;               CF      ZF      Result
  53+ 9B8D              ;               -----------------------------------
  54+ 9B8D              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  55+ 9B8D              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  56+ 9B8D              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  57+ 9B8D              ;               1       1       Impossible
  58+ 9B8D              getRankIndex:
  59+ 9B8D              ; ">getRank, de = kill count, returns a = index,hl destroyed"
  60+ 9B8D              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  61+ 9B8D 7A           	ld		a,d
  62+ 9B8E B3           	or		e
  63+ 9B8F FE 00        	cp		0
  64+ 9B91 C8           	ret		z								; quicks skip for 0 kills
  65+ 9B92 AF           	xor 	a
  66+ 9B93 21 E1 9A     	ld		hl,RankingTable
  67+ 9B96              .testLoop:
  68+ 9B96 4E           	ld		c,(hl)
  69+ 9B97 23           	inc		hl
  70+ 9B98 46           	ld		b,(hl)							; bc = ranking
  71+ 9B99 E5           	push	hl
  72+ 9B9A 60           	ld		h,b
  73+ 9B9B 69           	ld		l,c
  74+ 9B9C CD 5D A5     	call	compare16HLDE
  75+ 9B9F 38 06        	jr		c,.HLLTDE
  76+ 9BA1              .HLGTEDE									; Found the correct rank
  77+ 9BA1 E1           	pop		hl
  78+ 9BA2 23           	inc		hl								; move to next value
  79+ 9BA3 23           	inc		hl
  80+ 9BA4 3C           	inc		a								; we canloop forever as if kills was $FFFF then hits nutter rank but also +1 = 0000 as its 16 bit
  81+ 9BA5 18 EF        	jr		.testLoop
  82+ 9BA7              .HLLTDE:									; HL < Kills so found correct rank
  83+ 9BA7 E1           	pop		hl
  84+ 9BA8 C9           	ret
  85+ 9BA9
# file closed: ./Tables/text_tables.asm

# file opened: ./Tables/dictionary.asm

 178+ A02A              TextEconomyOffset   EQU (TextTokenEconomy - TextTokens)/2
 179+ A02A              TextGovOffset       EQU (WordIdxGovernment - WordIdx)/2
 180+ A02A
 181+ A02A              CapitaliseString:
 182+ A02A              ; ">CapitaliseString hl = address"
 183+ A02A              .CapLoop:
 184+ A02A 23           	inc		hl
 185+ A02B 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 186+ A02C FE 00        	cp		0
 187+ A02E C8           	ret		z
 188+ A02F FE 5B        	cp		'Z'+1
 189+ A031 30 F7        	jr		nc,.CapLoop
 190+ A033 FE 41        	cp		'A'
 191+ A035 38 F3        	jr		c,.CapLoop
 192+ A037              .LowerCase:
 193+ A037 C6 20        	add		a,'a'-'A'
 194+ A039 77           	ld		(hl),a
 195+ A03A 18 EE        	jr		.CapLoop
 196+ A03C
 197+ A03C              WordIndexToAddress:
 198+ A03C 21 AD 9E     	ld		hl,WordIdx
 199+ A03F ED 31        	add		hl,a
 200+ A041 ED 31        	add		hl,a
 201+ A043 D5           	push	de
 202+ A044 5E           	ld		e,(hl)
 203+ A045 23           	inc		hl
 204+ A046 56           	ld		d,(hl)
 205+ A047 EB           	ex		de,hl
 206+ A048 D1           	pop		de
 207+ A049 C9           	ret
 208+ A04A
 209+ A04A
 210+ A04A              expandTokenToString:
 211+ A04A              ; ">expandTokenToString a = texttoken"
 212+ A04A 21 D3 9F     	ld		hl,TextTokens
 213+ A04D CD 82 9B     	call	getTableText
 214+ A050 11 09 A0     	ld		de,TextBuffer
 215+ A053              .ReadLoop:
 216+ A053 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 217+ A054 FE 00        	cp		0
 218+ A056 28 1B        	jr		z,.ReadDone
 219+ A058 E5           	push	hl
 220+ A059 D5           	push	de
 221+ A05A 21 AD 9E     	ld		hl,WordIdx
 222+ A05D CD 82 9B     	call	getTableText
 223+ A060 D1           	pop		de
 224+ A061              .WordExpandLoop:
 225+ A061 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 226+ A062 FE 00        	cp		0
 227+ A064 28 05        	jr		z,.AddSpace
 228+ A066              ;.GetChar:
 229+ A066 12           	ld		(de),a
 230+ A067 13           	inc		de
 231+ A068 23           	inc		hl
 232+ A069 18 F6        	jr		.WordExpandLoop
 233+ A06B              .AddSpace:
 234+ A06B 3E 20        	ld		a,' '
 235+ A06D 12           	ld		(de),a
 236+ A06E 13           	inc		de
 237+ A06F E1           	pop		hl
 238+ A070 23           	inc		hl
 239+ A071 18 E0        	jr		.ReadLoop
 240+ A073              .ReadDone:
 241+ A073 1B           	dec		de
 242+ A074 AF           	xor		a
 243+ A075 12           	ld		(de),a
 244+ A076 C9           	ret
 245+ A077

  15+ A0F5 FE 00        	cp		0					; 0 = skip 2 chars

 111+ A111              ;	ld		hl,varV
 112+ A111              ;	ld		(VarV),0400
 113+ A111              ;	ld		(varV),a
 114+ A111              ;	ld
 115+ A111              ;
 116+ A111              ;		.TT43	\ Token > 127 page4 token or planet digram.
 117+ A111              ;C9 A0                   CMP #&A0	      \ >= #160 ?
 118+ A111              ;B0 14                   BCS TT47	      \ more page4, subtract #160
 119+ A111              ;29 7F                   AND #&7F	      \ else token 128to159  -> 0 to 31
 120+ A111              ;0A                      ASL A		      \ *= 2
 121+ A111              ;A8                      TAY 		      \ digram index = 0to62
 122+ A111              ;B9 80 08                LDA &0880,Y \ QQ16,Y  \ ALLEXEGEZACEBISOUSESARMAINDIREA?ER  etc.
 123+ A111              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 124+ A111              ;B9 81 08                LDA &0881,Y \ QQ16+1,Y \ 2nd character of diagram. Flight copied down from docked code.
 125+ A111              ;C9 3F                   CMP #&3F	      \ is second letter '?'
 126+ A111              ;F0 40                   BEQ TT48    	      \ rts, name has odd-number of letters.
 127+ A111              ;4C 9A 33                JMP &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 128+ A111              ;
 129+ A111              ;	.TT47	\ more page4, subtract #160
 130+ A111              ;E9 A0                   SBC #&A0	\ -= 160
 131+ A111              ;	.ex	\ -> &342D \ extra, token >= 96 or Acc = 128to145 or -=160
 132+ A111              ;AA                      TAX 		\ copy of word index
 133+ A111              ;A9 00                   LDA #0		\ page 4 words lo  #QQ18 MOD 256
 134+ A111              ;85 22                   STA &22		\ V
 135+ A111              ;A9 04                   LDA #4		\ page 4 words hi  #QQ18 DIV 256
 136+ A111              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 137+ A111              ;A0 00                   LDY #0
 138+ A111              ;8A                      TXA 		\ token = word index
 139+ A111              ;F0 13                   BEQ TT50	\ if X=0 then Y offset to word correct
 140+ A111              ;	.TT51	\ counters Y letter, X token
 141+ A111              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 142+ A111              ;F0 07                   BEQ TT49	\ exit as word ended
 143+ A111              ;C8                      INY 		\ letter count
 144+ A111              ;D0 F9                   BNE TT51	\ loop Y
 145+ A111              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1 \ next page as Y reached 256
 146+ A111              ;D0 F5                   BNE TT51    	\ guaranteed, loop Y letter
 147+ A111              ;	.TT49	\ word ended
 148+ A111              ;C8                      INY
 149+ A111              ;D0 02                   BNE TT59    	\ next word
 150+ A111              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1	\ next page as Y reached 256
 151+ A111              ;	.TT59	\ next word
 152+ A111              ;CA                      DEX 		\ token count
 153+ A111              ;D0 ED                   BNE TT51	\ loop X token
 154+ A111              ;	.TT50	\ token X = 0, counter Y offset to word correct
 155+ A111              ;98                      TYA
 156+ A111              ;48                      PHA 		\ store Yindex
 157+ A111              ;A5 23                   LDA &23		\ V+1
 158+ A111              ;48                      PHA 		\ correct pointer hi
 159+ A111              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y 	\ (V),Y
 160+ A111              ;49 23                   EOR #&23	\ decode '#'
 161+ A111              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A \ TT27 \ process text token to next depth
 162+ A111              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore this depth's Vhi
 163+ A111              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 164+ A111              ;68                      PLA
 165+ A111              ;A8                      TAY 		\ restore this depth's Yindex
 166+ A111              ;C8                      INY 		\ next letter
 167+ A111              ;D0 02                   BNE P%+4	\ not zero so skip next page
 168+ A111              ;E6 23                   INC &23		\ V+1
 169+ A111              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 170+ A111              ;D0 E6                   BNE TT50    	\ loop Y for next letter of page4 token
 171+ A111              ;	.TT48 	\ rts
 172+ A111              ;60                      RTS 		\ end of flight token printing TT27
 173+ A111              ;
 174+ A111              ;
 175+ A111              ;
 176+ A111              ;
 177+ A111              ;
 178+ A111              ;
 179+ A111              ;		.TT27	\ -> &36E0 \ process flight text Token in Acc
 180+ A111              ;;AA                      TAX		\ copy token to count down
 181+ A111              ;;F0 DE                   BEQ csh		\ Acc = 0, up to Cash
 182+ A111              ;30 74                   BMI TT43	\ if token is >  127 down, page4 token or digram
 183+ A111              ;CA                      DEX
 184+ A111              ;F0 BC                   BEQ tal		\ Acc == 1, up, print Galaxy number.
 185+ A111              ;CA                      DEX
 186+ A111              ;F0 A3                   BEQ ypl		\ Acc == 2, up, present planet in QQ2.
 187+ A111              ;CA                      DEX
 188+ A111              ;D0 03                   BNE P%+5	\ hop over, else X == 0
 189+ A111              ;4C 0A 33                JMP &330A \ cpl \ Acc = 3 print Planet name for seed QQ15
 190+ A111              ;CA                      DEX
 191+ A111              ;F0 8A                   BEQ cmn		\ Acc == 4, up, commander name.
 192+ A111              ;CA                      DEX
 193+ A111              ;F0 B5                   BEQ fwl		\ Acc == 5, up, fuel followed by cash.
 194+ A111              ;CA                      DEX
 195+ A111              ;D0 05                   BNE  P%+7	\ hop over, else X == 0
 196+ A111              ;A9 80                   LDA #&80	\ Acc == 6, set bit 7 TT27m
 197+ A111              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 198+ A111              ;60                      RTS
 199+ A111              ;CA                      DEX 		\ skip Acc ==7
 200+ A111              ;CA                      DEX
 201+ A111              ;D0 03                   BNE P%+5	\ hop over to continue Acc 9to127
 202+ A111              ;86 72                   STX &72	 \ QQ17	\ else Acc ==8, QQ17 set to X = 0
 203+ A111              ;60                      RTS
 204+ A111              ;CA                      DEX 		\ continue 9to127 tokens
 205+ A111              ;F0 38                   BEQ crlf	\ Acc == 9, down, colon on right.
 206+ A111              ;C9 60                   CMP #&60	\ discard X, look at Acc = token >= 96
 207+ A111              ;B0 66                   BCS ex   	\ extra >= #&60, far down
 208+ A111              ;C9 0E                   CMP #14		\ < 14 ?
 209+ A111              ;90 04                   BCC P%+6	\ goes to Token < 14 or > 31
 210+ A111              ;C9 20                   CMP #32		\ < 32 ?
 211+ A111              ;90 28                   BCC qw   	\ 14 <= token A < 32 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 212+ A111              ;		\ Token  < 14 or > 31
 213+ A111              ;A6 72                   LDX &72	 	\ QQ17
 214+ A111              ;F0 3D                   BEQ TT74 	\ if QQ17 = 0 Upper case, jmp TT26, print character.
 215+ A111              ;30 11                   BMI TT41 	\ if bit7 set
 216+ A111              ;24 72                   BIT &72		\ QQ17 has bit6 set too
 217+ A111              ;70 30                   BVS TT46 	\ If only bit6 set, clear bit6 and print as Upper
 218+ A111              ;	.TT42	\ Uppercase to lowercase
 219+ A111              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 220+ A111              ;90 06                   BCC TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 221+ A111              ;C9 5B                   CMP #&5B	\ >= ascii 'Z'+1
 222+ A111              ;B0 02                   BCS TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 223+ A111              ;69 20                   ADC #&20	\ else Upper to lowercase
 224+ A111              ;	.TT44	\ print character as is with TT26
 225+ A111              ;4C FC 1E                JMP &1EFC \ TT26 \ print character
 226+ A111              ;
 227+ A111              ;	.TT41	\ QQ17 bit7 set
 228+ A111              ;24 72                   BIT &72		\ QQ17
 229+ A111              ;70 17                   BVS TT45	\ bit6 set too, Nothing or lower.
 230+ A111              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 231+ A111              ;90 22                   BCC TT74 	\ print as is using TT26
 232+ A111              ;48                      PHA 		\ else store token Acc
 233+ A111              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy
 234+ A111              ;09 40                   ORA #&40	\ set bit6 in QQ17 so subsequent ones lower
 235+ A111              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 236+ A111              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore token
 237+ A111              ;D0 EC                   BNE TT44	\ guaranteed up, print as Uppercase with TT26.
 238+ A111              ;
 239+ A111              ;	.qw	\ Acc = 14to31 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 240+ A111              ;69 72                   ADC #&72	\ A+=114 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 241+ A111              ;D0 32                   BNE ex		\ guaranteed down, extra.
 242+ A111              ;
 243+ A111              ;	.crlf	\ Acc == 9,  colon on right
 244+ A111              ;A9 15                   LDA #21		\ on right
 245+ A111              ;85 2C                   STA &2C		\ XC
 246+ A111              ;D0 97                   BNE TT73	\ guaranteed up, print colon.
 247+ A111              ;
 248+ A111              ;	.TT45	\ QQ17 bits 7,6 set. Nothing or lower.
 249+ A111              ;E0 FF                   CPX #&FF	\ if QQ17 = #&FF
 250+ A111              ;F0 63                   BEQ TT48	\ rts
 251+ A111              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ >= ascii 'A' ?
 252+ A111              ;B0 D0                   BCS TT42	\ Uppercase to lowercase, up.
 253+ A111              ;	.TT46	\ clear bit6 QQ17 and print as is using TT26
 254+ A111              ;48                      PHA 		\ push token
 255+ A111              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy
 256+ A111              ;29 BF                   AND #&BF	\ clear bit6
 257+ A111              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 258+ A111              ;68                      PLA 		\ pull token
 259+ A111              ;	.TT74	\ TT26, print character.
 260+ A111              ;4C FC 1E                JMP &1EFC	\ TT26
 261+ A111              ;
 262+ A111              ;	.TT43	\ Token > 127 page4 token or planet digram.
 263+ A111              ;C9 A0                   CMP #&A0	      \ >= #160 ?
 264+ A111              ;B0 14                   BCS TT47	      \ more page4, subtract #160
 265+ A111              ;29 7F                   AND #&7F	      \ else token 128to159  -> 0 to 31
 266+ A111              ;0A                      ASL A		      \ *= 2
 267+ A111              ;A8                      TAY 		      \ digram index = 0to62
 268+ A111              ;B9 80 08                LDA &0880,Y \ QQ16,Y  \ ALLEXEGEZACEBISOUSESARMAINDIREA?ER  etc.
 269+ A111              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 270+ A111              ;B9 81 08                LDA &0881,Y \ QQ16+1,Y \ 2nd character of diagram. Flight copied down from docked code.
 271+ A111              ;C9 3F                   CMP #&3F	      \ is second letter '?'
 272+ A111              ;F0 40                   BEQ TT48    	      \ rts, name has odd-number of letters.
 273+ A111              ;4C 9A 33                JMP &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 274+ A111              ;
 275+ A111              ;	.TT47	\ more page4, subtract #160
 276+ A111              ;E9 A0                   SBC #&A0	\ -= 160
 277+ A111              ;	.ex	\ -> &342D \ extra, token >= 96 or Acc = 128to145 or -=160
 278+ A111              ;AA                      TAX 		\ copy of word index
 279+ A111              ;A9 00                   LDA #0		\ page 4 words lo  #QQ18 MOD 256
 280+ A111              ;85 22                   STA &22		\ V
 281+ A111              ;A9 04                   LDA #4		\ page 4 words hi  #QQ18 DIV 256
 282+ A111              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 283+ A111              ;A0 00                   LDY #0
 284+ A111              ;8A                      TXA 		\ token = word index
 285+ A111              ;F0 13                   BEQ TT50	\ if X=0 then Y offset to word correct
 286+ A111              ;	.TT51	\ counters Y letter, X token
 287+ A111              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 288+ A111              ;F0 07                   BEQ TT49	\ exit as word ended
 289+ A111              ;C8                      INY 		\ letter count
 290+ A111              ;D0 F9                   BNE TT51	\ loop Y
 291+ A111              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1 \ next page as Y reached 256
 292+ A111              ;D0 F5                   BNE TT51    	\ guaranteed, loop Y letter
 293+ A111              ;	.TT49	\ word ended
 294+ A111              ;C8                      INY
 295+ A111              ;D0 02                   BNE TT59    	\ next word
 296+ A111              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1	\ next page as Y reached 256
 297+ A111              ;	.TT59	\ next word
 298+ A111              ;CA                      DEX 		\ token count
 299+ A111              ;D0 ED                   BNE TT51	\ loop X token
 300+ A111              ;	.TT50	\ token X = 0, counter Y offset to word correct
 301+ A111              ;98                      TYA
 302+ A111              ;48                      PHA 		\ store Yindex
 303+ A111              ;A5 23                   LDA &23		\ V+1
 304+ A111              ;48                      PHA 		\ correct pointer hi
 305+ A111              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y 	\ (V),Y
 306+ A111              ;49 23                   EOR #&23	\ decode '#'
 307+ A111              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A \ TT27 \ process text token to next depth
 308+ A111              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore this depth's Vhi
 309+ A111              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 310+ A111              ;68                      PLA
 311+ A111              ;A8                      TAY 		\ restore this depth's Yindex
 312+ A111              ;C8                      INY 		\ next letter
 313+ A111              ;D0 02                   BNE P%+4	\ not zero so skip next page
 314+ A111              ;E6 23                   INC &23		\ V+1
 315+ A111              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 316+ A111              ;D0 E6                   BNE TT50    	\ loop Y for next letter of page4 token
 317+ A111              ;	.TT48 	\ rts
 318+ A111              ;60                      RTS 		\ end of flight token printing TT27
 319+ A111              ;
 320+ A111              ;
 321+ A111              ;
# file closed: ./Tables/name_digrams.asm
 918  A111              ;INCLUDE "Tables/inwk_table.asm" This is no longer needed as we will write to univer object bank

 920  A111              ; Include all maths libraries to test assembly
 921  A111                  INCLUDE "./Maths/addhldesigned.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/addhldesigned.asm
   1+ A111              addhldesigned:
   2+ A111 CB 7C                bit     7,h
   3+ A113 20 03                jr      nz,.noneghl
   4+ A115 CD 73 A5             call    negate16hl
   5+ A118              .noneghl:
   6+ A118 CB 7A                bit     7,d
   7+ A11A 20 03                jr      nz,.nonegde
   8+ A11C CD 7A A5             call    negate16de
   9+ A11F              .nonegde:
  10+ A11F 19                   add     hl,de                       ; do 2'd c add
  11+ A120 AF                   xor     a                           ; assume positive
  12+ A121 CB 7C                bit     7,h
  13+ A123 C8                   ret     z                           ; if not set then can exit early
  14+ A124 CD 73 A5             call    negate16hl
  15+ A127 3E FF                ld      a,$FF
  16+ A129 C9                   ret
  17+ A12A
# file closed: ./Maths/addhldesigned.asm
 922  A12A                  INCLUDE "./Maths/addhlasigned.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/addhlasigned.asm
   1+ A12A
   2+ A12A              ; a = value to add
   3+ A12A              ; b = offset (equivalent to regX)
   4+ A12A              ; returns INWK [x] set to new value
   5+ A12A              addINWKbasigned:
   6+ A12A 21 0C C0     		ld 		hl,UBnKxlo                  ; hl = INWK 0
   7+ A12D 4F           		ld      c,a                         ; preserve a
   8+ A12E 78           		ld		a,b
   9+ A12F ED 31        		add		hl,a                        ; hl = INWK[x]
  10+ A131 79                   ld      a,c                         ; get back a value
  11+ A132 E6 80                and     $80                         ; get sign bit from a
  12+ A134 47                   ld      b,a                         ; now b = sign bit of a
  13+ A135 79                   ld      a,c                         ; a = original value
  14+ A136 E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit                ; a = unsigned version of original value
  15+ A138              ; hl = unsigned version of INWK0[b]
  16+ A138              ; a = value to add, also in c which will optimise later code
  17+ A138              ; b = sign bit of a ( in old code was varT)
  18+ A138              addhlcsigned:
  19+ A138 5E                   ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = INKK value
  20+ A139 23                   inc     hl
  21+ A13A 56                   ld      d,(hl)
  22+ A13B 23                   inc     hl                          ; now pointing a sign
  23+ A13C 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; a = sign bit
  24+ A13D EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value now and de = pointer to sign
  25+ A13E A8                   xor     b                           ; a = resultant sign
  26+ A13F CB 7F                bit     7,a                         ; is it negative?
  27+ A141 28 28                jr      z,.postivecalc
  28+ A143              .negativecalc:
  29+ A143 7C                   ld      a,h
  30+ A144 E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit
  31+ A146 67                   ld      h,a                         ; strip high bit
  32+ A147 DD 68                ld      ixl,b                       ; save sign bit from b into d
  33+ A149 06 00                ld      b,0                         ; c = value to subtract so now bc = value to subtract
  34+ A14B ED 42                sbc     hl,bc
  35+ A14D DD 45                ld      b,ixl                       ; get sign back
  36+ A14F EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to sign
  37+ A150 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;
  38+ A151 E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit
  39+ A153 DE 00                sbc     a,0                         ; subtract carry which could flip sign bit
  40+ A155 F6 80                or      $80                         ; set bit 0
  41+ A157 A8                   xor     b                           ; flip bit on sign (var T)
  42+ A158 77                   ld      (hl),a
  43+ A159 2B                   dec     hl
  44+ A15A 72                   ld      (hl),d
  45+ A15B 2B                   dec     hl
  46+ A15C 73                   ld      (hl),e                      ; write out DE to INKW[x]0,1
  47+ A15D EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to start if INKW[x]
  48+ A15E D8                   ret     c                           ; if carry was set then we can exit now
  49+ A15F              .nocarry:
  50+ A15F CD 73 A5             call    negate16hl                  ; get hl back to positive, a is still inkw+2
  51+ A162 B0                   or      b                           ; b is still varT
  52+ A163 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to start if INKW[x]
  53+ A164 73                   ld      (hl),e
  54+ A165 23                   inc     hl
  55+ A166 72                   ld      (hl),d
  56+ A167 23                   inc     hl
  57+ A168 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; set sign bit in INKK[x]+2
  58+ A169 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to sign
  59+ A16A C9                   ret
  60+ A16B              .postivecalc:
  61+ A16B DD 68                ld      ixl,b
  62+ A16D 06 00                ld      b,0
  63+ A16F 19                   add     hl,de
  64+ A170 EB                   ex      de,hl
  65+ A171 DD B5                or      ixl                         ; we don;t need to recover b here
  66+ A173 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; push sign into INWK[x]
  67+ A174 2B                   dec     hl
  68+ A175 72                   ld      (hl),d
  69+ A176 2B                   dec     hl
  70+ A177 73                   ld      (hl),e
  71+ A178 C9                   ret
  72+ A179
  73+ A179              ;a = a AND 80 (i.e. bit 7) =>carry       so value is -
  74+ A179              ;MVT1
  75+ A179              ;    S = bits 6 to 0 of A
  76+ A179              ;    A = sign bit => T
  77+ A179              ;    xor sign bit with ink[x] Sign
  78+ A179              ;    if negative thn its not an add
  79+ A179              ;
  80+ A179              ;        and h, 7F
  81+ A179              ;        b = 0
  82+ A179              ;        c = varS
  83+ A179              ;        subtract INW[X]hilo, bc
  84+ A179              ;        retain carry
  85+ A179              ;        get INKW[x]Sign
  86+ A179              ;        and 7F
  87+ A179              ;        subtract carry (so will go negtive if negative)
  88+ A179              ;        xor bit 7 of h with T to flip bit
  89+ A179              ;        write to INKW[x]Sign
  90+ A179              ;
  91+ A179              ;    else
  92+ A179              ;MV10.
  93+ A179              ;        add INWK[x]hi,lo, varS
  94+ A179              ;        or      sign bit
  95+ A179
  96+ A179
# file closed: ./Maths/addhlasigned.asm
 923  A179                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AddDEtoCash.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AddDEtoCash.asm
   1+ A179              ; Note its big endian
   2+ A179 2A 07 98     addDEtoCash:            ld      hl,(Cash)
   3+ A17C 19                                   add     hl,de
   4+ A17D 22 07 98                             ld      (Cash),hl
   5+ A180 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
   6+ A183 2A 09 98                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
   7+ A186 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
   8+ A188 22 09 98                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
   9+ A18B C9                                   ret
  10+ A18C
  11+ A18C 2A 07 98     subDEfromCash:          ld      hl,(Cash)
  12+ A18F 7C                                   ld      a,h
  13+ A190 B5                                   or      l
  14+ A191 2A 09 98                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  15+ A194 B4                                   or      h
  16+ A195 B5                                   or      l
  17+ A196 C8                                   ret     z               ; No cash return
  18+ A197 B7                                   or      a
  19+ A198 2A 07 98                             ld      hl,(Cash)
  20+ A19B ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  21+ A19D 22 07 98                             ld      (Cash),hl
  22+ A1A0 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
  23+ A1A3 2A 09 98                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  24+ A1A6 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  25+ A1A8 22 09 98                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
  26+ A1AB                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,.ZeroCash
  26+ A1AB CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
  26+ A1AD C2 B1 A1    >                        jp      nz,.ZeroCash
  27+ A1B0 C9                                   ret
  28+ A1B1 21 00 00     .ZeroCash:              ld      hl,0
  29+ A1B4 22 07 98                             ld      (Cash),hl
  30+ A1B7 22 09 98                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
  31+ A1BA C9                                   ret
  32+ A1BB
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AddDEtoCash.asm
 924  A1BB                  INCLUDE "./Maths/multiply.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/multiply.asm
   1+ A1BB              HLequSRmulQdiv256:      ;X.Y=x1lo.S*M/256  	\ where M/256 is gradient
   2+ A1BB 2A 22 94                             ld  hl,(varRS)
   3+ A1BE 3A 21 94                             ld  a,(varQ)
   4+ A1C1 C5 D5        HLeqyHLmulAdiv256:      push    bc,,de
   5+ A1C3 11 00 00                             ld  de,0        ; de = XY
   6+ A1C6 47                                   ld  b,a         ; b = Q
   7+ A1C7                                      ShiftHLRight1
   7+ A1C7 CB 3C       >			   srl h
   7+ A1C9 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
   8+ A1CB CB 20                                sla b
   9+ A1CD 30 03                                jr  nc,.LL126
  10+ A1CF EB           .LL125:                 ex de,hl
  11+ A1D0 19                                   add hl,de
  12+ A1D1 EB                                   ex  de,hl       ; de = de + rs
  13+ A1D2              .LL126:                 ShiftHLRight1
  13+ A1D2 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  13+ A1D4 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  14+ A1D6 CB 20                                sla b
  15+ A1D8 38 F5                                jr      c,.LL125
  16+ A1DA 20 F6                                jr      nz,.LL126
  17+ A1DC EB                                   ex      de,hl   ; hl = result
  18+ A1DD D1 C1                                pop     bc,,de
  19+ A1DF C9                                   ret
  20+ A1E0
  21+ A1E0
  22+ A1E0              MacroDEEquQmulASigned:  MACRO
  23+ A1E0 ~                                    ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  24+ A1E0 ~                                    ld      a,(varQ)
  25+ A1E0 ~                                    ld      e,a
  26+ A1E0 ~                                    xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  27+ A1E0 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
  28+ A1E0 ~                                    ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  29+ A1E0 ~                                    ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  30+ A1E0 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  31+ A1E0 ~                                    ld      d,a
  32+ A1E0 ~                                    ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  33+ A1E0 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  34+ A1E0 ~                                    ld      e,a
  35+ A1E0 ~                                    mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  36+ A1E0 ~                                    ld      a,d
  37+ A1E0 ~                                    or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  38+ A1E0 ~                                    ld      d,a
  39+ A1E0                                      ENDM
  40+ A1E0
  41+ A1E0
  42+ A1E0
  43+ A1E0                                 ; .MAD	\ -> &22AD  \ Multiply and Add  (DE also) X.A(Lo.Hi) = Q*A + R.S (Lo.Hi)
  44+ A1E0              madXAequQmulAaddRS:     MacroDEEquQmulASigned
  44+ A1E0 57          >                        ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  44+ A1E1 3A 21 94    >                        ld      a,(varQ)
  44+ A1E4 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  44+ A1E5 AA          >                        xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  44+ A1E6 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  44+ A1E8 47          >                        ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  44+ A1E9 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  44+ A1EA E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  44+ A1EC 57          >                        ld      d,a
  44+ A1ED 7B          >                        ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  44+ A1EE E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  44+ A1F0 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  44+ A1F1 ED 30       >                        mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  44+ A1F3 7A          >                        ld      a,d
  44+ A1F4 B0          >                        or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  44+ A1F5 57          >                        ld      d,a
  45+ A1F6 2A 22 94     madDEaddRS:             ld		hl,(varR)
  46+ A1F9 CD 02 A2                             call	madXAAddHLDESigned
  47+ A1FC EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = R.S + DE
  48+ A1FD                                      ClearCarryFlag
  48+ A1FD B7          >                    or a
  49+ A1FE DD 6B                                ld      ixl,e
  50+ A200 7A                                   ld      a,d
  51+ A201 C9                                   ret
  52+ A202
  53+ A202
  54+ A202 7C           madXAAddHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
  55+ A203 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  56+ A205 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
  57+ A206 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  58+ A207                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
  58+ A207 FA 1F A2    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
  59+ A20A 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
  60+ A20B B2                                   or      d
  61+ A20C                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  61+ A20C FA 11 A2    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
  62+ A20F 19                                   add     hl,de
  63+ A210 C9                                   ret
  64+ A211 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  65+ A212 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  66+ A214 67                                   ld      h,a
  67+ A215 7A                                   ld      a,d
  68+ A216 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  69+ A218 57                                   ld      d,a
  70+ A219 19                                   add     hl,de
  71+ A21A 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
  72+ A21C B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  73+ A21D 67                                   ld      h,a
  74+ A21E C9                                   ret
  75+ A21F 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:          ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
  76+ A220 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  77+ A222 67                                   ld      h,a
  78+ A223 7A                                   ld      a,d
  79+ A224 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  80+ A226 57                                   ld      d,a
  81+ A227 B7                                   or      a
  82+ A228 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  83+ A22A 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
  84+ A22C 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  85+ A22D B4                                   or      h
  86+ A22E 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
  87+ A22F C9                                   ret
  88+ A230              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:       NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
  88+ A230 AF          >                    xor a
  88+ A231 95          >                    sub l
  88+ A232 6F          >                    ld l,a
  88+ A233 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  88+ A234 94          >                    sub h
  88+ A235 67          >                    ld h,a
  89+ A236 78                                   ld      a,b
  90+ A237 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  91+ A239 B4                                   or      h
  92+ A23A 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
  93+ A23B C9                                   ret
  94+ A23C
  95+ A23C
  96+ A23C                  ; multiplication of 16-bit number and 8-bit number into a 24-bit product
  97+ A23C                  ;
  98+ A23C                  ; enter : hl = 16-bit multiplier   = x
  99+ A23C                  ;          e =  8-bit multiplicand = y
 100+ A23C                  ;
 101+ A23C                  ; exit  : ahl = 24-bit product
 102+ A23C                  ;         carry reset
 103+ A23C                  ;
 104+ A23C                  ; uses  : af, de, hl
 105+ A23C 54           AHLequHLmulE:           ld d,h                      ; xh
 106+ A23D 63                                   ld h,e                      ; yl
 107+ A23E ED 30                                mul de                      ; xh*yl
 108+ A240 EB                                   ex de,hl
 109+ A241 ED 30                                mul de                      ; yl*xl, hl = xh*yl
 110+ A243
 111+ A243 7A                                   ld  a,d                     ; sum products
 112+ A244 85                                   add a,l
 113+ A245 57                                   ld  d,a
 114+ A246 EB                                   ex de,hl
 115+ A247
 116+ A247 7A                                   ld  a,d
 117+ A248 CE 00                                adc a,0
 118+ A24A C9                                   ret
 119+ A24B
 120+ A24B
 121+ A24B
 122+ A24B                 ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 32-bit product
 123+ A24B                 ;
 124+ A24B                 ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand = y
 125+ A24B                 ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand = x
 126+ A24B                 ;
 127+ A24B                 ; exit  : dehl = 32-bit product
 128+ A24B                 ;         carry reset
 129+ A24B                 ;
 130+ A24B                 ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 131+ A24B
 132+ A24B
 133+ A24B
 134+ A24B 45           DEHLequDEmulHL:         ld b,l                      ; x0
 135+ A24C 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; y0
 136+ A24D 5D                                   ld e,l                      ; x0
 137+ A24E 6A                                   ld l,d
 138+ A24F E5                                   push hl                     ; x1 y1
 139+ A250 69                                   ld l,c                      ; y0
 140+ A251              ; bc = x0 y0, de = y1 x0,  hl = x1 y0,  stack = x1 y1
 141+ A251 ED 30                                mul de                      ; y1*x0
 142+ A253 EB                                   ex de,hl
 143+ A254 ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y0
 144+ A256
 145+ A256 AF                                   xor a                       ; zero A
 146+ A257 19                                   add hl,de                   ; sum cross products p2 p1
 147+ A258 8F                                   adc a,a                     ; capture carry p3
 148+ A259
 149+ A259 59                                   ld e,c                      ; x0
 150+ A25A 50                                   ld d,b                      ; y0
 151+ A25B ED 30                                mul de                      ; y0*x0
 152+ A25D
 153+ A25D 47                                   ld b,a                      ; carry from cross products
 154+ A25E 4C                                   ld c,h                      ; LSB of MSW from cross products
 155+ A25F
 156+ A25F 7A                                   ld a,d
 157+ A260 85                                   add a,l
 158+ A261 67                                   ld h,a
 159+ A262 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; LSW in HL p1 p0
 160+ A263
 161+ A263 D1                                   pop de
 162+ A264 ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y1
 163+ A266
 164+ A266 EB                                   ex de,hl
 165+ A267 ED 4A                                adc hl,bc
 166+ A269 EB                                   ex de,hl                    ; de = final MSW
 167+ A26A
 168+ A26A C9                                   ret
 169+ A26B
 170+ A26B              ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 16-bit product
 171+ A26B              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 172+ A26B              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 173+ A26B              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 174+ A26B              ;         carry reset
 175+ A26B              ; maths is
 176+ A26B              ;        hl = y , de= x
 177+ A26B              ;        hl = xhi,ylo + (yhigh * xlow)
 178+ A26B              ;        hl = yhih & xlo + x
 179+ A26B              ;
 180+ A26B              ;
 181+ A26B              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 182+ A26B C5           mulDEbyHL:              push    bc
 183+ A26C 7A                                   ld a,d                      ; a = xh
 184+ A26D 54                                   ld d,h                      ; d = yh
 185+ A26E 67                                   ld h,a                      ; h = xh
 186+ A26F 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; c = xl
 187+ A270 45                                   ld b,l                      ; b = yl
 188+ A271 ED 30                                mul                         ; yh * yl
 189+ A273 EB                                   ex de,hl
 190+ A274 ED 30                                mul                         ; xh * yl
 191+ A276 19                                   add hl,de                   ; add cross products
 192+ A277 59                                   ld e,c
 193+ A278 50                                   ld d,b
 194+ A279 ED 30                                mul                         ; yl * xl
 195+ A27B 7D                                   ld a,l                      ; cross products lsb
 196+ A27C 82                                   add a,d                     ; add to msb final
 197+ A27D 67                                   ld h,a
 198+ A27E 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; hl = final
 199+ A27F                                      ; 83 cycles, 19 bytes
 200+ A27F AF                                   xor a                       ; reset carry
 201+ A280 C1                                   pop     bc
 202+ A281 C9                                   ret
 203+ A282
 204+ A282              ; multiplication of two S156-bit numbers into a 16-bit 2'd compliment product
 205+ A282              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 206+ A282              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 207+ A282              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 208+ A282              ;         carry reset
 209+ A282              ;
 210+ A282              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 211+ A282 00           mulDEbyHLSignByte       DB      0
 212+ A283 AF           mulDEbyHLSgnTo2c:       xor     a
 213+ A284 32 82 A2                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 214+ A287 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 215+ A288 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 216+ A28B 28 08                                jr      z,.SignHL
 217+ A28D E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 218+ A28F 57                                   ld      d,a
 219+ A290 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 220+ A292 32 82 A2                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 221+ A295 7C           .SignHL:                ld      a,h
 222+ A296 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 223+ A299 28 0B                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 224+ A29B E6 7F        .NegativeHL:            and     $7F
 225+ A29D 67                                   ld      h,a
 226+ A29E 3A 82 A2                             ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 227+ A2A1 EE 80                                xor     $80
 228+ A2A3 32 82 A2                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 229+ A2A6 CD 6B A2     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 230+ A2A9 3A 82 A2     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 231+ A2AC ED 27 80                             test    $80
 232+ A2AF C8                                   ret     z
 233+ A2B0 AF           .Negateghl: 				xor 	a
 234+ A2B1 95                                   sub 	l
 235+ A2B2 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 236+ A2B3 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 237+ A2B4 94                                   sub 	h
 238+ A2B5 67                                   ld 		h,a
 239+ A2B6 C9                                   ret
 240+ A2B7
 241+ A2B7 AF           mulDESgnbyHLUnsgnTo2c:  xor     a
 242+ A2B8 32 82 A2                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 243+ A2BB 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 244+ A2BC ED 27 80                             test    $80
 245+ A2BF 28 08                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 246+ A2C1 E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 247+ A2C3 57                                   ld      d,a
 248+ A2C4 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 249+ A2C6 32 82 A2                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 250+ A2C9 CD 6B A2     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 251+ A2CC 3A 82 A2     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 252+ A2CF ED 27 80                             test    $80
 253+ A2D2 C8                                   ret     z
 254+ A2D3 AF           .Negateghl:             xor 	a
 255+ A2D4 95                                   sub 	l
 256+ A2D5 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 257+ A2D6 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 258+ A2D7 94                                   sub 	h
 259+ A2D8 67                                   ld 		h,a
 260+ A2D9 C9                                   ret
 261+ A2DA
 262+ A2DA
# file closed: ./Maths/multiply.asm
 925  A2DA                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_square.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
   1+ A2DA              ; "ASM_SQUA : TESTGOOD"
   2+ A2DA              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi"
   3+ A2DA
   4+ A2DA              inline_squde: MACRO
   5+ A2DA ~            			ld	e,a
   6+ A2DA ~            			ld  d,a
   7+ A2DA ~            			mul
   8+ A2DA              			ENDM
   9+ A2DA
  10+ A2DA              inline_squa: MACRO
  11+ A2DA ~            			ld	e,a
  12+ A2DA ~            			ld  d,a
  13+ A2DA ~            			mul
  14+ A2DA ~            			ld	a,e
  15+ A2DA              			ENDM
  16+ A2DA
  17+ A2DA
  18+ A2DA              asm_squa:
  19+ A2DA E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  20+ A2DC              ; "ASM SQUA2 : TESTGOOD"
  21+ A2DC              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi singed"
  22+ A2DC              asm_squa2:
  23+ A2DC 5F           	ld e, a
  24+ A2DD 57           	ld d,a
  25+ A2DE ED 30        	mul
  26+ A2E0 ED 53 C3 93  	ld (varP),de
  27+ A2E4 7B           	ld a,e
  28+ A2E5 C9           	ret
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
 926  A2E6                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
   1+ A2E6              ; "ASM SQRT : TESTGOOD"
   2+ A2E6              ; "16-bit integer square root"
   3+ A2E6              ; "call with de = number to square root"
   4+ A2E6              ; "returns   hl = square root"
   5+ A2E6              ; "corrupts  bc, de"
   6+ A2E6              asm_sqrt:
   7+ A2E6 01 00 80     	ld bc,$8000
   8+ A2E9 61           	ld h,c
   9+ A2EA 69           	ld l,c
  10+ A2EB              .sqrloop:
  11+ A2EB CB 38        	srl b
  12+ A2ED CB 19        	rr c
  13+ A2EF 09           	add hl,bc
  14+ A2F0 EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ A2F1 ED 52        	sbc hl,de
  16+ A2F3 38 04        	jr c,.sqrbit
  17+ A2F5 EB           	ex de,hl
  18+ A2F6 09           	add hl,bc
  19+ A2F7 18 05        	jr .sqrfi
  20+ A2F9              .sqrbit:
  21+ A2F9 19           	add hl,de
  22+ A2FA EB           	ex de,hl
  23+ A2FB B7           	or a
  24+ A2FC ED 42        	sbc hl,bc
  25+ A2FE              .sqrfi:
  26+ A2FE CB 3C        	srl h
  27+ A300 CB 1D        	rr l
  28+ A302 CB 38        	srl b
  29+ A304 CB 19        	rr c
  30+ A306 30 E3        	jr nc,.sqrloop
  31+ A308 C9           	ret
  32+ A309
  33+ A309
  34+ A309              sqrtQR:					; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
  35+ A309 3A 21 94     	ld		a,(varQ)
  36+ A30C 5F           	ld		e,a
  37+ A30D 3A 22 94     	ld		a,(varR)
  38+ A310 57           	ld		d,a
  39+ A311 CD E6 A2     	call	asm_sqrt
  40+ A314 7D               ld      a,l
  41+ A315 32 21 94     	ld		(varQ),a
  42+ A318 C9           	ret
  43+ A319
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
 927  A319                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_divide.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
   1+ A319              ; Divide 8-bit values
   2+ A319              ; In: Divide E by divider C
   3+ A319              ; Out: A = result, B = rest
   4+ A319              ;
   5+ A319              ;;;Div8:
   6+ A319              ;;;    xor a
   7+ A319              ;;;    ld b,8
   8+ A319              ;;;Div8_Loop:
   9+ A319              ;;;    rl e
  10+ A319              ;;;    rla
  11+ A319              ;;;    sub c
  12+ A319              ;;;    jr nc,Div8_NoAdd
  13+ A319              ;;;    add a,c
  14+ A319              ;;;Div8_NoAdd:
  15+ A319              ;;;    djnz Div8_Loop
  16+ A319              ;;;    ld b,a
  17+ A319              ;;;    ld a,e
  18+ A319              ;;;    rla
  19+ A319              ;;;    cpl
  20+ A319              ;;;    ret
  21+ A319
  22+ A319              ;;Inputs: DE is the numerator, BC is the divisor
  23+ A319              ;;Outputs: DE is the result
  24+ A319              ;;         A is a copy of E
  25+ A319              ;;         HL is the remainder
  26+ A319              ;;         BC is not changed
  27+ A319              ;; so DE = DE /BC
  28+ A319              ;140 bytes
  29+ A319              ;145cc
  30+ A319
  31+ A319              MacroDEDivBC:       MACRO
  32+ A319 ~                                rla
  33+ A319 ~                                adc     hl,hl
  34+ A319 ~                                sbc     hl,bc
  35+ A319 ~                                jr      nc,$+3
  36+ A319 ~                                add     hl,bc
  37+ A319                                  ENDM
  38+ A319
  39+ A319              DEequDEDivBC:
  40+ A319 AF               xor a
  41+ A31A ED 62            sbc hl,hl
  42+ A31C 7A               ld a,d
  43+ A31D                  MacroDEDivBC

  43+ A31E ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  43+ A320 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  43+ A322 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  43+ A324 09          >                    add     hl,bc
  44+ A325                  MacroDEDivBC

  44+ A328 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc

  44+ A32C 09          >                    add     hl,bc
