  66+ A3A3 5F               ld e,a
  67+ A3A4 C9               ret
  68+ A3A5
  69+ A3A5
  70+ A3A5
  71+ A3A5              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
  72+ A3A5              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
  73+ A3A5              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
  74+ A3A5              ; Our use
  75+ A3A5              ; BC = A0
  76+ A3A5              ; DE = 0C
  77+ A3A5              ; so BC = a * 256 / C
  78+ A3A5              DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC:    JumpIfAGTENusng	  c,DEV16ATooLarge                                          ; first off if a > c ten return 255
  78+ A3A5 B9          >                        cp     c
  78+ A3A6 D2 D1 A3    >                        jp		nc,DEV16ATooLarge
  79+ A3A9 47                                   ld      b,a
  80+ A3AA 59                                   ld      e,c
  81+ A3AB 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  82+ A3AD 16 00                                ld      d,0
  83+ A3AF C3 BC A3                             jp      DIV16UNDOC
  84+ A3B2 47           DIV16Amul256dQUNDOC:    ld      b,a
  85+ A3B3 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  86+ A3B5 21 21 94                             ld      hl,varQ
  87+ A3B8 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
  88+ A3B9 16 00                                ld      d,0
  89+ A3BB 5F                                   ld      e,a
  90+ A3BC              DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC:
  91+ A3BC 21 00 00     DIV16UNDOC:             ld      hl,0
  92+ A3BF 78                                   ld      a,b
  93+ A3C0 06 10                                ld      b,16
  94+ A3C2 CB 31        DIV16UNDOCLOOP:         sll	c		; unroll 16 times
  95+ A3C4 17                                   rla			; ...
  96+ A3C5 ED 6A                                adc	hl,hl		; ...
  97+ A3C7 ED 52                                sbc	hl,de		; ...
  98+ A3C9 30 02                                jr	nc,DIV16UNDOCSKIP		; ...
  99+ A3CB 19                                   add	hl,de		; ...
 100+ A3CC 0D                                   dec	c		; ...
 101+ A3CD 10 F3        DIV16UNDOCSKIP:         djnz DIV16UNDOCLOOP
 102+ A3CF 47                                   ld   b,a
 103+ A3D0 C9                                   ret
 104+ A3D1 01 FF 00     DEV16ATooLarge:         ld     bc,$00FF
 105+ A3D4 C9                                   ret
 106+ A3D5
 107+ A3D5              ; "> asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
 108+ A3D5 06 08        asm_div8:               ld b,8
 109+ A3D7 AF                                   xor a
 110+ A3D8 CB 21        div8_loop:	            sla c
 111+ A3DA 17                                   rla
 112+ A3DB BA                                   cp d
 113+ A3DC 38 02                                jr c,div8_skip
 113+ A3DE
 114+ A3DE 0C                                   inc c
 115+ A3DF 92                                   sub d
 116+ A3E0 10 F6        div8_skip:	            djnz div8_loop
 117+ A3E2 C9                                   ret
 118+ A3E3              ; ">asm_div16: HL_Div_C: HL is the numerator,  C is the denominator, output A is the remainder, B is 0, C,DE is not changedHL is the quotient"
 119+ A3E3 06 10        asm_div16:              ld b,16
 120+ A3E5 AF                                   xor a
 121+ A3E6 CB 25        div16_loop:	            sla l
 122+ A3E8 CB 14                                rl	h
 123+ A3EA              ;    add hl,hl
 124+ A3EA 17                                   rla
 125+ A3EB B9                                   cp c
 126+ A3EC 38 02                                jr c,div16_skip
 127+ A3EE 2C                                   inc l
 128+ A3EF 91                                   sub c
 129+ A3F0 10 F4        div16_skip:		        djnz div16_loop
 130+ A3F2 C9                                   ret
 131+ A3F3              ;
 132+ A3F3              ; Divide 16-bit values (with 16-bit result)
 133+ A3F3              ; In: Divide BC by divider DE
 134+ A3F3              ; Out: BC = result, HL = rest
 135+ A3F3              ;
 136+ A3F3              HLDivC_Iteration: 	MACRO
 137+ A3F3 ~            					add	hl,hl		; unroll 16 times
 138+ A3F3 ~            					rla				; ...
 139+ A3F3 ~            					cp	c			; ...
 140+ A3F3 ~            					jr	1F
 141+ A3F3 ~            					sub	c			; ...
 142+ A3F3 ~            1:
 143+ A3F3 ~            					inc	l			; ...
 144+ A3F3              					ENDM
 145+ A3F3
 146+ A3F3
 147+ A3F3
 148+ A3F3              ; ">div1616: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder"
 149+ A3F3 21 00 00     Div1616:            ld hl,0
 150+ A3F6 78                               ld a,b
 151+ A3F7 06 08                            ld b,8
 152+ A3F9 17           .Div16_Loop1:       rla
 153+ A3FA ED 6A                            adc hl,hl
 154+ A3FC ED 52                            sbc hl,de
 155+ A3FE 30 01                            jr nc,.Div16_NoAdd1
 156+ A400 19                               add hl,de
 157+ A401 10 F6        .Div16_NoAdd1:      djnz .Div16_Loop1
 158+ A403 17                               rla
 159+ A404 2F                               cpl
 160+ A405 47                               ld b,a
 161+ A406 79                               ld a,c
 162+ A407 48                               ld c,b
 163+ A408 06 08                            ld b,8
 164+ A40A 17           .Div16_Loop2:       rla
 165+ A40B ED 6A                            adc hl,hl
 166+ A40D ED 52                            sbc hl,de
 167+ A40F 30 01                            jr nc,.Div16_NoAdd2
 168+ A411 19                               add hl,de
 169+ A412 10 F6        .Div16_NoAdd2:      djnz .Div16_Loop2
 170+ A414 17                               rla
 171+ A415 2F                               cpl
 172+ A416 41                               ld b,c
 173+ A417 4F                               ld c,a
 174+ A418 C9                               ret
 175+ A419
 176+ A419
 177+ A419
 178+ A419              BCDIVDE_Iteration: MACRO
 179+ A419 ~            				   rla
 180+ A419 ~            				   adc	hl,hl
 181+ A419 ~            				   add	hl,de
 182+ A419 ~            				   jr	c,1F
 183+ A419 ~            				   sbc	hl,de
 184+ A419 ~            1:
 185+ A419              				   ENDM
 186+ A419
 187+ A419
 188+ A419              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop"
 189+ A419              ;BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
 190+ A419              ;NOTE: BC/0 returns 0 as the quotient.
 191+ A419              ;min: 738cc
 192+ A419              ;max: 898cc
 193+ A419              ;avg: 818cc
 194+ A419              ;144 bytes
 195+ A419 AF           BC_Div_DE:              xor a
 196+ A41A 67                                   ld h,a
 197+ A41B 6F                                   ld l,a
 198+ A41C 93                                   sub e
 199+ A41D 5F                                   ld e,a
 200+ A41E 9F                                   sbc a,a
 201+ A41F 92                                   sub d
 202+ A420 57                                   ld d,a
 203+ A421 78                                   ld a,b
 204+ A422                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 204+ A422 17          >				   rla
 204+ A423 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 204+ A425 19          >				   add	hl,de
 204+ A426 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 204+ A428 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 204+ A42A             >1:
 205+ A42A                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 205+ A42A 17          >				   rla
 205+ A42B ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 205+ A42D 19          >				   add	hl,de
 205+ A42E 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 205+ A430 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 205+ A432             >1:
 206+ A432                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 206+ A432 17          >				   rla

 206+ A435 19          >				   add	hl,de
 206+ A436 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 206+ A438 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 206+ A43A             >1:
 207+ A43A                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 207+ A43A 17          >				   rla
 207+ A43B ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 207+ A43D 19          >				   add	hl,de
 207+ A43E 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 207+ A440 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 207+ A442             >1:
 208+ A442                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 208+ A442 17          >				   rla
 208+ A443 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 208+ A445 19          >				   add	hl,de
 208+ A446 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 208+ A448 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 208+ A44A             >1:
 209+ A44A                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 209+ A44A 17          >				   rla
 209+ A44B ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 209+ A44D 19          >				   add	hl,de
 209+ A44E 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 209+ A450 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 209+ A452             >1:
 210+ A452                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 210+ A452 17          >				   rla
 210+ A453 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 210+ A455 19          >				   add	hl,de
 210+ A456 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 210+ A458 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 210+ A45A             >1:
 211+ A45A                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 211+ A45A 17          >				   rla
 211+ A45B ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 211+ A45D 19          >				   add	hl,de
 211+ A45E 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 211+ A460 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 211+ A462             >1:
 212+ A462 17                                   rla
 213+ A463 47                                   ld b,a
 214+ A464
 215+ A464 79                                   ld a,c
 216+ A465                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 216+ A465 17          >				   rla
 216+ A466 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 216+ A468 19          >				   add	hl,de
 216+ A469 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 216+ A46B ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 216+ A46D             >1:
 217+ A46D                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 217+ A46D 17          >				   rla
 217+ A46E ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 217+ A470 19          >				   add	hl,de
 217+ A471 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 217+ A473 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 217+ A475             >1:
 218+ A475                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 218+ A475 17          >				   rla
 218+ A476 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 218+ A478 19          >				   add	hl,de
 218+ A479 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 218+ A47B ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 218+ A47D             >1:
 219+ A47D                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 219+ A47D 17          >				   rla
 219+ A47E ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 219+ A480 19          >				   add	hl,de
 219+ A481 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 219+ A483 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 219+ A485             >1:
 220+ A485                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 220+ A485 17          >				   rla
 220+ A486 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 220+ A488 19          >				   add	hl,de
 220+ A489 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 220+ A48B ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 220+ A48D             >1:
 221+ A48D                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 221+ A48D 17          >				   rla
 221+ A48E ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 221+ A490 19          >				   add	hl,de
 221+ A491 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 221+ A493 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 221+ A495             >1:
 222+ A495                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 222+ A495 17          >				   rla
 222+ A496 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 222+ A498 19          >				   add	hl,de
 222+ A499 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 222+ A49B ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 222+ A49D             >1:
 223+ A49D                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 223+ A49D 17          >				   rla
 223+ A49E ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 223+ A4A0 19          >				   add	hl,de
 223+ A4A1 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 223+ A4A3 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 223+ A4A5             >1:
 224+ A4A5 17                                   rla
 225+ A4A6 4F                                   ld c,a
 226+ A4A7 C9                                   ret
 227+ A4A8
 228+ A4A8              ;Inputs:
 229+ A4A8              ;     DE,BC are 8.8 Fixed Point numbers
 230+ A4A8              ;Outputs:
 231+ A4A8              ;     DE is the 8.8 Fixed Point result (rounded to the least significant bit)
 232+ A4A8              ;if DE is 0 : 122cc or 136cc if BC is negative
 233+ A4A8              ;if |BC|>=128*|DE| : 152cc or 166cc if BC is negative
 234+ A4A8              ;Otherwise:
 235+ A4A8              ;min: 1107cc
 236+ A4A8              ;max: 1319cc
 237+ A4A8              ;avg: 1201cc
 238+ A4A8 78           BC_Div_DE_88:           ld a,b  ; First, find out if the output is positive or negative
 239+ A4A9 AA                                   xor d
 240+ A4AA F5                                   push af   ;sign bit is the result sign bit
 241+ A4AB              ; Now make sure the inputs are positive
 242+ A4AB A8                                   xor b     ;A now has the value of B, since I XORed it with D twice (cancelling)
 243+ A4AC F2 B5 A4                             jp p,BC_Div_DE_88_lbl1   ;if Positive, don't negate
 244+ A4AF AF                                   xor a
 245+ A4B0 91                                   sub c
 246+ A4B1 4F                                   ld c,a
 247+ A4B2 9F                                   sbc a,a
 248+ A4B3 90                                   sub b
 249+ A4B4 47                                   ld b,a
 250+ A4B5 7A           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl1:      ld a,d  ;now make DE negative to optimize the remainder comparison
 251+ A4B6 B2                                   or d
 252+ A4B7 FA C0 A4                             jp m,BC_Div_DE_88_lbl2
 253+ A4BA AF                                   xor a
 254+ A4BB 93                                   sub e
 255+ A4BC 5F                                   ld e,a
 256+ A4BD 9F                                   sbc a,a
 257+ A4BE 92                                   sub d
 258+ A4BF 57                                   ld d,a
 259+ A4C0 B3           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl2:      or e      ;if DE is 0, we can call it an overflow ;A is the current value of D
 260+ A4C1 28 1D                                jr z,div_fixed88_overflow
 261+ A4C3 26 00                                ld h,0          ;The accumulator gets set to B if no overflow.;We can use H=0 to save a few cc in the meantime
 262+ A4C5 78                                   ld a,b;if B+DE>=0, then we'll have overflow
 263+ A4C6 83                                   add a,e
 264+ A4C7 7A                                   ld a,d
 265+ A4C8 8C                                   adc a,h
 266+ A4C9 38 15                                jr c,div_fixed88_overflow
 267+ A4CB 68                                   ld l,b  ;Now we can load the accumulator/remainder with B;H is already 0
 268+ A4CC 79                                   ld a,c
 269+ A4CD CD E8 A4                             call div_fixed88_sub
 270+ A4D0 4F                                   ld c,a
 271+ A4D1 78                                   ld a,b      ;A is now 0
 272+ A4D2 CD E8 A4                             call div_fixed88_sub
 273+ A4D5 51                                   ld d,c
 274+ A4D6 5F                                   ld e,a
 275+ A4D7 F1                                   pop af
 276+ A4D8 F0                                   ret p
 277+ A4D9 AF                                   xor a
 278+ A4DA 93                                   sub e
 279+ A4DB 5F                                   ld e,a
 280+ A4DC 9F                                   sbc a,a
 281+ A4DD 92                                   sub d
 282+ A4DE 57                                   ld d,a
 283+ A4DF C9                                   ret
 284+ A4E0
 285+ A4E0 11 FF 7F     div_fixed88_overflow:   ld de,$7FFF
 286+ A4E3 F1                                   pop af
 287+ A4E4 F0                                   ret p
 288+ A4E5 13                                   inc de
 289+ A4E6 1C                                   inc e
 290+ A4E7 C9                                   ret
 291+ A4E8
 292+ A4E8              ;min: 456cc
 293+ A4E8              ;max: 536cc
 294+ A4E8              ;avg: 496cc
 295+ A4E8 06 08        div_fixed88_sub:        ld b,8
 296+ A4EA 17           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl3:      rla
 297+ A4EB ED 6A                                adc hl,hl
 298+ A4ED 19                                   add hl,de
 299+ A4EE 38 02                                jr c,$+4
 300+ A4F0 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 301+ A4F2 10 F6                                djnz BC_Div_DE_88_lbl3
 302+ A4F4 8F                                   adc a,a
 303+ A4F5 C9                                   ret
 304+ A4F6
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
 928  A4F6                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
   1+ A4F6              asm_tis2:
   2+ A4F6              ; ">TIS2 A = (A / Q * 96) so A = -96 ---- 96  range "
   3+ A4F6              ; ">DOES NOT DO SIGNED YET"
   4+ A4F6 F5           	push af
   5+ A4F7 E6 7F            and SignMask8Bit
   6+ A4F9 57           	ld d,a				;; d = A
   7+ A4FA 3A 21 94     	ld a,(varQ)
   8+ A4FD 5F           	ld e,a
   9+ A4FE 7A           	ld a,d
  10+ A4FF BB           	cp e
  11+ A500 30 11        	jr nc, .tis2_set96	;; jump if a >= Q
  12+ A502 1E 60        	ld e, 96
  13+ A504 ED 30        	mul				; de = d * 96 (also a * 96 )
  14+ A506 EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ A507 3A 21 94     	ld a,(varQ)
  16+ A50A 4F           	ld c,a
  17+ A50B CD E3 A3     	call asm_div16
  18+ A50E F1           	pop af
  19+ A50F E6 80        	and $80
  20+ A511 B5           	or l
  21+ A512 C9           	ret
  22+ A513              .tis2_set96:
  23+ A513 F1           	pop af
  24+ A514 E6 80        	and $80
  25+ A516 F6 96        	or $96
  26+ A518 C9           	ret
  27+ A519
  28+ A519
  29+ A519              asm_unit_vector:
  30+ A519              squareregfx:
  31+ A519 3A 78 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  32+ A51C 57           	ld d,a
  33+ A51D 5F           	ld e,a
  34+ A51E ED 30        	mul
  35+ A520 EB           	ex de,hl
  36+ A521              squareregfy:
  37+ A521 3A 7A C0     	ld a, (UBnkYScaled)
  38+ A524 57           	ld d,a
  39+ A525 5F           	ld e,a
  40+ A526 ED 30        	mul
  41+ A528 19           	add hl,de
  42+ A529              squareregfz:
  43+ A529 3A 7C C0     	ld a, (UBnkZScaled)
  44+ A52C 57           	ld d,a
  45+ A52D 5F           	ld e,a
  46+ A52E ED 30        	mul
  47+ A530 19           	add hl,de
  48+ A531 EB           	ex de,hl			; de de to number to root
  49+ A532              hlequsquareroot:
  50+ A532 CD E6 A2     	call asm_sqrt		; hl = sqrt (fx^2 + fy^2 + fx^2)
  51+ A535 E5           	push hl				; save it for work 3 copies
  52+ A536 E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  53+ A537 E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  54+ A538              normfx:
  55+ A538 3A 78 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  56+ A53B E1           	pop hl				; get copy #1
  57+ A53C 7D           	ld a,l				; we assume only l had worthwhile data but could spill into h
  58+ A53D 4F           	ld c,a
  59+ A53E CD F6 A4     	call asm_tis2
  60+ A541 32 78 C0     	ld (UBnkXScaled),a
  61+ A544              normfy:
  62+ A544 3A 7A C0     	ld a,(UBnkYScaled)
  63+ A547 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  64+ A548 7D           	ld a,l
  65+ A549 4F           	ld c,a
  66+ A54A CD F6 A4     	call asm_tis2
  67+ A54D 32 7A C0     	ld (UBnkYScaled),a
  68+ A550              normfz:
  69+ A550 3A 7C C0     	ld a,(UBnkZScaled)
  70+ A553 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  71+ A554 7D           	ld a,l
  72+ A555 4F           	ld c,a
  73+ A556 CD F6 A4     	call asm_tis2
  74+ A559 32 7C C0     	ld (UBnkZScaled),a
  75+ A55C              asm_unit_vector_end:
  76+ A55C C9           	ret
  77+ A55D
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
 929  A55D                  INCLUDE "./Maths/compare16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/compare16.asm
   1+ A55D              ; Input:
   2+ A55D              ;       HL = 1st value
   3+ A55D              ;       DE = 2nd value
   4+ A55D              ; Output:
   5+ A55D              ;       CF, ZF = results of comparison:
   6+ A55D              ;
   7+ A55D              ;               CF      ZF      Result
   8+ A55D              ;               -----------------------------------
   9+ A55D              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  10+ A55D              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  11+ A55D              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  12+ A55D              ;               1       1       Impossible
  13+ A55D              ;
  14+ A55D
  15+ A55D E5           compare16HLDE:      push    hl
  16+ A55E A7                               and     a
  17+ A55F ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  18+ A561 E1                               pop     hl
  19+ A562 C9                               ret
  20+ A563
  21+ A563              ; With compare signed we do ABS comparison
  22+ A563              ; this is used for view ports as we just want to know if its +/- out side of 90 degrees
  23+ A563
  24+ A563 E5 D5        compare16HLDEABS:   push    hl,,de
  25+ A565 7C                               ld      a,h                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  26+ A566 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  27+ A568 67                               ld      h,a
  28+ A569 7A                               ld      a,d                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  29+ A56A E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  30+ A56C 57                               ld      d,a
  31+ A56D A7                               and     a
  32+ A56E ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  33+ A570 D1 E1                            pop     hl,,de
  34+ A572 C9                               ret
  35+ A573
  36+ A573
# file closed: ./Maths/compare16.asm
 930  A573                  INCLUDE "./Maths/negate16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/negate16.asm
   1+ A573              ;;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2+ A573              ;; 16-bit negate
   3+ A573              negate16:
   4+ A573              negate16hl:
   5+ A573                      ; Input:
   6+ A573                      ;       HL = value
   7+ A573                      ; Output:
   8+ A573                      ;       HL = -value
   9+ A573                      ; Destroys:
  10+ A573                      ;       AF
  11+ A573                      ;
  12+ A573 AF           	xor 	a
  13+ A574 95           	sub 	l
  14+ A575 6F           	ld 		l,a
  15+ A576 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  16+ A577 94           	sub 	h
  17+ A578 67           	ld 		h,a
  18+ A579 C9           	ret
  19+ A57A
  20+ A57A              negate16de:
  21+ A57A AF           	xor 	a
  22+ A57B 93           	sub 	e
  23+ A57C 5F           	ld 		e,a
  24+ A57D 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  25+ A57E 92           	sub 	d
  26+ A57F 57           	ld 		d,a
  27+ A580 C9           	ret
  28+ A581
  29+ A581              negate16bc:
  30+ A581 AF           	xor 	a
  31+ A582 91           	sub 	c
  32+ A583 4F           	ld 		c,a
  33+ A584 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  34+ A585 90           	sub 	b
  35+ A586 47           	ld 		b,a
  36+ A587 C9           	ret
  37+ A588
  38+ A588
  39+ A588              macronegate16hl:	MACRO
  40+ A588 ~            					xor 	a
  41+ A588 ~            					sub 	l
  42+ A588 ~            					ld 		l,a
  43+ A588 ~            					sbc 	a,a
  44+ A588 ~            					sub 	h
  45+ A588 ~            					ld 		h,a
  46+ A588              					ENDM
  47+ A588
  48+ A588              macronegate16de:	MACRO
  49+ A588 ~            					xor 	a
  50+ A588 ~                                sub 	e
  51+ A588 ~                                ld 		e,a
  52+ A588 ~                                sbc 	a,a
  53+ A588 ~                                sub 	d
  54+ A588 ~                                ld 		d,a
  55+ A588              					ENDM
  56+ A588              macronegate16bc:	MACRO
  57+ A588 ~            					xor 	a
  58+ A588 ~                                sub 	c
  59+ A588 ~                                ld 		c,a
  60+ A588 ~                                sbc 	a,a
  61+ A588 ~                                sub 	b
  62+ A588 ~                                ld 		b,a
  63+ A588              					ENDM
  64+ A588
  65+ A588              macronegate16ix:	MACRO
  66+ A588 ~            					xor 	a
  67+ A588 ~                                sub 	ixl
  68+ A588 ~                                ld 		ixl,a
  69+ A588 ~                                sbc 	a,a
  70+ A588 ~                                sub 	ixh
  71+ A588 ~                                ld 		ixh,a
  72+ A588              					ENDM

 931  A588                  INCLUDE "./Maths/normalise96.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
   1+ A588 DD 68        AequAdivDmul96Unsg:     ld			ixl,b						; Get sign bit passed in as bit 7 in b
   2+ A58A                                      JumpIfAGTENusng d, TISXAccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
   2+ A58A BA          >                        cp     d
   2+ A58B D2 A0 A5    >                        jp		nc,TISXAccGTEQ
   3+ A58E 4F                                   ld			c,a
   4+ A58F CD D5 A3                             call		asm_div8
   5+ A592 79                                   ld			a,c							; a = result
   6+ A593 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 4
   7+ A595 47                                   ld			b,a							; t = t /4
   8+ A596 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 8
   9+ A598 80                                   add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  10+ A599 47                                   ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  11+ A59A DD 7D                                ld			a,ixl						; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  12+ A59C E6 80                                and			$80							; recover sign only
  13+ A59E B0                                   or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  14+ A59F C9                                   ret
  15+ A5A0              TISXAccGTEQ:
  16+ A5A0              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  17+ A5A0 DD 7D                                ld			a,ixl     					; get saved sign from b
  18+ A5A2 E6 80                                and			$80							; copy of Acc
  19+ A5A4 F6 60                                or			$60							; unity
  20+ A5A6 C9                                   ret
  21+ A5A7
  22+ A5A7
  23+ A5A7
  24+ A5A7
  25+ A5A7              normaliseXX1596fast:
  26+ A5A7                  ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
  27+ A5A7 3A 78 C0     	ld		a,(XX15)		    ; XX15+0
  28+ A5AA DD 67        	ld		ixh,a               ; ixh = signed x component
  29+ A5AC E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; a = unsigned version
  30+ A5AE              N96SQX:
  31+ A5AE              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  31+ A5AE 5F          >			ld	e,a
  31+ A5AF 57          >			ld  d,a
  31+ A5B0 ED 30       >			mul
  32+ A5B2 62           	ld		h,d					; h == varR d = varO e= varA
  33+ A5B3 6B           	ld		l,e					; l == varQ  															:: so HL = XX15[x]^2
  34+ A5B4              N96SQY:
  35+ A5B4 3A 79 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+1)
  36+ A5B7 DD 6F        	ld		ixl,a               ; ixl = signed y componet
  37+ A5B9 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; = abs
  38+ A5BB              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[y]^2
  38+ A5BB 5F          >			ld	e,a
  38+ A5BC 57          >			ld  d,a
  38+ A5BD ED 30       >			mul
  39+ A5BF 19           	add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2
  40+ A5C0              N96SQZ:
  41+ A5C0 3A 7A C0     	ld		a,(XX15+2)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
  42+ A5C3 FD 67        	ld		iyh,a               ; iyh = signed
  43+ A5C5 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; unsigned
  44+ A5C7              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[z]^2
  44+ A5C7 5F          >			ld	e,a
  44+ A5C8 57          >			ld  d,a
  44+ A5C9 ED 30       >			mul
  45+ A5CB              N96SQADD:
  46+ A5CB 19           	add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2
  47+ A5CC EB           	ex		de,hl				; hl => de ready for square root
  48+ A5CD              N96SQRT:
  49+ A5CD CD E6 A2     	call	asm_sqrt			; hl = sqrt(XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2), we just are interested in l which is the new Q
  50+ A5D0              N96NORMX:
  51+ A5D0 3A 78 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+0)
  52+ A5D3 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  53+ A5D5 4F           	ld		c,a
  54+ A5D6 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  55+ A5D7 CD B4 A7     	call	AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  56+ A5DA 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  57+ A5DB DD 7C        	ld		a,ixh			;++SGN
  58+ A5DD E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  59+ A5DF B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  60+ A5E0 32 78 C0     	ld		(XX15+0),a
  61+ A5E3              N96NORMY:
  62+ A5E3 3A 79 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+1)
  63+ A5E6 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  64+ A5E8 4F           	ld		c,a
  65+ A5E9 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  66+ A5EA CD B4 A7     	call	AequAdivDmul96     	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  67+ A5ED 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  68+ A5EE DD 7D        	ld		a,ixl			;++SGN
  69+ A5F0 E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  70+ A5F2 B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  71+ A5F3 32 79 C0     	ld		(XX15+1),a
  72+ A5F6              N96NORMZ:
  73+ A5F6 3A 7A C0     	ld		a,(XX15+2)
  74+ A5F9 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  75+ A5FB 4F           	ld		c,a
  76+ A5FC 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  77+ A5FD CD B4 A7     	call	AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  78+ A600 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  79+ A601 FD 7C        	ld		a,iyh			;++SGN
  80+ A603 E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  81+ A605 B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  82+ A606 32 7A C0     	ld		(XX15+2),a
  83+ A609 C9           	ret
  84+ A60A
  85+ A60A              ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
  86+ A60A 3A 78 C0     normaliseXX1596:        ld		a,(XX15)		    ; XX15+0
  87+ A60D                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  87+ A60D 5F          >			ld	e,a
  87+ A60E 57          >			ld  d,a
  87+ A60F ED 30       >			mul
  88+ A611 7A                                   ld		a,d
  89+ A612 32 22 94                             ld		(varR),a			; R	 \ hi sum later use b
  90+ A615 7B                                   ld		a,e
  91+ A616 32 21 94                             ld		(varQ),a			; Q	 \ lo sum later use c
  92+ A619 32 C3 93                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum later just drop
  93+ A61C 3A 79 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
  94+ A61F                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  94+ A61F 5F          >			ld	e,a
  94+ A620 57          >			ld  d,a
  94+ A621 ED 30       >			mul
  95+ A623 7A                                   ld		a,d
  96+ A624 32 3F 94                             ld		(varT),a			; T	 \ hi sum
  97+ A627 7B                                   ld		a,e
  98+ A628 32 C3 93                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum
  99+ A62B 21 21 94                             ld		hl,varQ
 100+ A62E 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +Q
 101+ A62F 32 21 94                             ld		(varQ),a			; =>Q
 102+ A632 3A 3F 94                             ld		a,(varT)			;
 103+ A635 21 22 94                             ld		hl,varR
 104+ A638 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				;  R
 105+ A639 32 22 94                             ld		(varR),a			; R
 106+ A63C 3A 7A C0                             ld		a,(XX15+2)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
 107+ A63F                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
 107+ A63F 5F          >			ld	e,a
 107+ A640 57          >			ld  d,a
 107+ A641 ED 30       >			mul
 108+ A643 7A                                   ld		a,d
 109+ A644 32 3F 94                             ld		(varT),a			; T	 \ hi sum
 110+ A647 7B                                   ld		a,e
 111+ A648 32 C3 93                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum
 112+ A64B 21 21 94                             ld		hl,varQ
 113+ A64E 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +Q
 114+ A64F 32 21 94                             ld		(varQ),a			; =>Q  xlo2 + ylo2 + zlo2
 115+ A652 3A 3F 94                             ld		a,(varT)			; T temp Hi
 116+ A655 21 22 94                             ld		hl,varR
 117+ A658 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +R
 118+ A659 32 22 94                             ld		(varR),a			; R
 119+ A65C CD 09 A3                             call	sqrtQR				; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
 120+ A65F 3A 78 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+0)
 121+ A662 CD AE A7                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 122+ A665 32 78 C0                             ld		(XX15+0),a
 123+ A668 3A 79 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
 124+ A66B CD AE A7                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 125+ A66E 32 79 C0                             ld		(XX15+1),a
 126+ A671 3A 79 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
 127+ A674 CD AE A7                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 128+ A677 32 79 C0                             ld		(XX15+1),a
 129+ A67A C9                                   ret
 130+ A67B
 131+ A67B
# file closed: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
 932  A67B                  INCLUDE "./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
   1+ A67B              ;Number in hl to decimal ASCII
   2+ A67B              ;Thanks to z80 Bits
   3+ A67B              ;inputs:	hl = number to ASCII
   4+ A67B              ;example: hl=300 outputs '00300'
   5+ A67B              ;destroys: af, bc, hl, de used
   6+ A67B              DispHLtoDE:
   7+ A67B              ; "DispHL, writes HL to DE address"
   8+ A67B 01 F0 D8     	ld	bc,-10000
   9+ A67E CD 94 A6     	call	Num1
  10+ A681 01 18 FC     	ld	bc,-1000
  11+ A684 CD 94 A6     	call	Num1
  12+ A687 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  13+ A68A CD 94 A6     	call	Num1
  14+ A68D 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  15+ A68F CD 94 A6     	call	Num1
  16+ A692 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  17+ A694              Num1:
  18+ A694 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  19+ A696              .Num2:
  20+ A696 3C           	inc	a
  21+ A697 09           	add	hl,bc
  22+ A698 38 FC        	jr	c,.Num2
  23+ A69A ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  24+ A69C 12           	ld	(de),a
  25+ A69D 13           	inc	de
  26+ A69E C9           	ret
  27+ A69F
  28+ A69F              DispAtoDE:
  29+ A69F 26 00        	ld h,0
  30+ A6A1 6F           	ld l,a
  31+ A6A2 C3 7B A6     	jp DispHLtoDE
  32+ A6A5
  33+ A6A5              DispPriceAtoDE:
  34+ A6A5 26 00        	ld h,0
  35+ A6A7 6F           	ld l,a
  36+ A6A8 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  37+ A6AB CD BB A6     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  38+ A6AE 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  39+ A6B0 CD 94 A6     	call	Num1
  40+ A6B3 3E 2E        	ld		a,'.'					; we could assume preformat but
  41+ A6B5 12           	ld		(de),a					; we can optimse that later TODO
  42+ A6B6 13           	inc		de						; with just an inc De
  43+ A6B7 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  44+ A6B9 18 D9        	jr		Num1
  45+ A6BB              .NumLeadBlank1:
  46+ A6BB 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  47+ A6BD              .NumLeadBlank2:
  48+ A6BD 3C           	inc	a
  49+ A6BE 09           	add	hl,bc
  50+ A6BF 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  51+ A6C1 FE 30        	cp	'0'
  52+ A6C3 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  53+ A6C5              .Blank:
  54+ A6C5 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  55+ A6C7              .DontBlank:
  56+ A6C7 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  57+ A6C9 12           	ld	(de),a
  58+ A6CA 13           	inc	de
  59+ A6CB C9           	ret
  60+ A6CC
  61+ A6CC              DispQtyAtoDE:
  62+ A6CC FE 00        	cp	0
  63+ A6CE 28 23        	jr	z,.NoStock
  64+ A6D0 26 00        	ld h,0
  65+ A6D2 6F           	ld l,a
  66+ A6D3 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  67+ A6D6 CD E2 A6     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  68+ A6D9 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  69+ A6DB CD E2 A6     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  70+ A6DE 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  71+ A6E0 18 B2        	jr		Num1
  72+ A6E2              .NumLeadBlank1:
  73+ A6E2 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  74+ A6E4              .NumLeadBlank2:
  75+ A6E4 3C           	inc	a
  76+ A6E5 09           	add	hl,bc
  77+ A6E6 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  78+ A6E8 FE 30        	cp	'0'
  79+ A6EA 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  80+ A6EC              .Blank:
  81+ A6EC 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  82+ A6EE              .DontBlank:
  83+ A6EE ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  84+ A6F0 12           	ld	(de),a
  85+ A6F1 13           	inc	de
  86+ A6F2 C9           	ret
  87+ A6F3              .NoStock:
  88+ A6F3 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  89+ A6F5 12           	ld	(de),a
  90+ A6F6 13           	inc	de
  91+ A6F7 12           	ld	(de),a
  92+ A6F8 13           	inc	de
  93+ A6F9 3E 2D        	ld	a,'-'
  94+ A6FB 12           	ld	(de),a
  95+ A6FC 13           	inc de
  96+ A6FD C9           	ret
  97+ A6FE
  98+ A6FE
  99+ A6FE              ;### CLCN32 -> Converts 32Bit-Value in ASCII-String (terminated by 0)
 100+ A6FE              ;### Input      DE,IX=32bit value, IY=destination address
 101+ A6FE              ;### Output     IY=last char in destination string
 102+ A6FE              ;### Destroyed AF,BC,DE,HL,IX
 103+ A6FE 01 00 00 00  clcn32t dw 1,0,     10,0,     100,0,     1000,0,       10000,0
 103+ A702 0A 00 00 00
 103+ A706 64 00 00 00
 103+ A70A E8 03 00 00
 103+ A70E 10 27 00 00
 104+ A712 A0 86 01 00          dw $86a0,1, $4240,$0f, $9680,$98, $e100,$05f5, $ca00,$3b9a
 104+ A716 40 42 0F 00
 104+ A71A 80 96 98 00
 104+ A71E 00 E1 F5 05
 104+ A722 00 CA 9A 3B
 105+ A726 00 00 00 00  clcn32z ds 4
 106+ A72A
 107+ A72A              ; As per display but shifts final digit by 1 and puts in "." for 1 decimal place
 108+ A72A CD 39 A7     DispDEIXtoIY1DP:        call    DispDEIXtoIY
 109+ A72D FD 7E 00                             ld      a,(IY+0)
 110+ A730 FD 77 01                             ld      (IY+1),a
 111+ A733 3E 2E                                ld      a,"."
 112+ A735 FD 77 00                             ld      (IY+0),a
 113+ A738 C9                                   ret
 114+ A739
 115+ A739 DD 22 26 A7  DispDEIXtoIY:           ld (clcn32z),ix
 116+ A73D ED 53 28 A7                          ld (clcn32z+2),de
 117+ A741 DD 21 22 A7                          ld ix,clcn32t+36
 118+ A745 06 09                                ld b,9
 119+ A747 0E 00                                ld c,0
 120+ A749 3E 30        .clcn321:               ld a,'0'
 121+ A74B B7                                   or a
 122+ A74C DD 5E 00     .clcn322:               ld e,(ix+0)
 123+ A74F DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 124+ A752 2A 26 A7                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 125+ A755 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 126+ A757 22 26 A7                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 127+ A75A DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 128+ A75D DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 129+ A760 2A 28 A7                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 130+ A763 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 131+ A765 22 28 A7                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 132+ A768 38 04                                jr c,.clcn325
 133+ A76A 0C                                   inc c
 134+ A76B 3C                                   inc a
 135+ A76C 18 DE                                jr .clcn322
 136+ A76E DD 5E 00     .clcn325:               ld e,(ix+0)
 137+ A771 DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 138+ A774 2A 26 A7                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 139+ A777 19                                   add hl,de
 140+ A778 22 26 A7                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 141+ A77B DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 142+ A77E DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 143+ A781 2A 28 A7                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 144+ A784 ED 5A                                adc hl,de
 145+ A786 22 28 A7                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 146+ A789 11 FC FF                             ld de,-4
 147+ A78C DD 19                                add ix,de
 148+ A78E 0C                                   inc c
 149+ A78F 0D                                   dec c
 150+ A790 28 05                                jr z,.clcn323
 151+ A792 FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 152+ A795 FD 23                                inc iy
 153+ A797 10 B0        .clcn323:               djnz .clcn321
 154+ A799 3A 26 A7                             ld a,(clcn32z)
 155+ A79C C6 30                                add A,'0'
 156+ A79E FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 157+ A7A1 FD 36 01 00                          ld (iy+1),0
 158+ A7A5 C9                                   ret
 159+ A7A6
# file closed: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
 933  A7A6              ;INCLUDE "badd_ll38.asm"
 934  A7A6              ;;INCLUDE "XX12equXX15byXX16.asm"
 935  A7A6                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
   1+ A7A6
   2+ A7A6              ; USES 			A DE BC
   3+ A7A6              ; DOES NOT USE 	HL
   4+ A7A6              TIS2962C:		; two's compliment entry point, exits not 2's compliment
   5+ A7A6 CB 7F        	bit			7,a
   6+ A7A8 28 04        	jr			z,AequAdivQmul96
   7+ A7AA ED 44        	neg										; revers 2s'c and just set neg bit
   8+ A7AC CB FF        	set			7,a
   9+ A7AE              ; Note negative numbers are bit 7 set not 2's compliment
  10+ A7AE              AequAdivQmul96:								; TIS296:			; .tis2 A = A /Q *96 (or A = A * 3/8 * Q) Reduce Acc in NORM routine i.e. *96/Q clamps at +- 96
  11+ A7AE              TIS2:
  12+ A7AE 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc
  13+ A7AF 3A 21 94     	ld			a,(varQ)
  14+ A7B2 57           	ld			d,a							; d = varQ
  15+ A7B3 79           	ld			a,c							; recover a
  16+ A7B4              AequAdivDmul96:
  17+ A7B4 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc as we need the sign, alternate entry point assuming D preloaded, wastes an "ld c,a" but simplifies code
  18+ A7B5 E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit				; ignore sign
  19+ A7B7              	JumpIfAGTENusng d, TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
  19+ A7B7 BA          >                        cp     d
  19+ A7B8 D2 D8 A7    >                        jp		nc,TIS2AccGTEQ
  20+ A7BB 06 FE        	ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
  21+ A7BD              TIS2RollTLoop:									; .TIL2	; roll T
  22+ A7BD CB 27        	sla			a
  23+ A7BF              	JumpIfALTNusng d,TIS2SkipSub            ; a < d so don;t subtract
  23+ A7BF BA          >                        cp      d
  23+ A7C0 DA DE A7    >                        jp		c, TIS2SkipSub
  24+ A7C3 9A           	sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
  25+ A7C4 37           	scf
  26+ A7C5 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  27+ A7C7 38 F4        	jr			c,TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  28+ A7C9              TIS2SKIPCont:
  29+ A7C9 78           	ld			a,b							; T
  30+ A7CA CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 2
  31+ A7CC CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 4
  32+ A7CE 47           	ld			b,a							; t = t /4
  33+ A7CF CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 8
  34+ A7D1 80           	add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  35+ A7D2 47           	ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  36+ A7D3 79           	ld			a,c							; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  37+ A7D4 E6 80        	and			$80							; recover sign only
  38+ A7D6 B0           	or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  39+ A7D7 C9           	ret
  40+ A7D8              TIS2AccGTEQ:
  41+ A7D8              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  42+ A7D8 79           	ld			a,c
  43+ A7D9 E6 80        	and			$80							; copy of Acc
  44+ A7DB F6 60        	or			$60							; unity
  45+ A7DD C9           	ret
  46+ A7DE              TIS2SkipSub:
  47+ A7DE B7           	or			a
  48+ A7DF CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  49+ A7E1 38 DA        	jr			c,TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  50+ A7E3 C3 C9 A7     	jp			TIS2SKIPCont
  51+ A7E6
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
 936  A7E6                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
   1+ A7E6              fmltu:
   2+ A7E6              AequAmulQdiv256:
   3+ A7E6              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=A*Q/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   4+ A7E6 57           	ld	d,a
   5+ A7E7 3A 21 94     	ld	a,(varQ)
   6+ A7EA 5F           	ld	e,a
   7+ A7EB ED 30        	mul
   8+ A7ED 7A           	ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   9+ A7EE C9           	ret
  10+ A7EF
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
 937  A7EF                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
   1+ A7EF              ; "DV42,DV42IYH DE = P.R, c = R"
   2+ A7EF              DV42IYH:									; as per DV42 but using iyl for Y reg
   3+ A7EF 21 0A 97     		ld		hl,varDustZ
   4+ A7F2 FD 7D        		ld		a,iyl
   5+ A7F4 ED 31        		add		hl,a
   6+ A7F6 7E           		ld		a,(hl)
   7+ A7F7 C3 03 A8     		jp		DV41
   8+ A7FA              DV42:										; travel step of dust particle front/rear
   9+ A7FA 21 0A 97     		ld		hl,varDustZ
  10+ A7FD 3A B1 93     		ld		a,(regY)
  11+ A800 ED 31        		add		hl,a
  12+ A802 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; a = SZ[y]
  13+ A803              DV41:										; P.R = speed/ (ZZ/8) dust left/right
  14+ A803 5F           		ld		e,a							; using E as Q var replacement
  15+ A804 3A 1D 94     		ld		a,(DELTA)					; DELTA \ speed, how far has dust moved based on its z-coord.
  16+ A807              DVID4:										; P-R=A/Qunsg  \P.R = A/Q unsigned called by Hall
  17+ A807 06 08        		ld		b,8							; counter
  18+ A809 CB 27        		sla		a							;
  19+ A80B 57           		ld		d,a							; use d for - p = delta * 2
  20+ A80C AF           		xor		a
  21+ A80D              DVL4:										; counter x loop (b reg)
  22+ A80D CB 17        		rl		a							; a = a * 2
  23+ A80F 38 03        		jr		c,DV8						; jump on carry
  24+ A811 BB           		cp		e							; var Q
  25+ A812 38 02        		jr		c,DV5						; skip subtraction
  26+ A814              DV8:
  27+ A814 9B           		sbc		a,e							; a = a - q (with carry)
  28+ A815 37           		scf									;  carry gets set
  29+ A816              DV5:										; skipped subtraction
  30+ A816 CB 12        		rl		d							; d (P hi)
  31+ A818 10 F3        		djnz	DVL4						; dec b and loop loop X, hi left in P.
  32+ A81A              .CalcRemainder:								; BFRDIV R=A*256/Q
  33+ A81A              ; Note we are not going to call LL28+4 but inline code here:
  34+ A81A 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; remainder R for AofQ *256/Q
  35+ A81C 4F           		ld		c,a							; use c as R var
  36+ A81D              .RollRemainder:
  37+ A81D CB 27        		sla		a
  38+ A81F 38 11        		jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  39+ A821 B8           		cp		b							; a < q?
  40+ A822 30 01        		jr		nc,.DontSBC
  41+ A824              .DoSBC:										; a is < q
  42+ A824 98           		sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  43+ A825              .DontSBC:
  44+ A825 CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1
  45+ A827 38 F4        		jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  46+ A829 79           		ld		a,c
  47+ A82A 32 22 94     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  48+ A82D 7A           		ld		a,d
  49+ A82E 32 C3 93     		ld		(varP),a
  50+ A831 C9           		ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  51+ A832              .Reduce:									; a geneated a carry
  52+ A832 98           		sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  53+ A833 37           		scf									; set carry flag for rl
  54+ A834 CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  55+ A836 38 E5        		jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  56+ A838 79           		ld		a,c
  57+ A839 32 22 94     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  58+ A83C 7A           		ld		a,d
  59+ A83D 32 C3 93     		ld		(varP),a
  60+ A840 C9           		ret
  61+ A841              .AnswerTooBig:
  62+ A841 0E FF        		ld		c,$FF						; arse its too big
  63+ A843 79           		ld		a,c
  64+ A844 32 22 94     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  65+ A847 7A           		ld		a,d
  66+ A848 32 C3 93     		ld		(varP),a
  67+ A84B C9           		ret
  68+ A84C
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
 938  A84C                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm
   1+ A84C
   2+ A84C              asm_defmutl:
   3+ A84C              AequDmulEdiv256usgn:
   4+ A84C              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=D*E/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   5+ A84C ED 30        	mul
   6+ A84E 7A           	ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   7+ A84F C9           	ret
   8+ A850
   9+ A850
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm
 939  A850              ;INCLUDE "AP2equAPmulQunsgEorP-MLTU2.asm"
 940  A850              ;INCLUDE "APequPmulQUnsg-MULTU.asm"
 941  A850              ;INCLUDE "APequPmulX-MU11.asm"
 942  A850                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
   1+ A850              APequQmulA:
   2+ A850              asm_mult1:
   3+ A850              ; "ASM_MULT1 (DE) A(hi).P(lo) = Q * A first part of MAD, multiply and add. Visited Quite often. A=hi P = lo also returns result in DE"
   4+ A850 FE 00        	cp	0
   5+ A852 28 1F        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its Q * 0
   6+ A854 5F           	ld	e,a
   7+ A855 3A 21 94     	ld	a,(varQ)
   8+ A858 57           	ld	d,a
   9+ A859 FE 00        	cp	0				; compare a
  10+ A85B 28 16        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its 0 * a
  11+ A85D AB           	xor	e				; -- = + +- = - -+ = - ++ = +
  12+ A85E E6 80        	and $80				; get the resultant sign and save into b
  13+ A860 47           	ld	b,a
  14+ A861 7A           	ld	a,d
  15+ A862 E6 7F        	and	SignMask8Bit	; now strip off sign bits
  16+ A864 57           	ld	d,a
  17+ A865 7B           	ld	a,e
  18+ A866 E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  19+ A868 5F           	ld	e,a
  20+ A869 ED 30        	mul					; zxn de = d * e
  21+ A86B 7B           	ld	a,e
  22+ A86C 32 C3 93     	ld	(varP),a		; p = lo
  23+ A86F 7A           	ld	a,d				; a = hi
  24+ A870 B0           	or	b				; de goes to a and varP also re-do sign bit
  25+ A871 57           	ld	d,a				; we will work with de having result as we may bin vars later
  26+ A872 C9           	ret
  27+ A873              .mul0:
  28+ A873 AF           	xor	a
  29+ A874 32 C3 93     	ld	(varP),a
  30+ A877 57           	ld	d,a
  31+ A878 5F           	ld  e,a
  32+ A879 C9           	ret
  33+ A87A
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
 943  A87A                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
   1+ A87A              baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
   2+ A87A              SAEquSRPlusAQ:
   3+ A87A              ; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
   4+ A87A              ;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
   5+ A87A              ; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
   6+ A87A              ; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
   7+ A87A              ; so need to fix the issue with carry flag not returning a fault correctly
   8+ A87A              LL38:
   9+ A87A              ;	ld		d,a
  10+ A87A              ;	ld		a,(varQ)
  11+ A87A              ;	ld		e,a
  12+ A87A              ;	ld		a,(varS)
  13+ A87A              ;	ld		h,a
  14+ A87A              ;	ld		a,(varR)
  15+ A87A              ;	ld		l,a
  16+ A87A              ;	call	ADDHLDESignedv3
  17+ A87A              ;	ld		a,h
  18+ A87A              ;	ld		(varS),a
  19+ A87A              ;	ld		a,l
  20+ A87A              ;	ret
  21+ A87A              ; calculation table
  22+ A87A              ;   R     Q    Op            Sign calc
  23+ A87A              ;	10    5    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  24+ A87A              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  25+ A87A              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  26+ A87A              ;	-10  -5    ABS Add       -    sign same add R sign
  27+ A87A              ;   5    10    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  28+ A87A              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  29+ A87A              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  30+ A87A              ;   -5   -10   ABS  add      -    sign same add R sign
  31+ A87A
  32+ A87A              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  33+ A87A              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  34+ A87A              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  35+ A87A              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  36+ A87A
  37+ A87A
  38+ A87A              ; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  39+ A87A 21 23 94     	ld		hl,varS							;
  40+ A87D AE           	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  41+ A87E FA 89 A8     	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  42+ A881 3A 21 94     	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  43+ A884 21 22 94     	ld		hl,varR
  44+ A887 86           	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  45+ A888 C9           	ret										; Done carry set if overflow
  46+ A889              .LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
  47+ A889 3A 22 94     	ld		a,(varR)						; a = R
  48+ A88C 21 21 94     	ld		hl,varQ                         ; Q
  49+ A88F              ;--	JumpIfALTMemHLusng LL39SwapSubtraction	; if a < (hl) then do LL39SwapSubtraction
  50+ A88F              	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
  50+ A88F B7          >                    or a
  51+ A890 9E           	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q which as R >= Q will always be a positive result
  52+ A891 38 01            jr      c,.LL39SignCorrection
  53+ A893              ;--    jr      a,.LL39ResultZero
  54+ A893              ;--   JumpIfNegative LL39SignCorrection		; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
  55+ A893              ;--	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
  56+ A893 C9           	ret
  57+ A894              .LL39SignCorrection:
  58+ A894 FE 00            cp      0                               ; if its 0 then neg will affect flag so we just zero result to save compute
  59+ A896 28 0E            jr      z,.LL39ResultZero
  60+ A898 ED 44            neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
  61+ A89A 08           	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
  62+ A89B 3A 23 94     	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
  63+ A89E EE 80        	xor		$80							    ;
  64+ A8A0 32 23 94     	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
  65+ A8A3 08           	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
  66+ A8A4                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry as NEG instrunction sets it for non zero
  66+ A8A4 B7          >                    or a
  67+ A8A5 C9           	ret
  68+ A8A6              .LL39ResultZero:
  69+ A8A6 32 23 94         ld      (varS),a                        ; a is zero at this stage so set sign as well
  70+ A8A9                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry
  70+ A8A9 B7          >                    or a
  71+ A8AA C9               ret
  72+ A8AB              ;--LL39SwapSubtraction:
  73+ A8AB              ;--	push	bc
  74+ A8AB              ;--	ld		b,a
  75+ A8AB              ;--	ld		a,(hl)
  76+ A8AB              ;--	sub		b
  77+ A8AB              ;--	pop		bc
  78+ A8AB              ;--	ex		af,af'							; do we flip here or negate. i think its flip as its overflowed unsigned
  79+ A8AB              ;--	ld		a,(varS)
  80+ A8AB              ;--	xor		$80
  81+ A8AB              ;--	ld		(varS),a
  82+ A8AB              ;--	ex		af,af'
  83+ A8AB              ;--	ret
  84+ A8AB
  85+ A8AB              ;;;;	baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
  86+ A8AB              ;;;;; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
  87+ A8AB              ;;;;;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
  88+ A8AB              ;;;;; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
  89+ A8AB              ;;;;; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
  90+ A8AB              ;;;;LL38:
  91+ A8AB              ;;;;; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  92+ A8AB              ;;;;	ld		hl,varS							;
  93+ A8AB              ;;;;	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  94+ A8AB              ;;;;	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  95+ A8AB              ;;;;	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  96+ A8AB              ;;;;	ld		hl,varR
  97+ A8AB              ;;;;	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  98+ A8AB              ;;;;	ret										; Done
  99+ A8AB              ;;;;.LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
 100+ A8AB              ;;;;	ld		hl,varQ                         ;
 101+ A8AB              ;;;;	ld		a,(hl)
 102+ A8AB              ;;;;	JumpIfAGTENusng 128,LL39Sub16bit		; does this need to be 16 bit
 103+ A8AB              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)						;
 104+ A8AB              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
 105+ A8AB              ;;;;	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q
 106+ A8AB              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection				; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
 107+ A8AB              ;;;;	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
 108+ A8AB              ;;;;	ret
 109+ A8AB              ;;;;.SignCorrection:
 110+ A8AB              ;;;;    neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
 111+ A8AB              ;;;;	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
 112+ A8AB              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 113+ A8AB              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 114+ A8AB              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 115+ A8AB              ;;;;	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
 116+ A8AB              ;;;;	ret
 117+ A8AB              ;;;;LL39Sub16Bit:
 118+ A8AB              ;;;;	ld		e,a
 119+ A8AB              ;;;;	ld		d,0
 120+ A8AB              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)
 121+ A8AB              ;;;;	ld		l,a
 122+ A8AB              ;;;;	ld		h,0
 123+ A8AB              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag
 124+ A8AB              ;;;;	sbc		hl,de
 125+ A8AB              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection16bit
 126+ A8AB              ;;;;	bit		7,h
 127+ A8AB              ;;;;	jr		z,.GoodToReturn
 128+ A8AB              ;;;;.Needtonegate:
 129+ A8AB              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 130+ A8AB              ;;;;.GoodToReturn
 131+ A8AB              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 132+ A8AB              ;;;;	or		a
 133+ A8AB              ;;;;	ret
 134+ A8AB              ;;;;.SignCorrection16bit:
 135+ A8AB              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 136+ A8AB              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 137+ A8AB              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 138+ A8AB              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 139+ A8AB              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 140+ A8AB              ;;;;	ret
 141+ A8AB
 142+ A8AB

# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/moveship4-MVS4.asm
   1+ A8AB              ; Note comparing hl vs iY, you need at least 3 incs or decs for hl to be slower
   2+ A8AB              ; it may be faster though if we can use hl to avoid memory actions if needed
   3+ A8AB              ; need to optimise mad as push hl pop hl and use de doesn't really improve speed
   4+ A8AB
   5+ A8AB
   6+ A8AB              moveship4Yreg:
   7+ A8AB 3A B1 93     		ld		a,(regY)
   8+ A8AE 47           		ld		b,a
   9+ A8AF              moveship4breg:
  10+ A8AF              		; b = Y index, 9 = nosev, 15 = roofv 21 = sidev
  11+ A8AF              MVS4PitchAlphaRollBeta:
  12+ A8AF              MVS4:										;.MVS4	\ -> &52A1 \ Moveship4, Y is matrix row, pitch&roll update to coordinates
  13+ A8AF 3A DD 93     		ld		a,(ALPHA)					;  ALPHA
  14+ A8B2 32 21 94     		ld		(varQ),a					; player ship's roll Q = Alpha
  15+ A8B5 21 0E C0     		ld		hl,UBnKxsgn
  16+ A8B8 78           		ld		a,b							; from
  17+ A8B9 ED 31        		add		hl,a
  18+ A8BB 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+2,Y
  19+ A8BC 32 22 94     		ld		(varR),a					; R  \ lo
  20+ A8BF 23           		inc		hl
  21+ A8C0 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+3,Y
  22+ A8C1 32 23 94     		ld		(varS),a					; S  \ hi		SR = nosev_y (or axis y)
  23+ A8C4 2B           		dec		hl
  24+ A8C5 2B           		dec		hl
  25+ A8C6 2B           		dec		hl							;
  26+ A8C7 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+0,Y
  27+ A8C8 32 C3 93     		ld		(varP),a					; P  \ over-written	 P = nosevx lo
  28+ A8CB 23           		inc		hl
  29+ A8CC 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+1,Y
  30+ A8CD EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip sign  AP = nosevx * - 1
  31+ A8CF CD E0 A1     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; MAD	\ DE = X.A = alpha*INWK+1,Y + INWK+2to3,Y
  32+ A8D2 23                   inc     hl
  33+ A8D3 23                   inc     hl
  34+ A8D4 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+3,Y \ hi
  35+ A8D5 2B                   dec     hl
  36+ A8D6 3A B0 93             ld      a,(regX)
  37+ A8D9 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+2,Y \ Y=Y-aX   \ their comment
  38+ A8DA 32 C3 93             ld      (varP),a                    ;  P
  39+ A8DD 2B                   dec     hl
  40+ A8DE 2B                   dec     hl
  41+ A8DF 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+0,Y
  42+ A8E0 32 22 94             ld      (varR),a                    ;  R	\ lo
  43+ A8E3 23                   inc     hl
  44+ A8E4 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;  INWK+1,Y
  45+ A8E5 32 23 94             ld      (varS),a                    ; S	\ hi
  46+ A8E8 23                   inc     hl
  47+ A8E9 23                   inc     hl
  48+ A8EA 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+3,Y
  49+ A8EB CD E0 A1             call    madXAequQmulAaddRS          ; MAD	\ X.A = alpha*INWK+3,Y + INWK+0to1,Y
  50+ A8EE 2B                   dec     hl
  51+ A8EF 2B                   dec     hl
  52+ A8F0 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+1,Y  \ hi
  53+ A8F1 3A B0 93             ld      a,(regX)
  54+ A8F4 2B                   dec     hl
  55+ A8F5 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+0,Y  \ X=X+aY   \ their comment
  56+ A8F6 32 C3 93             ld      (varP),a                    ; P
  57+ A8F9 3A CE 93             ld      a,(BETA)                    ; BETA
  58+ A8FC 32 21 94             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q	\ player ship's pitch
  59+ A8FF 23                   inc     hl
  60+ A900 23                   inc     hl
  61+ A901 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+2,Y
  62+ A902 32 22 94             ld      (varR),a                    ; R	\ lo
  63+ A905 23                   inc     hl
  64+ A906 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+3,Y
  65+ A907 32 23 94             ld      (varS),a                    ; S	\ hi
  66+ A90A 23                   inc     hl
  67+ A90B 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+4,Y
  68+ A90C 32 C3 93             ld      (varP),a                    ; P	\ lo
  69+ A90F 23                   inc     hl
  70+ A910 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+5,Y
  71+ A911 EE 80                xor     $80                         ; flip sign hi
  72+ A913 CD E0 A1             call    madXAequQmulAaddRS          ; MAD	\ X.A =-beta*INWK+5,Y + INWK+2to3,Y
  73+ A916 2B                   dec     hl
  74+ A917 2B                   dec     hl
  75+ A918 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+3,Y \ hi
  76+ A919 3A B0 93             ld      a,(regX)
  77+ A91C 2B                   dec     hl
  78+ A91D 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+2,Y \ Y=Y-bZ  \ their comment
  79+ A91E 32 C3 93             ld      (varP),a                    ; P
  80+ A921 23                   inc     hl
  81+ A922 23                   inc     hl
  82+ A923 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+4,Y
  83+ A924 32 22 94             ld      (varR),a                    ; R	\ lo
  84+ A927 23                   inc     hl
  85+ A928 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+5,Y
  86+ A929 32 23 94             ld      (varS),a                    ; S	\ hi
  87+ A92C 2B                   dec     hl
  88+ A92D 2B                   dec     hl
  89+ A92E 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+3,Y
  90+ A92F CD E0 A1             call    madXAequQmulAaddRS          ; MAD	\ X.A = beta*INWK+3,Y + INWK+4,5,Y
  91+ A932 23                   inc     hl
  92+ A933 23                   inc     hl

 945  A93B              ;INCLUDE "MoveShip5-MVS5.asm"
 946  A93B              ;INCLUDE "PAequAmulQusgn-MLU2.asm"
 947  A93B              ;INCLUDE "PAequDustYIdxYmulQ-MLU1.asm"
 948  A93B              ;INCLUDE "PlanetP12addInwkX-MVT6.asm"
 949  A93B                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
   1+ A93B              ;;;LL28:
   2+ A93B              ;;;    ld      c,a                         ;
   3+ A93B              ;;;    ld      a,(varQ)                    ;
   4+ A93B              ;;;    ld      b,a                         ;
   5+ A93B              ;;;    ld      a,c                         ; Get varQ into b and retain c
   6+ A93B              ;;;RequAmul256divB:                        ;
   7+ A93B              ;;;LL28Breg:
   8+ A93B              ;;;; "BFRDIV R = (A * 256 / Q)  byte from remainder of division, not signed a = a, b = q, c = r"
   9+ A93B              ;;;	cp		b							; Check A >= Q
  10+ A93B              ;;;	jr		nc, .AnswerTooBig			; A >= Q? yes too big
  11+ A93B              ;;;.CalcRemainder:
  12+ A93B              ;;;	ld		c, 	$FE						; set R to $FE
  13+ A93B              ;;;.RollRemainder:
  14+ A93B              ;;;	sla		a
  15+ A93B              ;;;	jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  16+ A93B              ;;;	cp		b							; a < q?
  17+ A93B              ;;;	jr		nc,.DontSBC
  18+ A93B              ;;;.DoSBC:									; a is < q
  19+ A93B              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  20+ A93B              ;;;.DontSBC:
  21+ A93B              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1
  22+ A93B              ;;;	jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  23+ A93B              ;;;    ld      a,c
  24+ A93B              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  25+ A93B              ;;;	ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  26+ A93B              ;;;.Reduce:								; a geneated a carry
  27+ A93B              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  28+ A93B              ;;;	scf									; set carry flag for rl
  29+ A93B              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  30+ A93B              ;;;	jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  31+ A93B              ;;;    ld      a,c
  32+ A93B              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  33+ A93B              ;;;	ret
  34+ A93B              ;;;.AnswerTooBig:
  35+ A93B              ;;;	ld	    c,$FF							; arse its too big
  36+ A93B              ;;;    ld      a,c
  37+ A93B              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  38+ A93B              ;;;	ret
  39+ A93B
  40+ A93B              BCequAmul256DivC:
  41+ A93B 59             ld    e,c
  42+ A93C 67             ld    h,a
  43+ A93D 2E 00          ld    l,0
  44+ A93F              AdivEDivide:                             ; this routine performs the operation BC=HL/E
  45+ A93F 7B             ld a,e                                 ; checking the divisor; returning if it is zero
  46+ A940 B7             or a                                   ; from this time on the carry is cleared
  47+ A941 C8             ret z
  48+ A942 01 FF FF       ld bc,-1                               ; BC is used to accumulate the result
  49+ A945 16 00          ld d,0                                 ; clearing D, so DE holds the divisor
  50+ A947              AdivEDivLoop:                            ; subtracting DE from HL until the first overflow
  51+ A947 ED 52          sbc hl,de                              ; since the carry is zero, SBC works as if it was a SUB
  52+ A949 03             inc bc                                 ;  note that this instruction does not alter the flags
  53+ A94A 30 FB          jr nc,AdivEDivLoop                     ; no carry means that there was no overflow
  54+ A94C C9             ret
  55+ A94D
  56+ A94D              HL_Div_C:
  57+ A94D              ; Integer divides HL by C
  58+ A94D              ; Result in HL, remainder in A
  59+ A94D              ; Clobbers F, B
  60+ A94D 06 10                ld b,16
  61+ A94F AF                   xor a
  62+ A950              HL_Div_C_Loop:
  63+ A950 29                   add hl,hl
  64+ A951 17                   rla
  65+ A952 B9                   cp c
  66+ A953 38 02                jr c,HL_DivC_Skip
  67+ A955 91                   sub c
  68+ A956 2C                   inc l
  69+ A957              HL_DivC_Skip:
  70+ A957 10 F7                djnz HL_Div_C_Loop
  71+ A959 7D                   ld   a,l
  72+ A95A 32 22 94             ld  (varR),a
  73+ A95D C9                   ret
  74+ A95E
  75+ A95E
  76+ A95E
  77+ A95E              ; Entry point if varQ is populated with demoninator
  78+ A95E              RequAmul256divQ:
  79+ A95E              BFRDIV:
  80+ A95E F5           		push	af
  81+ A95F 3A 21 94     		ld		a,(varQ)
  82+ A962 4F           		ld		c,a
  83+ A963 F1           		pop		af
  84+ A964 FE 00        		cp		0
  85+ A966 CA 7D A9     		jp		z, HLDIVC_0_BY	; fast exit if numerator is 0
  86+ A969              RequAmul256divC:
  87+ A969 2E 00        		ld		l,0
  88+ A96B 67           		ld		h,a
  89+ A96C              HL_Div_Cold:						; fast entry point if C and HL are already set
  90+ A96C 06 10        		ld b,16
  91+ A96E AF           		xor a
  92+ A96F              LOOPPOINT:
  93+ A96F 29           		add hl,hl
  94+ A970 17           		rla
  95+ A971 B9           		cp c
  96+ A972 38 02        		jr c,SKIPINCSUB
  97+ A974 2C           		inc l
  98+ A975 91           		sub c
  99+ A976              SKIPINCSUB:
 100+ A976 10 F7        		djnz LOOPPOINT
 101+ A978 7D           		ld		a,l
 102+ A979 32 22 94     		ld 		(varR),a
 103+ A97C C9           		ret
 104+ A97D              HLDIVC_0_BY:
 105+ A97D 32 22 94     		ld		(varR),a
 106+ A980 C9           		ret
 107+ A981              ;	push	af
 108+ A981              ;	ld		a,b
 109+ A981              ;	ld		(varQ),a
 110+ A981              ;	pop		af
 111+ A981              ;RequAmul256divQ:
 112+ A981              ;BFRDIV:									;BFRDIV R=A*256/Q   byte from remainder of division
 113+ A981              ;	ld		hl,varQ
 114+ A981              ;	JumpIfAGTENusng	(hl),LL2			;  is A >=  Q ?, if yes, answer too big for 1 byte, R=#&FF
 115+ A981              ;	ld		b,$FE						; b = X
 116+ A981              ;	ld		c,a							; c = R	div roll counter
 117+ A981              ;LL31:									; roll R
 118+ A981              ;	sla		a
 119+ A981              ;	jr		c,LL29						; hop to Reduce
 120+ A981              ;	JumpIfALTNusng (hl)					; Q skip sbc if a < Q
 121+ A981              ;	sbc		a,(hl)						; a = a - Q
 122+ A981              ;	rl		c							; rotate R left
 123+ A981              ;	jr		c,LL31						; loop if R poped out a carry bit
 124+ A981              ;	jr		LL2Good
 125+ A981              ;LL29:									; Reduce
 126+ A981              ;	sbc		a,(hl)
 127+ A981              ;	scf
 128+ A981              ;	rl		c							; roll a carry flag into R
 129+ A981              ;	jr		c,LL31						;  loop R
 130+ A981              ;	jr		LL2Good
 131+ A981              ;LL2:
 132+ A981              ;	ld		c,$FF
 133+ A981              ;LL2Good:
 134+ A981              ;	ld		a,c
 135+ A981              ;	ld		(varR),a
 136+ A981              ;	ret

# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
 950  A981                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm
   1+ A981              RequAdivQ:
   2+ A981              	; R = A/Q, U = remainder, code looked a little odd as if R is reminader and U = result
   3+ A981              LL61:										; Handling division R=A/Q for case further down
   4+ A981 4F           	ld		c,a								; c = A
   5+ A982 3A 21 94     	ld		a,(varQ)						; test for divide by 0
   6+ A985 FE 00        	cp		0
   7+ A987 28 16        	jr		z,LL84							; divide by zero error
   8+ A989 57           	ld		d,a								; now we can do C/D
   9+ A98A 06 08            ld b,8
  10+ A98C AF               xor a
  11+ A98D              LL63:										; roll divide loop
  12+ A98D CB 21            sla c
  13+ A98F 17               rla
  14+ A990 BA               cp d
  15+ A991 38 02            jr c,LL64
  16+ A993 0C               inc c
  17+ A994 92               sub d
  18+ A995              LL64:
  19+ A995 10 F6            djnz LL63
  20+ A997 32 20 94     	ld	(varU),a							; store remainder in U
  21+ A99A 79           	ld	a,c
  22+ A99B 32 22 94     	ld	(varR),a							; store remainder in R
  23+ A99E C9               ret
  24+ A99F              LL84:										; div error  R=U=#5
  25+ A99F 3E 32        	ld		a,50
  26+ A9A1 32 22 94     	ld		(varR),a
  27+ A9A4 32 20 94     	ld		(varU),a
  28+ A9A7 C9           	ret
  29+ A9A8
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm

   1+ A9A8              asm_mult12:
   2+ A9A8              RSequQmulA:
   3+ A9A8              ; "asm_ult12  R.S = Q * A \ visited quite often S = hi, R = lo, odd that its opposite to mult1"
   4+ A9A8 CD 50 A8     	call APequQmulA
   5+ A9AB 08           	ex 	af,af'
   6+ A9AC 7A           	ld	a,d
   7+ A9AD 32 23 94     	ld	(varS),a
   8+ A9B0 7B           	ld	a,e
   9+ A9B1 32 22 94     	ld	(varR),a
  10+ A9B4 08           	ex 	af,af'
  11+ A9B5 C9           	ret

   1++A9B6              CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15:

   1++A9EF              CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV:
