  32+ AA28
  33+ AA28              TidySub1:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
  34+ AA28              		; b = regX on entry
  35+ AA28              TIS1Prep:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
  36+ AA28 08           		ex		af,af'
  37+ AA29 78           		ld		a,b
  38+ AA2A 32 21 94     		ld		(varQ),a
  39+ AA2D 08           		ex		af,af'
  40+ AA2E EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
  41+ AA30 CD E0 A1     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
  42+ AA33              ; USES 				A BC E
  43+ AA33              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
  44+ AA33              Tis1Div96:							   		; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
  45+ AA33 4F           		ld		c,a							; Store sign bit in  ct (we use e reg for that)
  46+ AA34 E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit						; ..
  47+ AA36 5F           		ld		e,a							; ..
  48+ AA37 79           		ld		a,c							; a = high byte again with sign bit cleared
  49+ AA38 E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit							; ..
  50+ AA3A 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; slide counter T1
  51+ AA3C              TIS1RollTLoop								; roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
  52+ AA3C CB 27        		sla		a
  53+ AA3E              		JumpIfALTNusng $60, TIS1SkipSub
  53+ AA3E FE 60       >                        cp      $60
  53+ AA40 DA 4D AA    >                        jp		c, TIS1SkipSub
  54+ AA43 DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							; subtract 96
  55+ AA45 37           		scf
  56+ AA46 CB 10        		rl		b							;  T1
  57+ AA48 38 F2        		jr		c,TIS1RollTLoop
  58+ AA4A              TIS1KIPCont:
  59+ AA4A 78           		ld		a,b							;   T1
  60+ AA4B B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
  61+ AA4C C9           		ret
  62+ AA4D              TIS1SkipSub:
  63+ AA4D B7           	or			a
  64+ AA4E CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  65+ AA50 38 EA        	jr			c,TIS1RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  66+ AA52 C3 4A AA     	jp			TIS1KIPCont
  67+ AA55
  68+ AA55              ;.TIDY	\ -> &4679 \ Orthogonalize rotation matrix that uses 0x60 as unity returns INWK(16,18,20) = INWK(12*18+14*20, 10*16+14*20, 10*16+12*18) / INWK(10,12,14)
  69+ AA55              ; Ux,Uy,Uz = -(FyUy+FzUz, FxUx+FzUz, FxUx+FyUy)/ Fx,Fy,Fz
  70+ AA55
  71+ AA55
  72+ AA55
  73+ AA55
  74+ AA55              TidyRotYSmall:
  75+ AA55 CD 80 AB     		call	CalcRoofvZ
  76+ AA58 32 20 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1),a			; set roofvy hi?? Says roofz TODO
  77+ AA5B C3 91 AA     		jp		NormaliseRoofV
  78+ AA5E
  79+ AA5E              TidyRotXSmall:
  80+ AA5E AF           		xor		a
  81+ AA5F 47           		ld		b,a
  82+ AA60 3A 24 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev_y
  83+ AA63 E6 60        		and		%01100000
  84+ AA65 CA 55 AA     		jp		z,TidyRotYSmall
  85+ AA68 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
  86+ AA6B 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
  87+ AA6C 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
  88+ AA6F CD 46 AB     		call	CalcRoofvY					; Set (roofvy= (nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y, Q -= nosev_z
  89+ AA72 32 1E C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1),a			; set roofvy hi
  90+ AA75 C3 91 AA     		jp		NormaliseRoofV
  91+ AA78              ; TIDY is broken
  92+ AA78              TIDY:
  93+ AA78 DD 01                break
  94+ AA7A              ORTHOGALISE:
  95+ AA7A              ;-- NormaliseNosev
  96+ AA7A CD B6 A9     		call	CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15
  97+ AA7D CD A7 A5     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise z hi, its really TIS3
  98+ AA80 CD EF A9     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV
  99+ AA83              .CheckNXSmall:
 100+ AA83 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 101+ AA86 E6 60        		and		%01100000					; check top two magnitude bits
 102+ AA88 CA 5E AA     		jp		z,TidyRotXSmall
 103+ AA8B              .RotXIsBig:
 104+ AA8B CD 0C AB             call	CalcRoofvX
 105+ AA8E 32 1C C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1),a    	; set roofvx hi
 106+ AA91              NormaliseRoofV:
 107+ AA91 CD C9 A9     		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 108+ AA94 CD A7 A5     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 109+ AA97              ;calc sidev x
 110+ AA97 CD 02 AA     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 111+ AA9A 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 112+ AA9D 32 21 94     		ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 113+ AAA0 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	     ;roov z
 114+ AAA3 CD A8 A9     		call	RSequQmulA
 115+ AAA6 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 116+ AAA9 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 117+ AAAA 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; roofv y
 118+ AAAD CD 28 AA     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 119+ AAB0                      IfAIsZeroGoto NormSideXNoNeg
 119+ AAB0 A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 119+ AAB1 CA B6 AA    >				jp	z, NormSideXNoNeg
 120+ AAB4 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_x
 121+ AAB6              NormSideXNoNeg:
 122+ AAB6 32 16 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a
 123+ AAB9              ;calc sidev y
 124+ AAB9 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
 125+ AABC 32 21 94     		ld		(varQ),a
 126+ AABF 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 127+ AAC2 CD A8 A9     		call	RSequQmulA
 128+ AAC5 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			        ; nosev x
 129+ AAC8 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 130+ AAC9 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)			; roofv z
 131+ AACC CD 28 AA     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 132+ AACF                      IfAIsZeroGoto NormSideYNoNeg
 132+ AACF A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 132+ AAD0 CA D5 AA    >				jp	z, NormSideYNoNeg
 133+ AAD3 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 134+ AAD5              NormSideYNoNeg:
 135+ AAD5 32 24 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1),a
 136+ AAD8              ;calc sidev z
 137+ AAD8 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			; nosev x
 138+ AADB 32 21 94     		ld		(varQ),a
 139+ AADE 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
 140+ AAE1 CD A8 A9     		call	RSequQmulA
 141+ AAE4 3A 24 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev y
 142+ AAE7 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 143+ AAE8 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 144+ AAEB CD 28 AA     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 145+ AAEE                      IfAIsZeroGoto NormSideZNoNeg
 145+ AAEE A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 145+ AAEF CA F4 AA    >				jp	z, NormSideZNoNeg
 146+ AAF2 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 147+ AAF4              NormSideZNoNeg:
 148+ AAF4 32 18 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a ;TODO SHoudl this be Y??
 149+ AAF7              .ClearLoBytes:
 150+ AAF7 21 21 C0     		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 151+ AAFA 06 09        		ld		b,9
 152+ AAFC AF                   xor     a
 153+ AAFD              .ClearLoLoop:
 154+ AAFD 77           		ld		(hl),a						; zero out lo bytes
 155+ AAFE 23           		inc		hl
 156+ AAFF 23           		inc		hl
 157+ AB00 10 FB        		djnz	.ClearLoLoop
 158+ AB02 CD DC A9     		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 159+ AB05 CD A7 A5     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 160+ AB08              ;calc sidev x
 161+ AB08 CD 15 AA     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 162+ AB0B
 163+ AB0B C9           		ret
 164+ AB0C
 165+ AB0C
 166+ AB0C
 167+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;.CheckNYSmall:
 168+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(XX15+2)					; first check z zero, if so we have to do Y
 169+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		and		$7F
 170+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		cp		0
 171+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RZ
 172+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(XX15+1)					; now we can do a realistic check of RY
 173+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		cp 		0							; we can't end up with divide by 0 for RY
 174+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RZ					; We can't have all values of vector 0 so we must do RZ
 175+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		and		%01100000					; check top two magnitude bits
 176+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RY					; and tidy based on roofy
 177+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;.DoNZ:
 178+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		jp		Tidy1RZ						; else we tidy based on roofz
 179+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;;---RE ENTRY POINT -------------------------------------
 180+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;NormaliseRoofv:
 181+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 182+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 183+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise
 184+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 185+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 186+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;ProcessSidev:
 187+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV X
 188+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	nosev_z+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 189+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)				; a = roofv_hi
 190+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 191+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 192+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 193+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 194+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a							; set x (b) to value of nosev_z
 195+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				; a = roofv_y hi
 196+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 197+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1					; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z TIS1
 198+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 199+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a				; sidev_x = = (nosev_z * roofv_y - nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 200+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV Y
 201+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevX+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 202+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				;
 203+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 204+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12 MULT12
 205+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 206+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 207+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a
 208+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 209+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 210+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 211+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 212+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(sidev_y+1),a				; sidev_y  = (nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 213+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 214+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 215+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV Z
 216+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevY+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 217+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)				;
 218+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 219+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 220+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 221+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a
 222+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 223+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 224+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 225+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 226+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(sidev_z+1),a
 227+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		xor		a							; set a = 0 so we can clear orientation low bytes
 228+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		ld		hl,sidev_z
 229+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,9							; only on 6 cells (3 x row 0 and row 1)
 230+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 231+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;NormaliseSideV:
 232+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 233+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 234+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise
 235+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 236+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 237+ AB0C              ;;;;;;;;
 238+ AB0C
 239+ AB0C
 240+ AB0C              CalcRoofvX:
 241+ AB0C              Tidy1RX:										; roofv_x = -(nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_x
 242+ AB0C              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ
 242+ AB0C 3A 26 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 242+ AB0F 32 21 94    >               ld       (varQ),a
 243+ AB12 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 244+ AB15 CD A8 A9     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = nosez hi * roofz hi
 245+ AB18              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 245+ AB18 3A 24 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 245+ AB1B 32 21 94    >               ld       (varQ),a
 246+ AB1E 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 247+ AB21 CD E0 A1     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; DE = nosey hi * roofy hi + rs
 248+ AB24 7A           		ld		a,d
 249+ AB25 E6 80        		and 	$80
 250+ AB27 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 251+ AB29              ;DEBUG		ld		c,a
 252+ AB29 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)					; get nosev x sign
 253+ AB2C 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 254+ AB2D E6 80        		and		$80
 255+ AB2F FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 256+ AB31 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 257+ AB33 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 258+ AB34 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 259+ AB36 42           		ld		b,d
 260+ AB37 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z
 261+ AB38 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 262+ AB39 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 263+ AB3B CD 19 A4     		call	BC_Div_DE
 264+ AB3E FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh							; get back sign from nosevx
 265+ AB40 EE 80        		xor		$80								; flip sign
 266+ AB42 E6 80        		and		$80								; keep sign bit only
 267+ AB44 B0           		or		b
 268+ AB45 C9           		ret
 269+ AB46
 270+ AB46
 271+ AB46              CalcRoofvY:
 272+ AB46              Tidy1RY:										; roofv_y = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y
 273+ AB46              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ				;                  A        Q              RS
 273+ AB46 3A 26 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 273+ AB49 32 21 94    >               ld       (varQ),a
 274+ AB4C 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 275+ AB4F CD A8 A9     		call	RSequQmulA
 276+ AB52              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 276+ AB52 3A 22 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 276+ AB55 32 21 94    >               ld       (varQ),a
 277+ AB58 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 278+ AB5B CD E0 A1     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS
 279+ AB5E 7A           		ld		a,d
 280+ AB5F E6 80        		and 	$80
 281+ AB61 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 282+ AB63 3A 24 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)					; get nosev x sign
 283+ AB66 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 284+ AB67 E6 80        		and		$80
 285+ AB69 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 286+ AB6B FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 287+ AB6D 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 288+ AB6E E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 289+ AB70 42           		ld		b,d
 290+ AB71 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z
 291+ AB72 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 292+ AB73 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 293+ AB75 CD 19 A4     		call	BC_Div_DE
 294+ AB78 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 295+ AB7A EE 80        		xor		$80
 296+ AB7C E6 80        		and		$80
 297+ AB7E B0           		or		b
 298+ AB7F C9           		ret
 299+ AB80
 300+ AB80              CalcRoofvZ:
 301+ AB80              Tidy1RZ:										; roofv_z = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_y * roofv_y) / nosev_z
 302+ AB80              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 302+ AB80 3A 24 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 302+ AB83 32 21 94    >               ld       (varQ),a
 303+ AB86 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 304+ AB89 CD A8 A9     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = NOSEy * ROOFy
 305+ AB8C              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 305+ AB8C 3A 22 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 305+ AB8F 32 21 94    >               ld       (varQ),a
 306+ AB92 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 307+ AB95 CD E0 A1     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; de (A,ixl) = NOSEx * ROOFx + RS
 308+ AB98 7A           		ld		a,d
 309+ AB99 E6 80        		and 	$80
 310+ AB9B FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 311+ AB9D 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)					; get nosev x sign
 312+ ABA0 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 313+ ABA1 E6 80        		and		$80
 314+ ABA3 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 315+ ABA5 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 316+ ABA7 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 317+ ABA8 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 318+ ABAA 42           		ld		b,d
 319+ ABAB 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z
 320+ ABAC 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 321+ ABAD 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 322+ ABAF CD 19 A4     		call	BC_Div_DE
 323+ ABB2 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 324+ ABB4 EE 80        		xor		$80
 325+ ABB6 E6 80        		and		$80
 326+ ABB8 B0           		or		b
 327+ ABB9 C9           		ret
 328+ ABBA
 329+ ABBA
 330+ ABBA
 331+ ABBA              ;;ProcessSidev:
 332+ ABBA              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 333+ ABBA              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)				; a = roofv_hi
 334+ ABBA              ;;		push	bc
 335+ ABBA              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 336+ ABBA              ;;		pop		bc
 337+ ABBA              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 338+ ABBA              ;;		ld		b,a							; set x (b) to value of nosev_z
 339+ ABBA              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				; a = roofv_y hi
 340+ ABBA              ;;		push	bc
 341+ ABBA              ;;		call	TidySub1					; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z TIS1
 342+ ABBA              ;;		pop		bc
 343+ ABBA              ;;		xor		$80							; sidev_x = -a by flipping sign bit
 344+ ABBA              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a				; sidev_x = = (nosev_z * roofv_y - nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 345+ ABBA              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevX+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 346+ ABBA              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				;
 347+ ABBA              ;;		push	bc
 348+ ABBA              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12 MULT12
 349+ ABBA              ;;		pop		bc
 350+ ABBA              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 351+ ABBA              ;;		ld		b,a
 352+ ABBA              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 353+ ABBA              ;;		push	bc
 354+ ABBA              ;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 355+ ABBA              ;;		pop		bc
 356+ ABBA              ;;		xor		$80							; a *= -1
 357+ ABBA              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a				; sidev_y  = (nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 358+ ABBA              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 359+ ABBA              ;;		push	bc
 360+ ABBA              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevY+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 361+ ABBA              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)				;
 362+ ABBA              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 363+ ABBA              ;;		pop		bc
 364+ ABBA              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 365+ ABBA              ;;		ld		b,a
 366+ ABBA              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 367+ ABBA              ;;		push	bc
 368+ ABBA              ;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 369+ ABBA              ;;		pop		bc
 370+ ABBA              ;;		xor		$80
 371+ ABBA              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1),a
 372+ ABBA              ;;		xor		a							; set a = 0 so we can clear orientation low bytes
 373+ ABBA              ;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatSidevZ
 374+ ABBA              ;;		ld		b,9							; only on 6 cells (3 x row 0 and row 1)
 375+ ABBA              ;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 376+ ABBA
 377+ ABBA
 378+ ABBA
 379+ ABBA
 380+ ABBA
 381+ ABBA
 382+ ABBA              ;;;;;;;;;-- Check to see if the top two magnitude bits are clear in nosev_x, if so jump to TI1
 383+ ABBA              ;;;;;;;;.ProcessRoofv:
 384+ ABBA              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 385+ ABBA              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 386+ ABBA              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 387+ ABBA              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 388+ ABBA              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 389+ ABBA              ;;;;;;;;.ProcessSidev:
 390+ ABBA              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 391+ ABBA              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 392+ ABBA              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 393+ ABBA              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 394+ ABBA              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 395+ ABBA
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/tidy.asm
 955  ABBA                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
   1+ ABBA
   2+ ABBA              LL28Amul256DivD:        JumpIfAGTENusng  d, .Ll28Exit255
   2+ ABBA BA          >                        cp     d
   2+ ABBB D2 D9 AB    >                        jp		nc,.Ll28Exit255
   3+ ABBE 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
   4+ ABC0 CB 27        .LL31:                  sla     a
   5+ ABC2 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
   6+ ABC4                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
   6+ ABC4 BA          >                        cp      d
   6+ ABC5 DA CA AB    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
   7+ ABC8 92                                   sub     d
   8+ ABC9                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
   8+ ABC9 B7          >                    or a
   9+ ABCA 3F           .SkipSub:               ccf                                 ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
  10+ ABCB CB 13                                rl      e
  11+ ABCD 38 F1                                jr      c,.LL31
  12+ ABCF 7B                                   ld      a,e
  13+ ABD0 C9                                   ret
  14+ ABD1 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  15+ ABD2 37                                   scf                                 ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  16+ ABD3 CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
  17+ ABD5 38 E9                                jr      c,.LL31                     ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
  18+ ABD7 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
  19+ ABD8 C9                                   ret
  20+ ABD9 3E FF        .Ll28Exit255:           ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
  21+ ABDB C9                                   ret
  22+ ABDC
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
 956  ABDC                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm
   1+ ABDC              XAequMinusXAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
   2+ ABDC              TIS1:
   3+ ABDC 08           		ex		af,af'
   4+ ABDD 3A B0 93     		ld		a,(regX)
   5+ ABE0 47           		ld		b,a
   6+ ABE1 08           		ex		af,af'
   7+ ABE2              BAequMinusBAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
   8+ ABE2 08           		ex		af,af'
   9+ ABE3 78           		ld		a,b
  10+ ABE4 32 21 94     		ld		(varQ),a
  11+ ABE7 08           		ex		af,af'
  12+ ABE8 EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
  13+ ABEA CD E0 A1     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
  14+ ABED              ; USES 				A BC E
  15+ ABED              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
  16+ ABED              Div96:										; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
  17+ ABED 47           		ld		b,a
  18+ ABEE E6 80        		and		$80							;	hi sign
  19+ ABF0 5F           		ld		e,a							;   e = varT
  20+ ABF1 78           		ld		a,b
  21+ ABF2 E6 7F        		and		$7F							;	hi A7
  22+ ABF4 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						;   slide counter
  23+ ABF6 48           		ld		c,b							;   c == T1 ::  T1
  24+ ABF7              .DVL3:										;   roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
  25+ ABF7 CB 27        		sla		a
  26+ ABF9 FE 60        		cp		$60							; max 96
  27+ ABFB 30 02        		jr		nc,.DV4
  28+ ABFD DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							;  SBC #&60
  29+ ABFF              .DV4:										; skip subtraction
  30+ ABFF CB 11        		rl		c							;  T1
  31+ AC01 38 F4        		jr		c,.DVL3
  32+ AC03 79           		ld		a,c							;   T1
  33+ AC04 B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
  34+ AC05 C9           		ret
  35+ AC06
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm

 965  AC06                  INCLUDE "./Drive/drive_access.asm"
# file opened: ./Drive/drive_access.asm
   1+ AC06              M_GETSETDRV             equ $89
   2+ AC06              F_OPEN                  equ $9a
   3+ AC06              F_CLOSE                 equ $9b
   4+ AC06              F_READ                  equ $9d
   5+ AC06              F_WRITE                 equ $9e
   6+ AC06              F_SEEK                  equ $9f
   7+ AC06
   8+ AC06              FA_READ                 equ $01
   9+ AC06              FA_APPEND               equ $06
  10+ AC06              FA_OVERWRITE            equ $0C
  11+ AC06
  12+ AC06 F5 C5 D5 E5  GetDefaultDrive:        push	af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix
  12+ AC0A DD E5
  13+ AC0C AF                                   xor	    a	; set drive. 0 is default
  14+ AC0D CF                                   rst	    $08
  15+ AC0E 89                                   db	    $89
  16+ AC0F 32 19 AC                             ld	    (DefaultDrive),a
  17+ AC12 DD E1 E1 D1                          pop		af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix
  17+ AC16 C1 F1
  18+ AC18 C9                                   ret
  19+ AC19 00           DefaultDrive:	        db	0
  20+ AC1A
  21+ AC1A              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  22+ AC1A              ;	Function:	Open a file read for reading/writing
  23+ AC1A              ;	In:		ix = filename
  24+ AC1A              ;			b  = Open filemode
  25+ AC1A              ;	ret		a  = handle, 0 on error
  26+ AC1A              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  27+ AC1A E5 DD E5     fOpen:	                push	hl,,ix
  28+ AC1D DD E5                                push	ix
  29+ AC1F 3A 19 AC                             ld	    a,(DefaultDrive)
  30+ AC22 CF                                   rst	    $08
  31+ AC23 9A                                   db	    F_OPEN
  32+ AC24 DD E1 E1                             pop	    hl,,ix
  33+ AC27 C9                                   ret
  34+ AC28
  35+ AC28              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  36+ AC28              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
  37+ AC28              ;	In:		ix  = address to read into
  38+ AC28              ;			bc  = amount to read
  39+ AC28              ;	ret:		carry set = error
  40+ AC28              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  41+ AC28 B7           fRead:                  or   	a             ; is it zero?
  42+ AC29 C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
  43+ AC2A E5 DD E5                             push	hl,,ix   	 ; load ix into hl and save hl for later
  44+ AC2D E1                                   pop		hl
  45+ AC2E CF                                   rst	    $08
  46+ AC2F 9D                                   db	    F_READ
  47+ AC30 E1                                   pop	    hl
  48+ AC31 C9                                   ret
  49+ AC32
  50+ AC32              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  51+ AC32              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
  52+ AC32              ;	In:		ix  = address to read into
  53+ AC32              ;			bc  = amount to read
  54+ AC32              ;	ret:		carry set = error
  55+ AC32              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  56+ AC32 B7           fWrite:                 or   	a             ; is it zero?
  57+ AC33 C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
  58+ AC34 E5 DD E5                             push	hl,,ix
  59+ AC37 E1                                   pop	    hl
  60+ AC38 CF                                   rst	    $08
  61+ AC39 9E                                   db	    F_WRITE
  62+ AC3A E1                                   pop	    hl
  63+ AC3B C9                                   ret
  64+ AC3C
  65+ AC3C              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  66+ AC3C              ;	Function:	Close open file
  67+ AC3C              ;	In:		a  = handle
  68+ AC3C              ;	ret		a  = handle, 0 on error
  69+ AC3C              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  70+ AC3C B7           fClose:		            or   	a             ; is it zero?
  71+ AC3D C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
  72+ AC3E CF                                   rst	    $08
  73+ AC3F 9B                                   db	    F_CLOSE
  74+ AC40 C9                                   ret
  75+ AC41
  76+ AC41              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  77+ AC41              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
  78+ AC41              ;	In:		a   = file handle
  79+ AC41              ;			L   = Seek mode (0=start, 1=rel, 2=-rel)
  80+ AC41              ;			BCDE = bytes to seek
  81+ AC41              ;	ret:		BCDE = file pos from start
  82+ AC41              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  83+ AC41 DD E5 E5     fSeek:                  push	ix,,hl
  84+ AC44 CF                                   rst	    $08
  85+ AC45 9F                                   db	    F_SEEK
  86+ AC46 E1 DD E1                             pop	    ix,,hl
  87+ AC49 C9                                   ret
  88+ AC4A
  89+ AC4A              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  90+ AC4A              ; Init the file system
  91+ AC4A              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  92+ AC4A CD 06 AC     InitFileSystem:         call    GetDefaultDrive
  93+ AC4D C9                                   ret
  94+ AC4E
  95+ AC4E              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  96+ AC4E              ; Function:	Load a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
  97+ AC4E              ; In:		hl = file data pointer
  98+ AC4E              ;		ix = address to load to
  99+ AC4E              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 100+ AC4E CD 06 AC     FileLoad:	            call    GetDefaultDrive		; need to do this each time?!?!?
 101+ AC51 C5 D5 F5                             push	bc,,de,,af
 102+ AC54                                      ; get file size
 103+ AC54 4E                                   ld	    c,(hl)
 104+ AC55 2C                                   inc	    l
 105+ AC56 46                                   ld	    b,(hl)
 106+ AC57 2C                                   inc	    l
 107+ AC58 C5 DD E5                             push	bc,,ix			; store size, load address,
 108+ AC5B E5                                   push	hl				; get name into ix
 109+ AC5C DD E1                                pop	    ix
 110+ AC5E 06 01                                ld      b,FA_READ		; mode open for reading
 111+ AC60 CD 1A AC                             call    fOpen
 112+ AC63 38 17                                jr	    c,.error_opening; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 113+ AC65 FE 00                                cp	    0				; was file handle 0?
 114+ AC67 28 13                                jr	    z,.error_opening; of so there was an error opening.
 115+ AC69 DD E1 C1                             pop     bc,,ix          ; get load address back and size back
 116+ AC6C F5                                   push	af				; remember handle
 117+ AC6D CD 28 AC                             call	fRead			; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 118+ AC70 38 0C                                jr	    c,.error_reading
 119+ AC72 F1                                   pop	    af			    ; get handle back
 120+ AC73 CD 3C AC                             call	fClose			; close file
 121+ AC76 38 07                                jr	    c,.error_closing
 122+ AC78 F1 D1 C1                             pop     bc,,de,,af      ; normal exit
 123+ AC7B C9                                   ret
 124+ AC7C              ;
 125+ AC7C              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 126+ AC7C              ;
 127+ AC7C DD E1        .error_opening:         pop	ix
 128+ AC7E C1           .error_reading:		    pop	bc	; don't pop a, need error code
 129+ AC7F
 130+ AC7F              .error_closing:
 131+ AC7F C1           .NormalError:  	        pop	bc	; don't pop into A, return with error code
 132+ AC80 D1                                   pop	de
 133+ AC81 C1                                   pop	bc
 134+ AC82 C9                                   ret
 135+ AC83
 136+ AC83              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 137+ AC83              ; Function:	Save a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
 138+ AC83              ; In:		hl = file data pointer
 139+ AC83              ;		ix = address to save from
 140+ AC83              ;		bc = size
 141+ AC83              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 142+ AC83 CD 06 AC     FileSave:	            call    GetDefaultDrive		; need to do this each time?!?!?
 143+ AC86 C5 E5                                push	bc,,hl   			; store size& save address
 144+ AC88 E5                                   push	hl		        	; get name into ix
 145+ AC89 DD E1                                pop	    ix
 146+ AC8B 06 0C                                ld      b,FA_OVERWRITE		; mode open for writing
 147+ AC8D CD 1A AC                             call    fOpen
 148+ AC90 38 12                                jr	    c,.error_opening	; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 149+ AC92 FE 00                                cp	    0			        ; was file handle 0?
 150+ AC94 28 0E                                jr	    z,.error_opening	; of so there was an error opening.
 151+ AC96 DD E1                                pop	    ix			        ; get save address back
 152+ AC98 C1                                   pop	    bc			        ; get size back
 153+ AC99 F5                                   push	af			        ; remember handle
 154+ AC9A CD 32 AC                             call	fWrite			    ; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 155+ AC9D 38 04                                jr	c,.error
 156+ AC9F F1                                   pop	af			            ; get handle back
 157+ ACA0 CD 3C AC                             call	fClose			    ; close file
 158+ ACA3 C9           .error:                 ret
 159+ ACA4              ;
 160+ ACA4              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 161+ ACA4              ;
 162+ ACA4 DD E1        .error_opening:         pop	ix
 163+ ACA6 C1                                   pop	bc	; don't pop a, need error code
 164+ ACA7 C9                                   ret
 165+ ACA8
# file closed: ./Drive/drive_access.asm

  17+ AD55              txt_status_colour		equ $FF
  18+ AD55
  19+ AD55              print_boiler_text_l2:
  20+ AD55              ; ">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
  21+ AD55              BoilerTextLoop:
  22+ AD55 C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
  23+ AD56 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
  24+ AD57 23           	inc			hl
  25+ AD58 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
  26+ AD59 23           	inc			hl
  27+ AD5A 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  28+ AD5B 23           	inc			hl
  29+ AD5C 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  30+ AD5D 23           	inc			hl
  31+ AD5E E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  32+ AD5F EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  33+ AD60 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  34+ AD62                  MMUSelectLayer2
  34+ AD62 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
  35+ AD66 CD C8 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  36+ AD69 E1           	pop			hl
  37+ AD6A C1           	pop			bc
  38+ AD6B 10 E8        	djnz		BoilerTextLoop
  39+ AD6D C9           	ret
  40+ AD6E
  41+ AD6E
  42+ AD6E              print_boiler_text:
  43+ AD6E              ; ">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
  44+ AD6E              .BoilerTextLoop:
  45+ AD6E C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
  46+ AD6F 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
  47+ AD70 23           	inc			hl
  48+ AD71 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
  49+ AD72 23           	inc			hl
  50+ AD73 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  51+ AD74 23           	inc			hl
  52+ AD75 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  53+ AD76 23           	inc			hl
  54+ AD77 E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  55+ AD78 EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  56+ AD79 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  57+ AD7B C5           	push		bc
  58+ AD7C D1           	pop			de
  59+ AD7D CD C8 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  60+ AD80 E1           	pop			hl
  61+ AD81 C1           	pop			bc
  62+ AD82 10 EA        	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  63+ AD84 C9           	ret

   6++AD8D CD 97 AD     	call	.Num1

   8++AD92 CD 97 AD     	call	.Num1
   9++AD95 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  10++AD97              .Num1:
  11++AD97 06 2F        	ld	b,'0'-1
  12++AD99              .Num2:
  13++AD99 04           	inc		b
  14++AD9A 81           	add		a,c
  15++AD9B 38 FC        	jr		c,.Num2
  16++AD9D 91           	sub 	c
  17++AD9E C5           	push	bc
  18++AD9F F5           	push	af
  19++ADA0 79           	ld		a,c
  20++ADA1 FE FF        	cp		-1
  21++ADA3 CC AC AD     	call	z,.InsertDot
  22++ADA6 78           	ld		a,b
  23++ADA7 12           	ld		(de),a
  24++ADA8 13           	inc		de
  25++ADA9 F1           	pop		af
  26++ADAA C1           	pop		bc
  27++ADAB C9           	ret

  29++ADAC 3E 2E        	ld		a,'.'
  30++ADAE 12           	ld		(de),a
  31++ADAF 13           	inc		de
  32++ADB0 C9           	ret

  66+ ADB1
  67+ ADB1 2A 07 98     GetCash:                ld      hl,(Cash)
  68+ ADB4 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  69+ ADB5 DD 2A 09 98                          ld      ix,(Cash+2)
  70+ ADB9 FD 21 44 AD                          ld		iy,txt_cash_amount
  71+ ADBD CD 39 A7                             call 	DispDEIXtoIY	; This will write out with 0 termination after last digit
  72+ ADC0 FD 7E 00     .ShiftDecimalDigit:     ld		a,(IY+0)				;Push last digit to post decimal
  73+ ADC3 32 50 AD                             ld		(txt_cash_fraction),a
  74+ ADC6 21 45 AD     .UpdateInteger:         ld		hl,txt_cash_amount+1	; Now was there only 1 digit
  75+ ADC9 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)					; if so we leave it alone so its "0.0"
  76+ ADCA FE 00                                cp		0
  77+ ADCC C8                                   ret		z
  78+ ADCD FD 36 00 00                          ld		(IY),0					; Else we erase last digit as it went to fraction
  79+ ADD1 C9                                   ret

  70+ C130              SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair:
  71+ C130 ED 4B 33 95                          ld		bc,(TargetPlanetX)              ; bc = selected jump
  72+ C134 ED 5B 31 95                          ld		de,(PresentSystemX)
  73+ C138 79                                   ld		a,c
  74+ C139 93                                   sub		e
  75+ C13A F2 4B C1                             jp      p,.NoFlipX
  76+ C13D ED 44                                neg
  77+ C13F CB 27                                sla		a
  78+ C141 CB 27                                sla		a
  79+ C143 4F                                   ld      c,a
  80+ C144 3E 80                                ld      a,src_x_centre
  81+ C146 91                                   sub     c
  82+ C147 4F                                   ld      c,a
  83+ C148 C3 52 C1                             jp      .fixY
  84+ C14B CB 27        .NoFlipX:               sla		a
  85+ C14D CB 27                                sla		a
  86+ C14F C6 80                                add		a,src_x_centre
  87+ C151 4F                                   ld      c,a
  88+ C152 78           .fixY:                  ld		a,b
  89+ C153 92                                   sub		d
  90+ C154 F2 63 C1                             jp      p,.NoFlipY
  91+ C157 ED 44                                neg
  92+ C159 CB 27                                sla     a
  93+ C15B 47                                   ld      b,a
  94+ C15C 3E 60                                ld      a,src_y_centre
  95+ C15E 90                                   sub     b
  96+ C15F 47                                   ld      b,a
  97+ C160 C3 68 C1                             jp      .RedrawSprite
  98+ C163 CB 27        .NoFlipY                sla		a
  99+ C165 C6 60                                add		a,src_y_centre
 100+ C167 47                                   ld		b,a
 101+ C168              .RedrawSprite:          MMUSelectSpriteBank
 101+ C168 ED 91 57 3C >					 nextreg SpritememMMU,	    BankSPRITE
 102+ C16C CD A6 E0                             call	sprite_lhc_move
 103+ C16F CD A1 C1                             call    src_name_current
 104+ C172 C9                                   ret
 105+ C173
 106+ C173 26 08        src_clear_name_area:    ld      h,8
 107+ C175 11 E3 A0                             ld      de,$A000 | COLOUR_TRANSPARENT
 108+ C178 01 0A A8                             ld      bc,$A80A
 109+ C17B E5           .ClearLoop:             push    hl
 110+ C17C D5                                   push    de
 111+ C17D C5                                   push    bc
 112+ C17E                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 112+ C17E ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 113+ C182 CD 62 E2                             call	l2_draw_horz_line
 114+ C185 C1                                   pop     bc
 115+ C186 D1                                   pop     de
 116+ C187 E1                                   pop     hl
 117+ C188 04                                   inc     b
 118+ C189 25                                   dec     h
 119+ C18A 20 EF                                jr      nz,.ClearLoop
 120+ C18C C9                                   ret
 121+ C18D              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 122+ C18D 3A 1E 95     src_system_undercursor: ld      a,(Galaxy)

 140+ C1B7 CD CF E1                             call	l2_print_7at
 141+ C1BA CD CD C1                             call    src_calc_distance
 142+ C1BD 21 1A C0                             ld      hl,src_distance
 143+ C1C0 01 0A B0                             ld      bc,$B00A
 144+ C1C3 1E FF                                ld		e,$FF
 145+ C1C5                                      MMUSelectLayer2

 146+ C1C9 CD CF E1                             call	l2_print_7at

 148+ C1CD              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 149+ C1CD 3A 1E 95     src_calc_distance:      ld      a,(Galaxy)                                      ; Default in 0 distance
 150+ C1D0                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 150+ C1D0 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,       a
 151+ C1D3 11 24 C0                             ld      de,src_dist_amount
 152+ C1D6 21 36 C0                             ld      hl,src_default_dist
 153+ C1D9 ED A0                                ldi
 154+ C1DB ED A0                                ldi
 155+ C1DD ED A0                                ldi
 156+ C1DF ED A0                                ldi
 157+ C1E1 ED A0                                ldi
 158+ C1E3 ED 4B 31 95                          ld      bc,(PresentSystemX)
 159+ C1E7 ED 43 57 E8                          ld      (GalaxyPresentSystem),bc
 160+ C1EB ED 4B 33 95                          ld      bc,(TargetPlanetX)
 161+ C1EF ED 43 59 E8                          ld      (GalaxyDestinationSystem),bc
 162+ C1F3 CD E8 FB                             call    galaxy_find_distance                            ; get distance into HL
 163+ C1F6 DD 2A 1A 95                          ld      ix,(Distance)
 164+ C1FA 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
 165+ C1FD FD 21 3B C0                          ld      iy,src_distance_val
 166+ C201 CD 39 A7                             call    DispDEIXtoIY                                    ; use DEIX as distance and write to string at location IY
 167+ C204 FD E5                                push    iy
 168+ C206 E1                                   pop     hl                                              ; hl = iy
 169+ C207 11 3B C0                             ld      de,src_distance_val
 170+ C20A 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)				                            ;Push last digit to post decimal
 171+ C20B 32 28 C0                             ld		(src_fraction),a
 172+ C20E 2B                                   dec     hl
 173+ C20F CD 5D A5                             call    compare16HLDE
 174+ C212 38 18                                jr      c,.done_number
 175+ C214 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 176+ C215 32 26 C0                             ld      (src_dist_amount+2),a
 177+ C218 2B                                   dec     hl
 178+ C219 CD 5D A5                             call    compare16HLDE
 179+ C21C 38 0E                                jr      c,.done_number
 180+ C21E 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 181+ C21F 32 25 C0                             ld      (src_dist_amount+1),a
 182+ C222 2B                                   dec     hl
 183+ C223 CD 5D A5                             call    compare16HLDE
 184+ C226 38 04                                jr      c,.done_number
 185+ C228 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 186+ C229 32 24 C0                             ld      (src_dist_amount),a
 187+ C22C C9           .done_number:           ret
 188+ C22D
 189+ C22D 00 00        PosScan1                DW      0
 190+ C22F 00 00        PosScan2                DW      0
 191+ C231              ; bc = row col, d = xlength e = y length
 192+ C231              ; Check logic simplies to , if 1 = bc and 2 = de:
 193+ C231              ; 12   X1            X2    OK         2 LT X1
 194+ C231              ; 1    X1  2         X2    FAIL       1 LT X1 && 2 GT X1 && 2 LT X2
 195+ C231              ;      X1  12        X2    FAIL       1 GT X1 && 1 LT X2 && 2 GT X1 && 2 LT X2
 196+ C231              ;      X1  1         X2 2  FAIL       1 GT X1 && 1 LT X2 && 2 GT X2
 197+ C231              ;      X1            X2 12 OK         1 GT X2
 198+ C231 16 07        FreeSlotCheck:          ld      d,7
 199+ C233 ED 30                                mul
 200+ C235 79                                   ld      a,c
 201+ C236 83                                   add     e
 202+ C237 30 02                                jr      nc,.NoOverflow
 203+ C239 3E FF        .Overflow:              ld      a,$FF
 204+ C23B 5F           .NoOverflow:            ld      e,a                     ; e now equals max length in pixels
 205+ C23C 78                                   ld      a,b
 206+ C23D C6 08                                add     8
 207+ C23F 57                                   ld      d,a                     ; e = max height
 208+ C240 ED 43 2D C2                          ld      (PosScan1),bc
 209+ C244 ED 53 2F C2                          ld      (PosScan2),de
 210+ C248 DD 21 41 C0  .CheckBoxes:            ld      ix,src_printed_text
 211+ C24C 3A C1 C0                             ld      a,(src_buffer_size)
 212+ C24F FE 00                                cp      0
 213+ C251 28 3C                                jr      z,.SafeToPrint
 214+ C253 60                                   ld      h,b                     ; h will substite for row b as b is used in dnjz
 215+ C254 47                                   ld      b,a
 216+ C255 DD 7E 02     .CheckBoxLoop:          ld      a,(ix+2)
 217+ C258 FE 00                                cp      0                       ; zerolength, not applicable
 218+ C25A 28 29                                jr      z,.NoBox
 219+ C25C 3A 2D C2     .CheckRow:              ld      a,(PosScan1)
 220+ C25F 3C                                   inc     a
 221+ C260                                      JumpIfAGTENusng (ix+2), .NoBox  ; X1 >= BottomLeftX
 221+ C260 DD BE 02    >                        cp     (ix+2)
 221+ C263 D2 85 C2    >                        jp		nc,.NoBox
 222+ C266 3A 2F C2                             ld      a,(PosScan2)
 223+ C269                                      JumpIfALTNusng (ix+0),  .NoBox   ; X2 <= TopRightX
 223+ C269 DD BE 00    >                        cp      (ix+0)
 223+ C26C DA 85 C2    >                        jp		c, .NoBox
 224+ C26F 3A 2E C2     .SafeToPrintX:          ld      a,(PosScan1+1)
 225+ C272 3C                                   inc     a
 226+ C273                                      JumpIfAGTENusng (ix+3), .NoBox  ; Y1 >= BottomLeftY
 226+ C273 DD BE 03    >                        cp     (ix+3)
 226+ C276 D2 85 C2    >                        jp		nc,.NoBox
 227+ C279 3A 30 C2                             ld      a,(PosScan2+1)
 228+ C27C                                      JumpIfALTNusng (ix+1),  .NoBox  ; Y2 <= TopRightY
 228+ C27C DD BE 01    >                        cp      (ix+1)
 228+ C27F DA 85 C2    >                        jp		c, .NoBox
 229+ C282 3E FF        .MatchedBox:            ld      a,$FF
 230+ C284 C9                                   ret
 231+ C285 DD 23        .NoBox:                 inc     ix
 232+ C287 DD 23                                inc     ix
 233+ C289 DD 23                                inc     ix
 234+ C28B DD 23                                inc     ix
 235+ C28D 10 C6                                djnz    .CheckBoxLoop
 236+ C28F 21 41 C0     .SafeToPrint:           ld      hl,src_printed_text
 237+ C292 3A C1 C0                             ld      a,(src_buffer_size)
 238+ C295 57                                   ld      d,a
 239+ C296 1E 04                                ld      e,4
 240+ C298 ED 30                                mul
 241+ C29A 19                                   add     hl,de
 242+ C29B ED 5B 2D C2                          ld      de,(PosScan1)
 243+ C29F 73 23 72 2B                          ld      (hl),de
 244+ C2A3 23                                   inc     hl
 245+ C2A4 23                                   inc     hl
 246+ C2A5 ED 5B 2F C2                          ld      de,(PosScan2)
 247+ C2A9 73 23 72 2B                          ld      (hl),de
 248+ C2AD 21 C1 C0                             ld      hl,src_buffer_size
 249+ C2B0 34                                   inc     (hl)
 250+ C2B1 AF                                   xor     a
 251+ C2B2 C9                                   ret
 252+ C2B3
 253+ C2B3 CD D1 98     src_label_ssytem:       call	copy_system_to_working
 254+ C2B6 3A 1E 95                             ld      a,(Galaxy)
 255+ C2B9                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 255+ C2B9 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,       a
 256+ C2BC CD 81 F6                             call	GetDigramWorkingSeed

 262+ C2CB 3A 19 C0                             ld		a,(local_name_col)

 275+ C2E3 C1                                   pop     bc

 277+ C2E6 28 19                                jr      z,.OKToPrint
 278+ C2E8 78                                   ld      a,b

 280+ C2EB 47                                   ld      b,a
 281+ C2EC C5                                   push    bc
 282+ C2ED CD 31 C2                             call    FreeSlotCheck           ; attempt down 8 pixels attemps
 283+ C2F0 C1                                   pop     bc

 288+ C2F8 47                                   ld      b,a
 289+ C2F9 C5                                   push    bc
 290+ C2FA CD 31 C2                             call    FreeSlotCheck           ; attempt down 8 pixels attemps
 291+ C2FD C1                                   pop     bc
 292+ C2FE FE 00                                cp      0

 442+ C45A 3A 2B 94     local_chart_cursors:    ld     a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 443+ C45D FE 00                                cp      0
 444+ C45F C8                                   ret     z
 445+ C460 17                                   rla
 446+ C461 DC 79 C4                             call   c,src_UpPressed
 447+ C464 17                                   rla
 448+ C465 DC 89 C4                             call   c,src_DownPressed
 449+ C468 17                                   rla
 450+ C469 DC 99 C4                             call   c,src_LeftPressed
 451+ C46C 17                                   rla
 452+ C46D DC A9 C4                             call   c,src_RightPressed
 453+ C470 17                                   rla
 454+ C471 DC B9 C4                             call   c,src_HomePressed
 455+ C474 17                                   rla
 456+ C475 DC C3 C4                             call   c,src_RecenterPressed
 457+ C478 C9                                   ret
 458+ C479              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 459+ C479 3A 34 95     src_UpPressed:          ld     a,(TargetPlanetY)
 460+ C47C                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 1,src_BoundsLimit
 460+ C47C FE 01       >                cp     1
 460+ C47E CA DA C4    >                jp      z,src_BoundsLimit
 461+ C481 3D                                   dec     a
 462+ C482 32 34 95                             ld      (TargetPlanetY),a
 463+ C485 CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 464+ C488 C9                                   ret
 465+ C489              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 466+ C489 3A 34 95     src_DownPressed:        ld     a,(TargetPlanetY)
 467+ C48C                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 255,src_BoundsLimit
 467+ C48C FE FF       >                cp     255
 467+ C48E CA DA C4    >                jp      z,src_BoundsLimit
 468+ C491 3C                                   inc    a
 469+ C492 32 34 95                             ld      (TargetPlanetY),a
 470+ C495 CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 471+ C498 C9                                   ret
 472+ C499              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 473+ C499 3A 33 95     src_LeftPressed:        ld     a,(TargetPlanetX)
 474+ C49C                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 2,src_BoundsLimit
 474+ C49C FE 02       >                cp     2
 474+ C49E CA DA C4    >                jp      z,src_BoundsLimit
 475+ C4A1 3D                                   dec    a
 476+ C4A2 32 33 95                             ld      (TargetPlanetX),a
 477+ C4A5 CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 478+ C4A8 C9                                   ret
 479+ C4A9              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 480+ C4A9 3A 33 95     src_RightPressed:       ld     a,(TargetPlanetX)
 481+ C4AC                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 253,src_BoundsLimit
 481+ C4AC FE FD       >                cp     253
 481+ C4AE CA DA C4    >                jp      z,src_BoundsLimit
 482+ C4B1 3C                                   inc    a
 483+ C4B2 32 33 95                             ld      (TargetPlanetX),a
 484+ C4B5 CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 485+ C4B8 C9                                   ret
 486+ C4B9              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 487+ C4B9 2A 31 95     src_HomePressed:        ld      hl,(PresentSystemX)
 488+ C4BC 22 33 95                             ld      (TargetPlanetX),hl
 489+ C4BF CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 490+ C4C2 C9                                   ret
 491+ C4C3              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 492+ C4C3 DD 01        src_RecenterPressed:    break
 493+ C4C5 3A 1E 95                             ld      a,(Galaxy)      ; DEBUG as galaxy n is not working
 494+ C4C8                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 494+ C4C8 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,       a
 495+ C4CB ED 4B 33 95                          ld      bc,(TargetPlanetX)
 496+ C4CF CD 60 FB                             call    find_nearest_to_bc
 497+ C4D2 ED 43 33 95                          ld      (TargetPlanetX),bc
 498+ C4D6 CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 499+ C4D9 C9                                   ret
 500+ C4DA              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 501+ C4DA AF           src_BoundsLimit:        xor     a
 502+ C4DB C9                                   ret

  24+ C08E              GCM_print_boiler_text:
  25+ C08E                  INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C08E
   2++C08E              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C08E              .BoilerTextLoop:
   4++C08E C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   5++C08F 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   6++C090 23           	inc			hl
   7++C091 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   8++C092 23           	inc			hl
   9++C093 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  10++C094 23           	inc			hl
  11++C095 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  12++C096 23           	inc			hl
  13++C097 E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  14++C098 EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  15++C099 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  16++C09B C5           	push		bc
  17++C09C D1           	pop			de
  18++C09D                  MMUSelectLayer1
  18++C09D ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  19++C0A1 CD C8 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  20++C0A4 E1           	pop			hl
  21++C0A5 C1           	pop			bc
  22++C0A6 10 E6        	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  23++C0A8 C9           	ret
  24++C0A9
# file closed: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
  26+ C0A9              GCM_draw_chart_circle_and_crosshair:

  31+ C0B0              	MMUSelectSpriteBank

  42+ C0C6              	MMUSelectLayer2
  42+ C0C6 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2

  56+ C0DC              plot_gc_stars:
  57+ C0DC AF           	xor		a
  58+ C0DD 32 26 94     	ld		(XSAV),a
  59+ C0E0 DD 21 16 E0      ld      ix,galaxy_data
  60+ C0E4              .CounterLoop:
  61+ C0E4 3A 1E 95         ld      a,(Galaxy)
  62+ C0E7                  MMUSelectGalaxyA
  62+ C0E7 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,       a
  63+ C0EA DD E5            push    ix
  64+ C0EC E1               pop     hl
  65+ C0ED 11 0D 94         ld      de,SystemSeed
  66+ C0F0 CD A4 98     	call    copy_seed
  67+ C0F3 3A 10 94     	ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)				; QQ15+3 \ seed w1_h is Xcoord of star
  68+ C0F6 4F           	ld		c,a								; c = X Coord
  69+ C0F7 3A 0E 94     	ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)
  70+ C0FA CB 3F        	srl		a								; Ycoord /2
  71+ C0FC C6 18        	add		a,galactic_chart_y_offset		; add offset to Y coord of star
  72+ C0FE 47           	ld		b,a								; b = row
  73+ C0FF C5           	push	bc
  74+ C100 3E D8        	ld		a,galactic_star_colour
  75+ C102                  MMUSelectLayer2
  75+ C102 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
  76+ C106 CD FF E0     	call	l2_plot_pixel
  77+ C109 C1           	pop		bc
  78+ C10A 3A 11 94     	ld		a,(SystemSeed+4)
  79+ C10D F6 50        	or		$50								; minimum distance away
  80+ C10F FE 90        	cp		$90
  81+ C111 30 0A        	jr		nc,.NoSecondPixel
  82+ C113              .SecondPixel:
  83+ C113 0C           	inc		c
  84+ C114 3E 6C        	ld		a,galactic_star_colour2
  85+ C116                  MMUSelectLayer2
  85+ C116 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
  86+ C11A CD FF E0     	call	l2_plot_pixel
  87+ C11D              .NoSecondPixel:
  88+ C11D DD E5            push    ix
  89+ C11F E1               pop     hl
  90+ C120 ED 34 08 00      add     hl,8
  91+ C124 E5               push    hl
  92+ C125 DD E1            pop     ix
  93+ C127 3A 26 94     	ld		a,(XSAV)
  94+ C12A 3D           	dec		a
  95+ C12B FE 00        	cp		0
  96+ C12D C8           	ret		z
  97+ C12E 32 26 94     	ld		(XSAV),a
  98+ C131 18 B1        	jr		.CounterLoop

 154+ C20A              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 155+ C20A              gc_display_find_text:
 156+ C20A 11 08 B0      	ld		de,galactic_find_position   ; Wipe input area on screen
 157+ C20D 21 3C C0         ld      hl,galactic_find_message
 158+ C210                  MMUSelectLayer1

 160+ C217 C9               ret
 161+ C218              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 162+ C218              gc_display_find_string:
 163+ C218 11 BC C1         ld      de,gcInputText
 164+ C21B CD 7C 92         call    keyboard_copy_input_to_de
 165+ C21E 21 BA C1         ld      hl,gcCursorChar         ; Now just copy cursor char too
 166+ C221 ED A0            ldi                             ; Copy cursor to local
 167+ C223 3A 79 92         ld      a,(InputCursor)
 168+ C226 3C               inc     a
 169+ C227 47               ld      b,a
 170+ C228 3E 14            ld      a,20
 171+ C22A 90               sub     b
 172+ C22B 47               ld      b,a
 173+ C22C 3E 20            ld      a," "
 174+ C22E              .SpacePad
 175+ C22E 12               ld      (de),a
 176+ C22F 13               inc     de
 177+ C230 10 FC            djnz    .SpacePad
 178+ C232 AF               xor     a
 179+ C233 12               ld      (de),a
 180+ C234 11 38 B0     	ld		de,galactic_find_text    ; Display text
 181+ C237 21 BC C1         ld      hl,gcInputText
 182+ C23A                  MMUSelectLayer1
 182+ C23A ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
 183+ C23E CD C8 E0     	call	l1_print_at
 184+ C241 C9               ret
 185+ C242
 186+ C242              blink_cursor:
 187+ C242 3A B9 C1         ld      a,(gcCursorBlink)
 188+ C245 3D               dec     a
 189+ C246 32 B9 C1         ld      (gcCursorBlink),a
 190+ C249 C0               ret     nz
 191+ C24A              .FlashCursor:
 192+ C24A 3E 10            ld      a,gcBlinkVal
 193+ C24C 32 B9 C1         ld      (gcCursorBlink),a
 194+ C24F 3A BA C1         ld      a,(gcCursorChar)
 195+ C252 FE 20            cp      " "
 196+ C254 28 06            jr      z,.ChangeToStar
 197+ C256 3E 20            ld      a," "
 198+ C258 32 BA C1         ld      (gcCursorChar),a
 199+ C25B C9               ret
 200+ C25C              .ChangeToStar:
 201+ C25C 3E 2A            ld      a,"*"
 202+ C25E 32 BA C1         ld      (gcCursorChar),a
 203+ C261 C9               ret
 204+ C262              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 205+ C262 3A B8 C1     loop_gc_menu:           ld      a,(gcFindInputMode)
 206+ C265 FE 00                                cp      0
 207+ C267 20 1C                                jr      nz,AlreadyInInputMode
 208+ C269 3E 4E        .StartFindCheck:        ld      a,c_Pressed_Find                        ;Is F pressed
 209+ C26B CD 0C 92                             call    is_key_pressed
 210+ C26E C0                                   ret     nz
 211+ C26F CD 8F 92                             call    initInputText                           ;Initialise find input
 212+ C272 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
 213+ C274 32 B8 C1                             ld      (gcFindInputMode),a                     ; Set input mode to FF
 214+ C277 3E 10                                ld      a,gcBlinkVal
 215+ C279 32 B9 C1                             ld      (gcCursorBlink),a                       ; Set up Blink
 216+ C27C 3E 0A                                ld      a,gcDelayVal
 217+ C27E 32 DB C1                             ld     (gcInputDelay),a                         ; And keyboard rescan delay
 218+ C281 CD 0A C2     .DisplayInputbar:       call    gc_display_find_text
 219+ C284 C9                                   ret
 220+ C285              ;Already in input mode post pressing find
 221+ C285 3A DB C1     AlreadyInInputMode:     ld      a,(gcInputDelay)                    ; keyboard next press delay
 222+ C288 FE 00                                cp      0                                   ; can no read until its zero
 223+ C28A 20 17                                jr      nz,.blinkCursor                     ; so re just go to blink cursor routine if not permitted
 224+ C28C CD A3 92     .HasKeyBeenPressed:     call    InputName                           ; else we are ready to read input
 225+ C28F 3A 7B 92                             ld      a,(InputChanged)
 226+ C292 47                                   ld      b,a
 227+ C293 FE 00                                cp      0
 228+ C295 28 13                                jr      z,.blinkNoDelay                     ; when we go hear the input delay could be zero a flip over
 229+ C297 3E 0A                                ld      a,gcDelayVal
 230+ C299 32 DB C1                             ld     (gcInputDelay),a
 231+ C29C 3A 7A 92     .WasItEnter:            ld      a,(EnterPressed)
 232+ C29F FE 00                                cp      0
 233+ C2A1 20 1A                                jr      nz,.FindEnterPressed
 234+ C2A3 3A DB C1     .blinkCursor:           ld      a,(gcInputDelay)
 235+ C2A6 3D                                   dec     a
 236+ C2A7 32 DB C1                             ld     (gcInputDelay),a
 237+ C2AA CD 42 C2     .blinkNoDelay:          call    blink_cursor
 238+ C2AD 3A B9 C1                             ld      a,(gcCursorBlink)
 239+ C2B0 FE 10                                cp      gcBlinkVal
 240+ C2B2 CC 18 C2                             call    z,gc_display_find_string
 241+ C2B5 C9                                   ret
 242+ C2B6 78           .FindDone:              ld      a,b
 243+ C2B7 FE 00                                cp      0
 244+ C2B9 C4 18 C2                             call    nz,gc_display_find_string
 245+ C2BC C9                                   ret
 246+ C2BD AF           .FindEnterPressed:      xor     a
 247+ C2BE 32 7A 92                             ld      (EnterPressed),a                    ; reset enter
 248+ C2C1 32 B8 C1                             ld      (gcFindInputMode),a
 249+ C2C4 3A 1E 95                             ld      a,(Galaxy)                          ; Fetch correct galaxy seed bank into memory
 250+ C2C7                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 250+ C2C7 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,       a
 251+ C2CA 21 5A 92                             ld      hl,InputString
 252+ C2CD 11 5D E8                             ld      de,GalaxySearchString
 253+ C2D0 CD CF F6                             call    GalaxyCopyLoop
 254+ C2D3 CD 2C FB                             call    find_system_by_name
 255+ C2D6 FE FF                                cp      $FF                                 ; 0 denotes found FF, failure
 256+ C2D8 28 1D                                jr      z,.FindNoMatch
 257+ C2DA 3A FA E8                             ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+3)
 258+ C2DD 4F                                   ld      c,a
 259+ C2DE 3A F8 E8                             ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+1)
 260+ C2E1 47                                   ld      b,a
 261+ C2E2 ED 43 33 95                          ld      (TargetPlanetX),bc
 262+ C2E6 CD 8B C3                             call    UpdateGalacticCursor
 263+ C2E9 11 08 B0                             ld		de,galactic_find_position   ; Wipe input area on screen
 264+ C2EC 21 73 C0                             ld      hl,galactic_find_match
 265+ C2EF                                      MMUSelectLayer1
 265+ C2EF ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
 266+ C2F3 CD C8 E0                             call	l1_print_at

 297+ C32F CA 89 C3    >                jp      z,gc_BoundsLimit

 299+ C333 32 34 95                             ld      (TargetPlanetX+1),a

 304+ C33D FE FF       >                cp     255
 304+ C33F CA 89 C3    >                jp      z,gc_BoundsLimit

 306+ C343 32 34 95                             ld      (TargetPlanetX+1),a

 311+ C34F CA 89 C3    >                jp      z,gc_BoundsLimit

# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C070
   2++C070              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C070              .BoilerTextLoop:
   4++C070 C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   5++C071 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   6++C072 23           	inc			hl
   7++C073 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   8++C074 23           	inc			hl
   9++C075 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  10++C076 23           	inc			hl
  11++C077 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  12++C078 23           	inc			hl
  13++C079 E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  14++C07A EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  15++C07B 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  16++C07D C5           	push		bc
  17++C07E D1           	pop			de
  18++C07F                  MMUSelectLayer1
  18++C07F ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  19++C083 CD C8 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  20++C086 E1           	pop			hl
  21++C087 C1           	pop			bc
  22++C088 10 E6        	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  23++C08A C9           	ret
  24++C08B

# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C2C5
   2++C2C5              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C2C5              .BoilerTextLoop:
   4++C2C5 C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   5++C2C6 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   6++C2C7 23           	inc			hl
   7++C2C8 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   8++C2C9 23           	inc			hl
   9++C2CA 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  10++C2CB 23           	inc			hl
  11++C2CC 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  12++C2CD 23           	inc			hl
  13++C2CE E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  14++C2CF EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  15++C2D0 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  16++C2D2 C5           	push		bc
  17++C2D3 D1           	pop			de
  18++C2D4                  MMUSelectLayer1
  18++C2D4 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  19++C2D8 CD C8 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  20++C2DB E1           	pop			hl
  21++C2DC C1           	pop			bc
  22++C2DD 10 E6        	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  23++C2DF C9           	ret

 302+ C4E3
 303+ C4E3              ; HL = value to add on
 304+ C4E3              ; de = Unit of Measure
 305+ C4E3 7E           SDAddUoMtoHL:           ld      a,(hl)
 306+ C4E4 FE 00                                cp      0
 307+ C4E6 28 03                                jr      z,.FoundEnd
 308+ C4E8 23                                   inc     hl
 309+ C4E9 18 F8                                jr      SDAddUoMtoHL
 310+ C4EB EB           .FoundEnd:              ex      de,hl
 311+ C4EC CD 78 C2                             call    SDCopyLoop
 312+ C4EF C9                                   ret

 315+ C4F0              ; de = Unit of Measure

 317+ C4F1 EB                                   ex      hl,de
 318+ C4F2 CD 78 C2                             call    SDCopyLoop
 319+ C4F5 C9                                   ret

 203+ C213              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 204+ C213              MPM_print_boiler_text:  INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C213
   2++C213              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C213              .BoilerTextLoop:
   4++C213 C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   5++C214 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   6++C215 23           	inc			hl
   7++C216 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   8++C217 23           	inc			hl
   9++C218 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  10++C219 23           	inc			hl
  11++C21A 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  12++C21B 23           	inc			hl
  13++C21C E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  14++C21D EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  15++C21E 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  16++C220 C5           	push		bc
  17++C221 D1           	pop			de
  18++C222                  MMUSelectLayer1
  18++C222 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  19++C226 CD C8 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  20++C229 E1           	pop			hl
  21++C22A C1           	pop			bc
  22++C22B 10 E6        	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  23++C22D C9           	ret
  24++C22E
# file closed: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm

 207+ C231 EB                                   ex      de,hl
 208+ C232 DD 2A 07 98                          ld      ix,(Cash)
